name: M.T. Greene
text:
MAGA NATION, this post is for you, please read.

I know you because I‚Äôm one of you and we delivered a mandate which is President Trump‚Äôs America First agenda - the agenda he campaigned on at every rally he held and we attended across the country. 

Congress has to deliver that mandate with our budget reconciliation process, but some in Congress are developing amnesia to the very fact that YOU, the people, did not vote for them and their agenda, YOU voted for Trump and HIS agenda.

President Trump and his great team are delivering his campaign promises at record speed through his executive orders and DOGE.

President Trump is slashing regulations, destroying DEI, making the world respect America again through reciprocal tariffs, is in the process of ending world wars and America paying for them, has secured the border and begun deportations, is reducing the over bloated government workforce, and with Elon‚Äôs DOGE - they are literally exposing and dismantling the deep state‚Äôs government money laundering and out right fraud!  It‚Äôs been an AMAZING first month.

But we in Congress now have to deliver as well.

With the historic election. You would think Republicans would just whip up our bills, budget, and approps and pass them with ease, but nope, it‚Äôs so much harder than it should be.

President Trump wants one big beautiful bill and I prefer one as well, but we have to make sure HIS agenda is in that one big beautiful bill and there are a few items that some of my conservative colleagues don‚Äôt support. (Conservative doesn‚Äôt mean they supported Trump until they had to)

No Tax on Tips, No Tax on Overtime, and No Tax on Social Security were President Trump‚Äôs big campaign promises and some conservatives don‚Äôt want to include those when we renew the tax law - Trump‚Äôs Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. 

Those tax campaign promises help many Americans that need it the most as they have been hit hard by Biden and the Democrat‚Äôs high inflation over the past 4 years.  We are talking about senior‚Äôs and workers. 

So why, you ask, would some conservatives not support no tax on tips, overtime, and social security???

It‚Äôs because they are singularly focused on deeply cutting spending and some of them never supported Trump in the first place so they have no respect for the people‚Äôs mandate. Some of them simply don‚Äôt get it. And some of them think overly highly of themselves and their own plan.

Here is what they are missing, as well as some others in our Republican conference. 

With spending cuts, DOGE cuts, Trump‚Äôs de-regs, Trump‚Äôs reciprocal tariffs, energy policies, we MUST renew TCJA WITH all of the no tax campaign promises because ALL OF THIS together will be like Elon‚Äôs rockets to our economy!!!

And it all will work together to drive revenue AND cut spending AND will deliver the mandate THE PEOPLE voted for!!!

Cutting spending is only one piece and believe me I‚Äôm all for it, but with our compounding interest now bigger than our military budget, we can‚Äôt cut our way out of this.

We have to increase revenue but not be so blind and stupid that we give tax breaks to corporations but NOT to desperately suffering workers and seniors!!!

Give money back to workers and seniors and they will spend it into the economy and will be thanking Republicans at the same time!!!

Increasing revenue will happen through reciprocal tariffs, killing the green new deal handouts and tax breaks and driving American energy (which will lower business cost and inflation), cutting the strangling regulations on businesses, and DOGE‚Äôs lethal attack on the deep state‚Äôs money laundering and fraud.

But for the love of God, help the people that need it most, get out of your own way, deliver TRUMP‚ÄôS agenda, and maybe just maybe we will win the midterms if we do this right.

name: M.T. Greene
text:
Based on your comments which I fully appreciate and don‚Äôt disagree with, I‚Äôll share more information about serving in Congress.
For the yellow weeks, when we are in session, we have to fly into DC from our districts so that is a full travel day for many of us.
The last day of the week we fly back home to our districts, another full travel day. At least for those of us who don‚Äôt live in Washington. I do not live in Washington DC, I live in my district.
When we are not in session, we are either working at our district offices, meeting with constituents in our districts, or traveling. 
Most of us also have families that we don‚Äôt get to spend enough time with.
We also have to afford two homes, one in DC and one in our districts. Unlike some, I don‚Äôt sleep in my office. 
We are Representatives and our constituent services work is what you don‚Äôt see on tv and takes place back in our districts, but is actually some of most important work we do.
Lastly, we in the House don‚Äôt vote on President Trump‚Äôs nominations. The Senate only confirms nominations.
If I could change anything, I would require Congress to pass a balanced budget every year or not be qualified to run for re-election. 
For example, if the 119th Congress can‚Äôt balance the budget, then the entire Congress gets replaced the next election.
But I think I‚Äôm pretty alone in Congress in that opinion.
But what do y‚Äôall think?

Good morning.

After two days at our House Republican winter retreat, we still do not have a plan on budget reconciliation and our Speaker and his team have not offered one.

Not even if we are in a one bill or two bill framework, even though President Trump (who prefers one big beautiful bill) literally told us here at the start of our conference that he now does not care if it‚Äôs one or two.

Basically, just get started doing something.

We have only been presented with the same policy and budget cut proposals that we have been presented with for a month now at all our meetings and at a full Saturday conference meeting earlier this month.

I would say sink or swim, but our country is already sinking, so we MUST swim.

President Trump is leading the charge with unprecedented America FIRST executive orders. 

We should be writing our bills and budget reconciliation word for word to his executive orders so that they can become law and not stopped with Democrat lawsuits that are already piling up or a future Democrat administration that undoes them all with a stroke of the pen.

The American people elected Trump and are THRILLED with his executive orders and aggressive leadership that fights for America, and they want the entire Republican Party to DO THE SAME.

The American people demand Republicans deliver on the mandate and we should not be concerned about what CBO, who is left leaning and gets it wrong all the time, says. We should care what the people say and they don‚Äôt care what CBO says. 

And don‚Äôt worry, tax dollars did not pay for our conference retreat, we had to pay for it ourselves.

I would normally complain about spending money that didn‚Äôt accomplish anything, but we stayed at Trump Doral, which is a phenomenal resort, and the weather was sunny and in the 70‚Äôs.  And the Congressional Institute did a good job as always. 

Now the flag is at full mast.

I very much want House Republicans to be successful, all of us, with our razor thin majority.

Next time we meet, I hope to know a framework of our plan and I hope this doesn‚Äôt turn into another bill with thousands of pages dumped on us with less than 72 hours to read it all before we have to vote on the eve of another government shutdown.

But why would I expect different?

üá∫üá∏ GULF OF AMERICA BILL INTRODUCED üá∫üá∏

Today, I officially introduced my bill to rename the Gulf of Mexico the Gulf of America.

Mexican cartels currently use the Gulf of Mexico to traffic humans, drugs, weapons, and God knows what else while the Mexican government allows them to do it.

The American people are footing the bill to protect and secure the maritime waterways for commerce to be conducted. Our U.S. armed forces protect the area from any military threats from foreign countries.

It‚Äôs our gulf. The rightful name is the Gulf of America and it‚Äôs what the entire world should refer to it as.

Immediately following President Trump‚Äôs announcement, I directed my staff to get the bill drafted. I submitted the bill this afternoon with 14 original cosponsors.

My bill directs the Chairman of the Board on Geographic Names under the Secretary of the Interior to rename all federal documents and maps within 180 days of being signed into law.

Congress has to take the Trump Agenda mandate seriously and that means acting fast to enact it.

This is a piece of Day 1 legislation that can easily be awaiting President Trump‚Äôs signature the moment he takes his oath of office.

I urge my colleagues to join me to quickly pass this bill.

Good gracious, I came out of Christmas bliss to see arguments about American labor vs H1-B imported labor and MAGA split over this issue.

Good, that means everyone is engaged in saving this country.

Here is some tough reality for some of you:

There are some big MAGA voices with large social media platforms throwing down their opinions yet they have never run a company that relies on thousands of skilled/highly trained workers with a constant need for reliable labor yet they claim authority over the subject matter.

When you spend years trying to constantly hire/train/maintain a good reliable workforce, which is a 24/7 never ending cycle, your real world experience will produce an opinion based on reality and all of your followers on X don‚Äôt translate to this.

Having owned a construction company for decades (yes I‚Äôm that old), I know firsthand our workforce issues.

However, I fully believe we must make the hard and necessary changes here in the U.S. to educate, build, and facilitate a solid foundation of knowledgeable, highly skilled, talented, well paid, AMERICAN workers. 

Not having this is like having a crumbling foundation in our house and currently we are importing foreigners to hold up the foundation walls and plug the leaks. 

Too many of our young people, are killing their bodies and minds on alcohol and drugs, wasting years and money earning useless college degrees, chasing unrealistic dreams, spending all their time trying to be the next you tuber/content creator/social media influencer instead of pursuing a useful skill set/trade/education in order to become a part of our much needed American workforce. 

If you fall in this category, put down the selfie light, and go apply for a job and replace the H1-B visa holders and all the other skilled labor jobs that foreign workers are taking and American companies are desperately trying to hire.

It‚Äôs called building a career, you work your way up.

In order to go forward we must change our education system, create a culture that respects hard work and productivity, cut government waste/spending/regulations in order to produce a healthy robust economy that lowers inflation and pays higher wages to an American workforce, so that H1-B is no longer needed and can be done away with.

Decades of America LAST bad decisions in Washington wove a giant web of America LAST policies that created systems and structures that must be torn down and rebuilt to put America FIRST.

This requires everyone‚Äôs help to change it and we will all have to do what it takes to get it done.

It won‚Äôt be easy and it won‚Äôt be as quick as we like, but we can do it TOGETHER and the results will MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN but EVEN BETTER THAN BEFORE!!!

We did not know what was in the text until the bill was released last night. 

I am very grateful to all the Americans who dove into reading the bill text along with Elon and Vivek and made their voices heard!

If you all keep reading all our bills, with your support and pressure, we can save our country! So thank you üôè 

To be clear, the 1,500+ pages released last night were added spending items on top of the CR (continuing resolution) of the 2023 two part omnibus. 

A clean 3 month CR would extend the policies and programs funded in the two part 2023 omnibus which totaled $1.66 trillion. So that CR (1/4 of total) would cost approx $415 billion.

Then you would have to add on the extra cost of the items in the 1,500 page bill from last night. We don‚Äôt know how much that is!

text:
The War Machine.. 

I‚Äôll explain how it works and why I don‚Äôt vote for it.

The Defense Industrial Base is tax payer funded gov contracts with American companies to build weapons, ammunition, and military equipment - made in America with American jobs.

The pitch they give members of Congress and Senators is that we MUST vote for the annual defense budget and other programs in order to fund America‚Äôs military and defense of the United States of America.  

AND they always add how important these gov contracts are with American companies because they create jobs and continued funding protects these jobs.

They will also gladly show each of us a map of where these companies are, and number of jobs, in each of our districts or states, and to increase pressure on us they will throw in where military bases are in our districts.

This is implied understanding of how many votes that we could lose if we don‚Äôt vote YES to continue the funding for the defense contracts in our district and the number of military votes we could lose as well if we vote NO to military funding.

Of course add in the shaming of ‚Äúyou don‚Äôt support the military?!‚Äù

Many appropriation bills contain gov contracts with the defense industrial base which currently is an economic driver created by a business model that is built on murder, war, and destruction in foreign countries around the world.

The reason why I adamantly oppose this business model is because of the way it works.

They give away the older weapons, ammunition, and military equipment to countries the U.S. supports in the name of defending democracy and beating the current bad guy, in order to create the need to sign new defense contracts to build new weapons, ammunition, and military equipment to replenish the old.

Of course, giving away old weapons and equipment to countries like Ukraine comes with U.S. ‚Äúadvisers‚Äù on how to use these deadly gifts against their enemies, which also requires more funding. 

This is all in the name of ‚Äúresponsibility.‚Äù

This bloody business model creates an annual defense budget of over $850 billion per year, but that‚Äôs just the starter package. 

Funding foreign wars like Vietnam, Iraq, Afghanistan, Israel, and all the rest actually have cost the American people TRILLIONS of their hard earned tax dollars that comes with the ‚Äúreasons‚Äù of creating American jobs and replenishing America‚Äôs military and to support the Military Industrial Economic Base.

name: Mike Johnson
text: Presidents‚Äô Day is an opportunity now to reflect on the unparalleled legacy and blessings we have been afforded in this exceptional country of ours--and to pass that along to our children and grandchildren. As Washington admonished in his Farewell Address:

name: Mike Johnson
text: Tomorrow is also the day that Washington's famous Farewell Address is read in its entirety on the floor of the U.S. Senate--which is a tradition that began on February 22, 1862, during the darkest days of the Civil War, as an effort to remind America of our unity and greatness.

name: Mike Johnson
text: Since we included the observance of Abraham Lincoln‚Äôs birthday (February 12) at that time, the joint celebration became known as ‚ÄúPresidents‚Äô Day.‚Äù

name: Mike Johnson
text: The stated purpose of the statute creating more 3-day weekends was to ‚Äúbring substantial benefits to both the spiritual and economic life of the Nation.‚Äù

name: Mike Johnson
text: In 1968, Congress passed the Monday Holiday Law to ‚Äúprovide uniform annual observances of certain legal public holidays on Mondays.‚Äù

name: Mike Johnson
text: Our nation began celebrating George Washington‚Äôs birthday on February 22, 1800, just two months after his death in December 1799. The tradition was observed annually until 1879, when Congress officially declared it a federal holiday.

name: Mike Johnson
text: A little background on this uniquely American holiday:

This entire case against President Trump has been a politically motivated and contrived witch hunt aimed solely at preventing him from returning to the White House. It was never about the facts, and it should have never been brought in the first place. The judge grossly perverted the American legal system by manipulating existing law in a purely partisan effort to convert a bogus misdemeanor charge into a felony. Judge Merchan and the deranged prosecution have done untold damage to our justice system.

But despite this liberal judge‚Äôs tireless efforts and obvious media campaign to smear President Trump, the only jury that matters ‚Äì the American people ‚Äì saw through this corruption of justice, spoke decisively, and rejected their weaponization of government.

After four years of lawfare, restoring the American people‚Äôs trust in our system of justice will be critically important, and I support President Trump‚Äôs decision to appeal this decision and put this shameful chapter in American history behind us.

name: Mike Johnson
text:
Chairman @RepWesterman, @HouseGOP Chairwoman @RepLisaMcClain and @westerncaucus Chairman @RepLaMalfa's joint statement on the Los Angeles fires:

"Our prayers are with the victims of the dangerous fires today in California. We must aggressively increase the pace and scale of our forest management to prevent these types of catastrophes in the future. Last year we passed the Fix Our Forests Act with overwhelming bipartisan support to help support community resilience to wildfires and prevent these types of tragedies in the future. Unfortunately, that legislation died in the Senate. Additionally, the forestry title of the Farm Bill would have implemented measures to proactively manage forests to lessen wildfire risk. Now is not the time for politics but the time for action, and House Republicans will work to pass these initiatives again in the new Congress."

name: Mike Johnson
text: I joined my Louisiana colleagues in asking @POTUS to approve Governor Landry‚Äôs request for federal assistance for those affected by the terrorist attack in New Orleans. I‚Äôm continuing to pray for the victims, including the families of the 14 individuals who lost their lives.

name: Mike Johnson
text:
It‚Äôs an incredible honor to continue serving our great country as Speaker of the House. ¬† 

Now, let‚Äôs get to work.

name: Mike Johnson
text:
The American people¬†have demanded an end to the status quo, and a return to fiscal sanity.¬†That‚Äôs why the citizens of our great country gave President Trump the White House and Republican control of both chambers of Congress.¬†If we don‚Äôt follow through on our campaign promise for fiscal responsibility, we don‚Äôt deserve to hold power.¬† The national debt is a grave threat to America‚Äôs economic and national security ‚Äì and no issue exemplifies the Congress‚Äô failures more. ¬† 

Republicans have a real opportunity in the next two years to make meaningful spending reforms to eliminate trillions in waste, fraud, and abuse, and end the weaponization of government.¬† Along with advancing President Trump‚Äôs America First agenda, I will lead the House Republicans to reduce the size and scope of the federal government, hold the bureaucracy accountable, and move the United States to a more sustainable fiscal trajectory. ¬† 

As Speaker, I commit to: 

1. Create a working group comprised of independent experts ‚Äì not corrupted by lobbyists and special interests ‚Äì to work with DOGE¬†and our committees¬†on implementing recommended government and spending reforms to protect the American taxpayer. 

2. Task that working group with reviewing existing audits of federal agencies and entities created by Congress ‚Äì and issuing a report to my office for public release. 

3. Request¬†House committees undertake aggressive authorizations and appropriations reviews, including providing additional resources where needed, to expose irresponsible or illegal practices and hold agencies/individuals accountable that have weaponized government against the American people. ¬† 

If we want to¬†restore¬†fiscal responsibility, we must start by being transparent about the dollars that are spent, address the issues we find, and then hold those accountable who have misspent funds. Republicans have a mandate to implement the America First Agenda, and as Speaker, this will be¬†my priority.

name: Mike Johnson
text:
My statement on House passage of the FY25 NDAA: 

Today‚Äôs passage of the annual National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) includes important wins for our troops and ensures our military has the necessary resources and support to defend our great nation.¬†Our men and women in uniform should know their first obligation is protecting our nation, not woke ideology. It‚Äôs disappointing to see 124 of my Democrat colleagues vote against our brave men and women in uniform over policies that have nothing to do with their intended mission.
¬†
That is why this year‚Äôs NDAA refocuses our military on its core mission of defending America. The legislation supports law enforcement operations and the deployment of the National Guard to the southwest border, expedites innovation and reduces the acquisition timeline for new weaponry, supports our allies, and strengthens our nuclear posture and missile defense programs.
¬†
Because we believe in peace through strength, we blocked the Biden Administration's plan to reduce the number of US special forces. We remain determined to confront increasingly hostile threats from Communist China, Russia, and Iran, and this legislation provides our military with the tools they need to deter our enemies and keep America safe.
¬†
We also believe it‚Äôs important to refocus the Pentagon on military lethality, not radical woke ideology. This legislation permanently bans transgender treatment for minors, prohibits critical race theory in military academies, ends the DEI bureaucracy, and combats antisemitism.
¬†
This legislation also reinforces our commitment to America‚Äôs brave men and women in uniform, and their families, by making landmark investments in their quality of life. I‚Äôm proud that we‚Äôre providing significant pay increases to our servicemembers, reducing barriers to employment for military spouses, and improving military housing and access to childcare.
¬†
The safety and security of the American people is top priority, and this bill ensures our military has the resources and capabilities needed to remain the most powerful force in the world.

name: Mike Johnson
text: Today I joined @SpeakerJohnson in meeting @elonmusk (and his son!) to discuss his initiatives alongside @VivekGRamaswamy to establish a Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE). My statement on Kamala Harris‚Äô Economic Plan Doubling Down on Failure:

Kamala Harris‚Äô destructive policies have caused the current economic crisis, and her new plan is to double down on those failures.

Prices have skyrocketed, our taxes have increased, homeownership has plummeted, and millions of Americans are now facing record-high credit card debt. Yet, Harris wants to copy places like Soviet Russia and Venezuela, where citizens stood in mile-long lines for bread and fought their fellow neighbors in the streets for food. These massive, big government socialist policies have been tried repeatedly throughout history - and failed every single time.

Harris‚Äô new ‚Äòeconomic plan‚Äô would put the American Dream out of reach for hardworking families and ensure millions of Americans would never have the opportunity to purchase an affordable home, provide for their children, or create long-lasting wealth. The Harris plan is the opposite of what our country needs, and it should be soundly rejected.

Two years after the passage of Congressional Democrats‚Äô failed Inflation Expansion Act, Americans continue to feel the disastrous effects the law has had across our economy.

Among the most egregious provisions of the law is the mandate from bureaucrats¬†to artificially set prescription drug prices, which is already doing untold damage to the American health care system. Patients are seeing fewer choices, higher prices, and fewer cures, while the American pharmaceutical industry ‚Äî which currently leads the world in the development of new medicines ‚Äî is now in jeopardy of losing its competitive advantage on the rest of the world.

Make no mistake, price fixing has failed in every sector and in every country where it has ever been tried. The Biden-Harris Administration says it wants to lower prices for families, but their prescription drug price fixing scheme has accomplished just two things: driving up health care costs and crushing American innovation in medicine.

As a result of President Shafik‚Äôs refusal to protect Jewish students and maintain order on campus, Columbia University became the epicenter for virulent antisemitism that has plagued many American university campuses since Hamas‚Äô barbaric attack on Israel last fall. 

I stood in President Shafik‚Äôs office in April and told her to resign, and while it is long overdue, we welcome today‚Äôs news. Jewish students at Columbia beginning this school year should breathe a sigh of relief. 

I am grateful for the work of our House leaders who have continued to investigate the scourge of antisemitism on college campuses, particularly Education and Workforce Committee Chairwoman @virginiafoxx and House GOP Chairwoman @RepStefanik, whose probing questions inspired a nationwide backlash to the coddling of pro-Hamas radicals on campuses across America.

NEW: VP Kamala Harris was tasked w/ solving "root causes" of migration in the Northern Triangle countries & Mexico.
What do the numbers say?
According to CBP data, under the Biden/Harris administration, illegal crossings of migrants from Mexico and the Northern Triangle countries are up 140% over Trump's term in office, and are up 34% over all 8 years of Obama's two terms in office.

Biden/Harris years
FY' 2021 - FY'2024 (so far)¬† ¬†
4.31 million recorded illegal crossings from Northern triangle and Mexico.
Guatemala: 896,608
Honduras: 782,115
El Salvador: 282,029
Mexico: 2,353,513
Total: 4,314,255

Trump/Pence years
FY'2017-FY'2020¬† ¬†
1.8 million recorded illegal crossings from Northern Triangle and Mexico.
Guatemala: 495,004
Honduras: 417,569
El Salvador: 187,424
Mexico: 699,771
Total: 1,799,768

Obama years (two terms)
FY'2009-FY2016¬† ¬†
3.2 million recorded illegal crossings from Northern Triangle and Mexico.
Guatemala: 348,899
Honduras: 291,007
El Salvador: 275,191
Mexico: 2,304,279
Total: 3,219,376

Note: These numbers do not include gotaways or CBP ports of entry.

Note II: Fiscal years are not calendar years, so between administrations there is some mixing of data over several months as fiscal years for CBP data typically run from Oct 1-Sept30th.
For instance, Trump was inaugurated on 1/20/17.
FY 2017 data includes October, November, December 2016 data under Obama during his last months in office. Trump's last few months in 2020 are counted under FY'21 before Biden took office, etc.

Link to archived Trump & Obama years data: cbp.gov/sites/default/files/‚Ä¶

Link to CBP Portal for Biden/Harris years going back to 2021: cbp.gov/newsroom/stats/south‚Ä¶

üö® HEARING ADVISORY: Next week, we will hold a hearing to examine¬†the FBI's investigation into the assassination attempt against President Trump and the ongoing politicization of the Bureau.

Witness: FBI Director Christopher Wray.

name: Mike Johnson
text:
Today, I am announcing a special task force within the House of Representatives to investigate the assassination attempt on President Trump.

We need answers for these shocking security failures.

name: Mike Johnson
text: The House is committed to getting answers for the American people.

name: Mike Johnson
text:
I asked Secretary Mayorkas: Where were the drones on Saturday?

He had no answer. The American people deserve answers.¬†

U.S. Secret Service Director Cheatle will testify next Monday to answer these important questions.

name: E. Warren
text:
For $200,000, CEOs can slap their corporate logo on Donald Trump dressed as the Easter Bunny.

It‚Äôs absurdly corrupt.

name: E. Warren
text:
Kitty Dukakis was a force of nature who will be remembered for her spirit and her courage.

Early on in my first campaign, Kitty jumped in feet-first and shared advice grounded in decades of public service ‚Äî advice that has stuck with me through the years. 

Our Commonwealth was lucky to have her. I'm thinking of Michael and the entire Dukakis family.

name: E. Warren
text:
GSK has made it too expensive for parents to buy inhalers for their kids.

It's wrong.

Children are already facing dangerous consequences. I'm calling for an investigation.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Trump administration wants to shut down all of Social Security over a ruling blocking 11 DOGE workers from sticking their fingers in your private data.

11 DOGE workers. 73 million Americans.

This is illegal. If it happens, will force millions of seniors into poverty.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump‚Äôs billionaire Commerce Secretary has financial advice for Americans:

1. Please buy Tesla stock to help poor Elon Musk.

2. Shut up and don‚Äôt complain when you don‚Äôt get your Social Security check.

name: E. Warren
text:
Dr. Oz wants the power to run health care for 66 million American ‚Äî but he dodged paying $400,000 in Medicare taxes.
 
Dr. Oz won‚Äôt even pay his fair share into Medicare. How can we trust him to lead it?
reuters.com/business/healthc‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
How does it make sense for the Small Business Administration to handle your student loans? It doesn't‚Äîand it's illegal.

Donald Trump and Elon Musk are making it harder for you to get the help you need to go to college.

We're going to fight back.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump's attack on science is turning back the clock on research that saves lives and powers our economy in Massachusetts and beyond.

Not on my watch.
 
I'm pressing Trump's health leaders for answers now.

name: E. Warren
text: Trump and DOGE want to turn the federal government into a fire sale‚Äîclosing offices, firing workers, shuttering critical agencies, and cutting programs that serve working people. @SenWarren and I are demanding answers about Massachusetts federal buildings. wcvb.com/article/massachuset‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Terry was scammed out of most of his savings and was supposed to get his money back‚Äîuntil Donald Trump and Elon Musk gut the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.
 
Watch his story:

name: E. Warren
text:
Trump is telling America's public school kids that their futures don‚Äôt matter.

Billionaires like Trump and Musk won‚Äôt feel it when afterschool programs are slashed, class sizes go up, and student aid gets cut.

It'll be working parents, students, and teachers who pay the price.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump is trying to dismantle public education in America. 

To every public school student, teacher, and parent: this is our moment to stick together and fight back.

name: E. Warren
text:
It's the billionaires vs. the kids of America. 
 
Donald Trump and Elon Musk side with the billionaires. 
 
I'm siding with our kids and our teachers every time.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and Elon Musk turned the White House into a Tesla dealership.

Is that where you want your taxpayer dollars going? Nope.

I'm pushing for an ethics investigation.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump just fired the people who make rules like this one. 

Why? His corporate donors don't like when the government works for working people.

name: E. Warren
text:
I talked to @Your_RichBFF about Trump‚Äôs scams.

Spoiler: He‚Äôs gutting the agency that helps you when you get scammed.

And his biggest scam? Tax handouts for his rich buddies paid for by you.

Listen here üîó: open.spotify.com/episode/2fv‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
I‚Äôve been saying all along that Trump's chaotic approach to tariffs is giving companies cover to raise prices on you. 

And it‚Äôs also resulting in the Fed keeping interest rates high for longer ‚Äî denying workers, consumers, and small businesses relief.

name: E. Warren
text:
Thank you to everyone who joined our town hall in Lowell last night! 

Real power in this nation lies with the people ‚Äî right here in Lowell, and across America.

name: E. Warren
text:
The @FTC must enforce the law without fear or favor. 

The administration's illegal attempt to fire Commissioners Slaughter & Bedoya is a disturbing sign that this FTC won't. 

It's a gift to corporate lawbreakers that squeeze American consumers, workers, and honest businesses.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump just illegally fired two independent commissioners at the FTC who fight big corporations that abuse consumers and workers.

Why? Trump's billionaire donors expect a return on their investment. He works for them, not you.

The courts must reinstate the commissioners.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and Elon Musk gave the greenlight for scammers to cheat servicemembers and veterans.
 
Now, military families are left to fend for themselves.
 
How can anyone think this is a good idea?

üîó: newyorker.com/news/deep-stat‚Ä¶ - @NewYorker

name: E. Warren
text:
Republicans in Congress want to give a $75 billion tax handout to five of the richest companies in America.

That‚Äôs triple what the federal government spends on child care every year.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and Elon Musk are gutting the CFPB, giving big corporations a free pass to rip you off. 

We need state-level consumer protections now more than ever, and @NewYorkStateAG Letitia James is stepping up. 

We're fighting back in Congress, the courts and the states.

name: E. Warren
text:
Elon Musk called Social Security ‚Äúthe biggest Ponzi scheme of all time.‚Äù

Now, he wants to fire workers who¬†make sure your grandma gets¬†her monthly check.

I've got a message for Elon: get your hands off our Social Security.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Constitution is clear: the President can't arrest people he disagrees with. 

By detaining Mahmoud Khalil ‚Äî a legal permanent resident whose American wife is 8-months pregnant ‚Äî Donald Trump seeks to undermine basic freedoms. 

We must oppose this move toward authoritarianism.

name: E. Warren
text:
Trump is defying court orders and abusing wartime powers to deport people with no due process.

He's using the law that put Italian, German, and Japanese immigrants in detention camps during World War II.

We are not at war. Donald Trump is not a king. He is not above the law.

name: E. Warren
text:
See you in Lowell for a town hall tomorrow!

RSVP HERE: eventbrite.com/e/lowell-town‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
On Tuesday night, co-presidents Trump and Musk fired half of the workers at the Education Department. 

On Wednesday, FAFSA - the financial aid application for millions of kids who want to go to college - went down.

That‚Äôs their idea of efficiency.

name: E. Warren
text:
I asked Dr. Oz: Crack down on waste, fraud, and abuse by for-profit insurers in Medicare advantage OR cut health care for seniors and children on Medicaid?

Oz said it's ‚Äúmore rational‚Äù to protect Medicaid.

Duh!

Trump and Republicans must abandon their plan to gut Medicaid.

name: E. Warren
text:
Dr. Oz is another rich guy who doesn't care if your health care costs go up or an insurance company denies you coverage.

He‚Äôs about to testify in front of the Senate Finance Committee, and I‚Äôve got questions.

name: E. Warren
text:
Ra√∫l Grijalva was a force of nature in Congress. He fought with courage to improve the lives of families and safeguard our environment for future generations.
¬†
He was an exceptionally decent man.
¬†
I am saddened by his passing and grateful for his friendship. I will miss him.

name: E. Warren
text:
The government runs out of money tomorrow at midnight.

Let me explain how we got here.

name: E. Warren
text:
Dr. Oz want to gut Medicare ‚Äî AND it looks like he cheated on his Medicare taxes.
 
Dr. Oz is once again demonstrating that he cannot be trusted to protect Medicare and Medicaid for millions of people.

name: E. Warren
text:
Bloomberg just broke news that the Trump family‚Äôs crypto company has been in discussions with Binance on doing business, including possibly creating a new stablecoin.

We have a chance to fix this stablecoin bill to prevent this kind of naked corruption.

name: E. Warren
text: Ranking Member Warren on stablecoin legislation: If we can find compromises on these issues today, I‚Äôm prepared to support this bill. If not, I will work to defeat it. Because we are not going to get a second chance to do this right, and we all have to live with the consequences.

name: E. Warren
text:
I'm voting NO on the Republican shutdown bill.
 
NO on handing Donald Trump and Elon Musk a blank check to spend your taxpayer money however they want.
 
NO on cutting funding that helps families put food on the table and crack down on wealthy tax cheats.

We need to push back.

name: E. Warren
text:
Senate Republicans are pushing a bill that will let Elon Musk and Big Tech CEOs take control of your money. Democrats are ready to fix the problems with this stablecoin bill.

Americans want Congress to lower costs ‚Äì not risk their money, our economy, and national security.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and Elon Musk are playing games with your Social Security benefits ‚Äî money you've earned through a lifetime of hard work.
 
They want to fire workers responsible for processing checks and close hundreds of regional offices.
 
Not on my watch.

name: E. Warren
text:
CODE RED: Donald Trump is trying to shut down the Department of Education. 

We're fighting back.

name: E. Warren
text:
Senator Shaheen is a foreign policy leader and tireless advocate for women and girls here at home and around the globe.

From fighting for military families and veterans to defending women‚Äôs reproductive rights, it‚Äôs been an honor to work alongside her.

name: E. Warren
text: Ranking Member Warren‚Äôs statement on February 2025 CPI:

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump said he'd abolish the Department of Education, and that's exactly what he's doing.

If you send your kids to public school, Trump is sending you a clear message: he doesn‚Äôt care about you.

name: E. Warren
text:
Grocery prices are soaring.

Housing costs are skyrocketing. 

Retirement savings are plummeting.

But Donald Trump thought today would be a good day to play car salesman.

name: E. Warren
text:
The richest man in the world is coming after people‚Äôs retirement and health care.

Will Donald Trump and Republicans in Congress speak up?

Their silence is alarming.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and co-president Elon Musk are shutting down the federal government, piece by piece. 

And now Republicans have a shutdown bill that would make it worse.

name: E. Warren
text:
Republicans want to give out nearly $5 TRILLION in tax giveaways mostly sucked up by millionaires, billionaires, and big corporations.

Democrats want to invest in opportunity for everybody.

name: E. Warren
text:
Americans are suffering under the weight of sky-high housing prices. 

Today, I‚Äôm re-introducing my bill with @SenatorWarnock and @repcleaver to build 3 million new homes, bring down rents by 10%, and cut red tape that drives up costs.

Congress must act.
axios.com/2025/03/11/afforda‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump has done nothing to lower prices, but he sure as heck has created a lot of economic chaos that will actually increase prices for families.
 
We‚Äôre in real economic trouble thanks to the President, and right now, the stock market is a flashing warning light.

name: E. Warren
text:
RFK Jr. said he'd "clean up corruption" as HHS Secretary.

So why'd he have dinner with Big Pharma executives at Mar-a-Lago with Trump?

The American people deserve to know what kind of deals might have been made at those "million-dollar" dinners.

name: E. Warren
text:
For Donald Trump and Elon Musk, if you don‚Äôt bend the knee ‚Äî you‚Äôre a traitor.

Senator Kelly served in combat as a Navy fighter pilot. He commanded NASA missions into space. He‚Äôs a patriot.

Like many of us, he believes in freedom and democracy ‚Äî including for Ukraine.

name: E. Warren
text:
In 2017, Trump gave a $2 trillion tax cut mostly sucked up by billionaires and big corporations.

But it was so expensive, Republicans set many of their tax cuts to end after 2025.

Now, Republicans want to steal from working people to pay for more tax cuts for billionaires.

name: E. Warren
text:
About half of all births are covered by Medicaid.   

Over a third of all children are covered by Medicaid.  

More than half of all nursing home residents are covered by Medicaid.

Republicans in Congress are making a big mistake targeting these families‚Äô health care to pay for tax cuts for the rich.

name: E. Warren
text: apnews.com/article/record-hi‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump promised to lower food prices.
 
Instead, he fired the experts in charge of containing the bird flu.
 
Yep ‚Äì the same bird flu that‚Äôs part of the reason egg prices are surging.

name: E. Warren
text:
What has DOGE done?

- Fired the people tasked with keeping Americans safe from the bird flu.
- Gutted the IRS workforce during filing season.
- Fired the FAA workers who make sure it‚Äôs safe for us to fly in planes.

Does that sound like efficiency to you?

name: E. Warren
text: I asked RFK Jr. a simple question: will he encourage parents to vaccinate their kids against measles ‚Äî yes or no?

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump is blocking the development of life-saving medicine.

How does that help you?

name: E. Warren
text:
Elon Musk and Donald Trump are trying to make you believe that they are cutting ‚Äúwaste,‚Äù but they‚Äôre actually reaching into your wallet to fund tax cuts for their ‚Äúrich as hell‚Äù friends.

Spread the word.

name: E. Warren
text: punchbowl.news/article/vault‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Republicans in Congress are saying their tax plan will cost $0. That's a lie.
 
The truth: they want to pay for billionaire tax handouts by adding trillions to the deficit and slashing health care coverage.
 
Republicans can try to repeal math, but they can't repeal reality.

name: E. Warren
text: semafor.com/newsletter/03/06‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump wants to give big corporations tax cuts - supposedly to incentivize them to do research.

Here‚Äôs the catch: these companies already did that research years ago. So these tax giveaways are exactly that ‚Äî giveaways.

Billionaires win, families lose.

name: E. Warren
text:
What does it mean for DOGE to "make mistakes" with seniors' Social Security? 

Long wait times, underpayments, or no payments at all. 

The richest man in the world is sticking his fingers in the benefits our seniors have paid for their entire working lives.

name: E. Warren
text:
4 in 5 Americans support raising taxes on the rich ‚Äî Democrats, Republicans, and Independents.

Donald Trump and Republicans in Congress want to cut taxes for the rich and pay for it by slashing funding for nursing homes and school lunches.

name: E. Warren
text:
"I want universal childcare," @SenWarren tells @burgessev.

"But here's what I know for sure: If Elon Musk and a handful of billionaires are gonna get $4.6 trillion in tax cuts, and that our federal government is going to be forced to put old people out on the streets because we're not gonna give them help on their nursing home bills, then there's not gonna be a lot of room for having a childcare discussion."

name: E. Warren
text:
Ever wonder why Mark Zuckerberg and Jeff Bezos are cozying up to Donald Trump?

They‚Äôre expecting it to pay off with major tax handouts. 

And Trump and Republicans in Congress want to pay for those handouts by cutting programs that lower costs for working families.

name: E. Warren
text:
I keep hearing Republicans claim their budget doesn't cut Medicaid.

We all know that's a lie ‚Äî so I asked the nonpartisan CBO to look into it.

Their analysis confirms it: the Republican budget delivers the largest Medicaid cuts in history to pay for giveaways to billionaires.

name: E. Warren
text:
One thing Trump didn't talk about last night: his plans to abandon American women‚Äôs right to abortion care in medical emergencies.
 
I wonder why he wouldn't want anyone to know that.

name: E. Warren
text: bostonglobe.com/2025/03/03/o‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
More than 79 million people get health care through Medicaid,¬†including¬†over 1/3 of all children and nearly 2/3 of nursing home residents.

Trump and Republicans want to rip their health care away¬†‚Äì just to bankroll tax cuts for the rich. We can't let them.

name: E. Warren
text:
First: Elon Musk tweeted "CFPB RIP."

Now: Republicans are trying to block the CFPB from stopping fraud on apps like Venmo, CashApp and Elon‚Äôs new X Money.

Next week: They'll try to move legislation allowing Musk to sell X Money as a stablecoin without any consumer protections.

name: E. Warren
text: How many Gold Cards will Donald Trump have to sell to offset $4.6 trillion in tax giveaways to billionaires and giant corporations?

name: E. Warren
text: If Republicans in Congress want to help make our country safe, I have some ideas for them.

name: E. Warren
text:
There are very few people in America who think tax dollars should be spent to juice the net worth of a small handful of crypto billionaires ‚Äî yet that‚Äôs exactly what‚Äôs happening here.

Donald Trump‚Äôs idea of a crypto slush fund is pure corruption.
cnn.com/2025/03/04/business/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and Elon Musk are happy to make you wait for your tax refund ‚Äî just so the wealthy can cheat on their taxes.
 
How is that efficient?

name: E. Warren
text: If you use Venmo or CashApp and don't want to get scammed, listen up.

name: E. Warren
text: Donald Trump is handing our country over to a handful of billionaires.

name: E. Warren
text:
I agree with Donald Trump that an unelected bureaucrat should be fired. 

Let‚Äôs start with Elon Musk.

name: E. Warren
text: I won‚Äôt vote to give tax breaks to billionaires.

name: E. Warren
text: Donald Trump: ‚ÄúAmerica is back‚Äù

name: E. Warren
text:
Tonight I‚Äôm joined by Doug, a National Science Foundation employee who was recently fired.

Doug was working to bring more scientific research money into the United States.

Firing him is the opposite of efficiency.

name: E. Warren
text: Republicans in Congress want to cut life-saving cancer research to pay for tax cuts for billionaires.

name: E. Warren
text:
Senate Republicans are pushing to roll back a rule that protects consumers on apps like Venmo and CashApp.
 
They are paving the way for unelected billionaire Elon Musk to profit off your data and scam you when he launches "X Money."

name: E. Warren
text:
Giant corporations are using Donald Trump‚Äôs haphazard tariff announcements as an excuse to raise prices.
 
The Trump Administration has no plan to stop it ‚Äì and working families will unfairly foot the bill.

name: E. Warren
text:
Senate Armed Services Democrats are demanding answers from Defense Sec. Pete Hegseth about the abrupt dismissals of Judge Advocate Generals.

The independence of military legal professionals must be preserved. Actions that erode this independence must be rectified without delay.

name: E. Warren
text:
A 25% across-the-board tariff on Canada does nothing to bring American manufacturing home, strengthen U.S. supply chains, or create jobs.
 
Donald Trump promised to lower prices on ‚ÄúDay 1", but now families have to worry about higher costs.

name: E. Warren
text:
RFK's reckless stance on vaccines puts lives in danger.

I‚Äôm asking him a simple question: will he change course and encourage parents to vaccinate their kids against measles ‚Äî yes or no?

A child in Texas died from measles, the first death in a decade. It should be an easy yes.

cnn.com/2025/03/03/health/wa‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: Trump promised to lower prices on day one, but costs have only gone up.

name: E. Warren
text:
Linda McMahon is a former WWE executive who "wholeheartedly" agrees with Trump that we should abolish the Department of Education.

I‚Äôm fighting to defend our students and teachers.

name: E. Warren
text: Ranking Member Warren's statement on President Trump‚Äôs tariffs for Canada and Mexico:

name: E. Warren
text:
First, Donald Trump blamed Zelenskyy for Putin‚Äôs invasion of Ukraine.

Then, he says he ‚Äútrusts‚Äù Putin.

Now, he‚Äôs frozen bipartisan military aid.

It‚Äôs clear that Donald Trump is putting his fragile ego before our national security ‚Äî siding with Putin over U.S. allies in Europe.

name: E. Warren
text:
I want Trump and Musk to look straight at some of the people that they fired.

People like Doug, who played a key role in funding critical scientific research.

This isn't about cutting waste, fraud, and abuse - it's about hurting the future of our country.

name: E. Warren
text:
Thanks to President Trump‚Äôs and Elon's decision to put the CFPB on ice, $100 million meant to help scammed borrowers is now stuck in limbo. 

This is the opposite of lowering costs.

reuters.com/world/us/consume‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: apnews.com/article/doge-musk‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
E. Warren
text: Elon Musk doesn‚Äôt care about government efficiency ‚Äì and here‚Äôs the proof.

name: E. Warren
E. Warren
text: nytimes.com/2025/02/25/busin‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
While your grocery bill skyrockets, egg producers are cashing in.
¬†
It's time for President Trump to use the tools he has to lower prices for working families.

name: E. Warren
text:
Sounds like a billionaire who‚Äôs never talked to a working person in his life.

Elon: get your hands off of Americans‚Äô hard-earned Social Security.

name: E. Warren
text:
We invited @ElonMusk to defend himself in front of the American people.  

He was too much of a coward to show up.

name: E. Warren
text:
Billionaires like Jeff Bezos shouldn‚Äôt pay a lower tax rate than a Boston public school teacher.

The wealthiest and most powerful people in this country should be paying their fair share ‚Äî not getting tax breaks from Donald Trump and Republicans in Congress.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump is treating the destruction of a democracy as a political show ‚Äî throwing Ukraine to the wolves and doing a favor for Putin.
 
It's shameful and dangerous.
 
I've been to Ukraine, as have many Senate Republicans. I hope they speak up. Millions of lives are at stake.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and Elon Musk are trying to shut down the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau - the agency that helps you if you get scammed.

@SenateDems are united in defending the CFPB, which has already returned more than $21 billion to families cheated by Wall Street.

name: E. Warren
text: Ranking Member Warren's Statement on January PCE:

name: E. Warren
text:
Federal workers are the people doing the hard work to process veterans‚Äô benefits, make sure our airplanes can fly safely, and protect families from the bird flu.
 
To all of our federal workers: I see you and I‚Äôm fighting for you.

name: E. Warren
text:
Maybe instead of purging the Social Security workers who make sure seniors get their checks on time, we should be expanding benefits to make life a little easier for your parents and grandparents.

@SenSanders and I have a bill to get that done, so that seniors can retire with the dignity they deserve.

name: E. Warren
text: Unacceptable: I pressed the nominee to lead the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau on whether returning $20 billion to scammed consumers was a good or bad thing‚Ä¶ and he COULDN‚ÄôT ANSWER. What is this administration thinking?

name: E. Warren
text:
Our service members are among the best and bravest our nation has to offer.
¬†
They are patriots who put their lives on the line to keep us safe.
¬†
To demean thousands of transgender service members' sacrifice by removing them is cruel and stupid ‚Äì and makes us all less safe.

name: E. Warren
text:
From gutting consumer protections to slashing the programs that families count on, Trump‚Äôs plan is simple: families lose, billionaires win.

Democrats are united against his efforts to hurt families!

name: E. Warren
text:
During Trump's CFPB Director nomination hearing, it broke that the agency is dropping lawsuits against companies accused of cheating American families out of their money. 

This wasn't a coincidence. It shows exactly who is in charge right now: Elon Musk.

name: E. Warren
text:
You've heard of girl math, but have you heard of billionaire math?

Trump's temporary tax handouts for the rich are expiring this year, and Republicans want working Americans to foot the bill.

They're claiming it'll cost you nothing, but in reality, these tax handouts cost trillions.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump's tax breaks for billionaires and billionaire corporations are NOT "cost free".

The real cost will be health care cuts for:

- New moms and their babies
- Grandma in the nursing home
- Kids with disabilities

Threatening your health care for billionaire handouts.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Trump-Musk attack on American consumers in a nutshell:

Company started scamming people with interest rates as high as 1000% ‚Üí CFPB stepped in to hold it accountable ‚Üí Trump Administration reversed course, leaving consumers high and dry. 

cnn.com/2025/02/25/business/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: .@SenatorWarnock: An unelected billionaire posing as Co-President is trying to "delete" the CFPB, the only financial regulator dedicated solely to protecting American's wallets.

name: E. Warren
text:
While the bird flu gets worse and egg prices skyrocket, Trump‚Äôs team fired employees who were working on the bird flu response. 
 
Now, they‚Äôre frantically trying to reverse course.
 
This is the opposite of efficiency.

name: E. Warren
text:
Why did Trump declare an energy emergency when the U.S. is producing more energy now than at any other point in our history? Why halt Inflation Reduction Act investments that are creating new jobs?

Because Trump will do anything for Big Oil.

I‚Äôm forcing a vote to stop this sham.

name: E. Warren
text:
When Americans share their information with the government to go after scammers or get their hard-earned benefits, they should be able to count on their data being kept safe.

Elon Musk has no business with our private data. Not at the Consumer Bureau, the VA, or anywhere else.

name: E. Warren
text:
Why does National Institutes of Health funding matter? It‚Äôs the fuel to find cures for:

- Cancer
- Alzheimer‚Äôs
- Cystic Fibrosis
- Pediatric Cancer
- ALS
- MS
- Parkinson‚Äôs

Trump tried to cut it, but thanks to @MassAGO Campbell, a judge blocked the cuts. This is why we fight.

name: E. Warren
text:
The GOP in Congress actually has a plan to raise your bank fees‚Äîstarting with overdraft fees

They‚Äôre siding with big banks

That‚Äôs on top of Trump and DOGE working to eliminate the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau that fights for the middle class

Dems are fighting for you

name: E. Warren
text:
Stephen Feinberg claimed he left the Steward hospital system better than he found it. When I tried to share the facts, I was cut off.

Let's be clear: He treated workers like dirt and left communities without essential medical care. He's should not be Deputy Secretary of Defense.

name: E. Warren
text:
House Republicans just took the first step towards passing their plans to cut health care and hike the cost of groceries for millions of people.

Why? To pay for tax giveaways for billionaires and billionaire corporations.

Working people won't forget this. We need to fight back.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau stands up to big corporations to put $$$ back in the pockets of American consumers by taking on scams and predatory lending. I joined @SenWarren to highlight why this Administration must allow this crucial work to continue.
¬†
¬†Watch:

name: E. Warren
text:
The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau helps Maryland families stand up to massive corporations and delivers necessary financial relief.

So naturally, billionaires Trump and Musk want to get rid of it.

The middle class has become this Administration‚Äôs target. It‚Äôs shameful.

name: E. Warren
text:
America‚Äôs veterans answered the call to serve our nation but now, thanks to the Trump admin's reckless cuts, there's no one to answer those veterans' calls when they need help.

Listen to how one former CFPB employee describes what that means for our veterans and their families.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau keeps scammers, fraudsters and predatory companies in check, protecting you and your hard-earned dollars.

name: E. Warren
text:
While China is stealing our technology and actively undermining American industry, Trump is cracking down more than twice as hard on maple syrup and avocados from Canada and Mexico.

How does that make sense?

name: E. Warren
text: Tariffs are an important strategic economic tool, but Trump‚Äôs desire for a trade war with Canada and Mexico won‚Äôt protect jobs, keep Americans safe, or bring down costs for families.

name: E. Warren
text:
It‚Äôs alarming that Elon Musk has access to government payment systems used to deliver Social Security and Medicare benefits.¬†
¬†
He also drove out the senior career official at Treasury responsible for preventing a potential default on U.S. debt.
¬†
Congress must investigate.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump is scrubbing critical health information from government websites.
  
This is staggeringly stupid, anti-science, and will have real consequences.

name: E. Warren
text:
If President Trump is serious about lowering costs and capping credit card interest rates, he needs a strong CFPB and a strong CFPB Director.
 
If he and Republicans decide to cower to Wall Street billionaires and try to destroy the agency, they will have a fight on their hands.

name: E. Warren
text:
Late Friday night, Donald Trump fired over a dozen independent inspectors general whose job it is to root out government fraud and abuse.

This action will pave the way for widespread corruption.

name: E. Warren
text:
I pressed RFK Jr. on his dangerous conflicts of interest that mean he could profit off an anti-vax lawsuit while head of HHS. Now, he's admitting there's a problem ‚Äî but we have more questions than answers.

RFK Jr.'s nomination must be delayed until these conflicts are resolved.

name: E. Warren
text: Donald Trump is turning his back on our servicemembers ‚Äî and our servicewomen in particular ‚Äî to score political points. It's shameful, and it will only make us less safe.

name: E. Warren
text:
Trump's vision for America has billionaires like Elon Musk on top and everyone else left in the dirt.

We have to push back.

name: E. Warren
text:
It looks like a bribe and a signal to every company that corruption is the name of the game.

After Meta pays to play, what does Mark Zuckerberg expect as a return on this investment?

name: E. Warren
text: Real life matters.

name: E. Warren
text:
For every worker in America, this matters to you.
 
Donald Trump purged the federal government of independent regulators whose job it is to protect working people.

name: E. Warren
text: This plane crash is devastating. My heart is with the families who lost loved ones. I‚Äôm grateful for the emergency responders‚Äô tireless efforts through the night.

name: E. Warren
text:
Seems like we all agree RFK Jr. cannot be the next Secretary of Health and Human Services.

wsj.com/opinion/rfk-jr-senat‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: I want to be clear: gender affirming care remains available in Massachusetts for all who need it. My office and I will continue to enforce our state laws to ensure families can access it without fear of discrimination.

name: E. Warren
text:
Chair Powell is putting jobs at risk and making it more difficult for you to afford a home or pay your credit card bill.

The Fed needs to cut interest rates. President Trump needs to act to lower costs ‚Äì not shut down programs that help families, seniors, and veterans.

name: E. Warren
text: They sweat when they have something to hide - but in plain sight he wouldn't promise to stop cashing in.

name: E. Warren
text:
Hegseth told the Senate he‚Äôd protect the inspector general‚Äôs independence. But after Trump illegally fired the IG, he‚Äôs weaponizing government investigations to go after Gen. Milley.

It‚Äôs a warning sign that Hegseth‚Äôs focused more on political retribution than national security.

name: E. Warren
text:
Howard Lutnick is in deep with crypto company Tether ‚Äî aka ‚Äúoutlaws‚Äô favorite currency.‚Äù

Tether financed North Korean nuclear weapons programs and Russian arms companies. Lutnick and his company made millions.

I have some questions for him.

name: E. Warren
text:
Let's be clear about what happened today: Donald Trump tried to cut a giant chunk of government funding¬†‚Äî hurting preschoolers, seniors, and veterans.

Trump's illegal shutdown is blocked for now ‚Äî but don't forget that he tried to cut programs supporting working families.

name: E. Warren
text:
On top of the shitstorm that was the past 24 hours, Trump illegally gutted the NLRB. 

This move is a terrible sign of what‚Äôs to come. It emboldens his allies (who¬†just happen to lead billion-dollar corporations) to line their pockets at the expense of their employees.

name: E. Warren
text:
President Trump is creating chaos in the housing market ‚Äî threatening cuts to housing programs for families, seniors and veterans.
 
Donald Trump needs to reverse course and not do anything that would raise housing costs for Americans.

name: E. Warren
text:
That's right - we should cut government waste.

But we're seeing Trump and Musk's plan in action: pausing federal funds that rip school lunch away from preschoolers and end Meals on Wheels for seniors. That's not efficiency, it's cruelty.

I have better ideas.

name: E. Warren
text:
I just heard from a nonprofit in Massachusetts that helps veterans with transitional housing.

Trump's shutdown of gov funding hurts their ability to buy and prepare food for 100+ veterans.

Rent is due in 5 days. The loss of funds could mean some veterans face eviction.

name: E. Warren
text:
While President Trump illegally pauses federal funding from Congress, the Senate must not be business as usual.

We do not consent to this lawless power grab.

name: E. Warren
text: I just voted NO on Scott Bessent‚Äôs Treasury Secretary nomination. He is Trump‚Äôs top pick to do the hard work of cutting taxes for every billionaire in America, himself included.

name: E. Warren
text:
When there weren't enough bank examiners on the beat, SVB and Signature Bank failed, requiring big bailouts.
 
The FDIC should explain why it‚Äôs now axing even more examiners whose job it is to make sure big banks don't crash our economy. 

washingtonpost.com/business/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: nbcnews.com/news/us-news/dem‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Has Trump lowered the price of groceries? No. Instead, he's focused on renaming the Gulf of Mexico.

Today, my colleagues and I gave him a list of things he could do right now to start to lower the prices of eggs.

name: E. Warren
text:
Giant banks like JPMorgan and Wells Fargo hiked the cost of loans to make a bigger profit.
 
After pressure, they pledged in front of Congress that they'd pass on higher savings rates to their customers.

Senator Reed and I called on these CEOs to keep their word.

name: E. Warren
text:
It‚Äôs a purge of independent watchdogs in the middle of the night.

Inspectors general are charged with rooting out government waste, fraud, abuse, and preventing misconduct.

President Trump is dismantling checks on his power and paving the way for widespread corruption.

name: E. Warren
text:
Pete Hegseth‚Äôs confirmation will make our nation less safe.

It is a sad and dangerous day when Republican Senators put loyalty to President Trump ahead of our national security.

name: E. Warren
text:
Pete¬†Hegseth¬†is the most unqualified nominee for Secretary of Defense in modern history. 

He should be rejected by the Senate.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Senate just received another report that Pete Hegseth has a pattern of alcohol abuse. 

Confirming him as Secretary of Defense puts our national security at risk.

name: E. Warren
text:
Pete Hegseth admitted to the Senate that he paid $50,000 (!!!) to silence a "Jane Doe" who accused him of rape.

But at his hearing last week, he said he was ‚Äúfalsely accused."

More questions than answers. We can't rush his vote and trust him with our national security.

name: E. Warren
text:
Republicans plan to pay for their billionaire tax cuts by slashing¬†health care for kids, seniors, and people with disabilities.

It‚Äôs robbing working families so the richest Americans can get even richer.

I‚Äôm in the Senate to fight back.

name: E. Warren
E. Warren
text:
The Secretary of Defense has to be ready to go 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
¬†
Pete Hegseth has exercised terrible judgement with alcohol, and we cannot trust him with our national security.
¬†
I hope my Republican colleagues are thinking hard about the choice in front of them.

name: E. Warren
text: nytimes.com/2025/01/23/us/po‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: Republicans in Congress are saying the quiet part out loud: cuts for grandma in the nursing home to fund tax giveaways for billionaires.

name: E. Warren
text: It is common sense and consistent with Committee practice for Chairman Scott to postpone the vote on Scott Turner to be the next Secretary of Housing and Urban Development until his FBI background check is completed.

name: E. Warren
text:
Today, Democrats blocked Republicans‚Äô latest attack on women‚Äôs reproductive freedoms. They want to criminalize doctors and nurses who are using their best judgement during some of the most difficult moments in their patients‚Äô lives.
¬†
This bill is offensive to health care providers, and cruel to women who face pregnancy complications.

name: E. Warren
text:
Today would have marked 52 years of Roe as the law of the land. But Donald Trump packed the Supreme Court with anti-abortion extremists to get it overturned.

This week, he cut off access to reproductiverights.gov.

We must keep fighting for women‚Äôs rights.

name: E. Warren
text:
BREAKING: Senate Democrats just fought off the first anti-choice bill of the Trump Administration.

It‚Äôs only Day 3.

name: E. Warren
text:
Withdrawing from the Paris climate agreement is another gift from Donald Trump to his polluting billionaire donors.

Taking on the climate crisis requires international cooperation, and the world should be able to count on the United States to be in that fight.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Senate just received another report that Pete Hegseth is too drunk and abusive to be our Defense Secretary.

This is not a one off. Report after report of alcohol, assault, harassment. This is a pattern of abuse.

We need answers, not a rushed vote.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump made a lot of promises to lower costs for families. 

What did he say on Day One? Next to nothing about lowering costs.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump does not have the authority to rewrite the Constitution.

@MassAGO Campbell is fighting to protect Massachusetts and hold the line against this giant abuse of power.

name: E. Warren
text: This order is unconstitutional and un-American.

name: E. Warren
text:
I just got back from Donald Trump's inauguration. 

If it's any indication of what Trump's second term will look like, it'll be great for his billionaire donors and giant corporations, and pain and costs for everyone else.

name: E. Warren
text: Big Tech billionaires have a front row seat at Trump's inauguration. They have even better seats than Trump's own cabinet picks. That says it all.

name: E. Warren
text:
RFK Jr. opposed the life-saving Covid vaccine just six months into the pandemic. Peddled anti-science conspiracies. Waffled on women's reproductive rights.

And he wants us to trust him to make health care decisions for Americans? I have serious concerns ‚Äî and 175 questions.

name: E. Warren
text:
My Senate investigation suggests that MOHELA messed up again: its errors may have contributed to 2 million student loan duplicates appearing on credit reports, dropping borrowers‚Äô credit scores through no fault of their own. 

I‚Äôm asking the @CFPB and @usedgov to investigate.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump‚Äôs filling his cabinet with billionaires and industry insiders.
 
If he wants to show that they‚Äôre not just working to line their own pockets, he should start with a strong ethics pledge. theguardian.com/us-news/2025‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: No one should be discriminated against based on their sex. It‚Äôs long past time for women‚Äôs equal rights to be recognized in our Constitution.

name: E. Warren
text:
NEW: @FTC just sued Pepsi for illegal price discrimination‚Äîmaybe why it cost more for you to get a Pepsi at your local corner shop.

For years, Pepsi gave favors to a big box retailer, putting other grocery chains and local convenience stores at a disadvantage. This move is big.

name: E. Warren
text:
Nearly 2,500 people now have a second chance at life.

These sentences were for non-violent drug offenses under outdated laws that ripped apart families and disproportionately harmed communities of color.

This is powerfully important and I will keep fighting for more reforms.

name: E. Warren
text: As Ranking Member of the Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs Committee my focus will be the same as that of all Democrats: We will work to un-rig the economy and make life affordable for working families.

name: E. Warren
text: Is there any billionaire rich enough that Republicans won‚Äôt support a tax cut for? Scott Bessent- Trump‚Äôs billionaire Treasury nominee - says no.

name: E. Warren
text:
The state of our Commonwealth is strong because we invest in our people ‚Äî from housing to childcare to the T. That's made possible by strong leaders like @MassGovernor.

Here's to another year of working together to fight big, important fights for families across Massachusetts.

name: E. Warren
text:
Trump‚Äôs Treasury pick just committed to keeping Direct File around for at least this tax season. Glad we‚Äôre on the same page on this!

@ChrisCoons and I led 140+ lawmakers in pushing him to keep the program so millions of Americans will have a free, easy way to file their taxes.

name: E. Warren
text:
All across the country, housing costs too much. Scott Turner has a limited public record, but if confirmed, he will lead our nation's response to the housing crisis.

I'm here at @SenateBanking to get answers for the American people on his plans to make housing more affordable.

name: E. Warren
text:
I have 180+ questions for Trump's Treasury pick.
 
The Treasury Secretary must safeguard our financial system, ensure the fairness of our tax system, and expand economic opportunities for the middle class ‚Äî not just help rich investors make more money.

name: E. Warren
text:
Elon Musk and DOGE want to create a mobile app for you to file your taxes for free with the IRS.

I led over 140 members of Congress in letting Trump's nominees know that the IRS already has an easy program to file your taxes for free called Direct File. And we should expand it.

name: E. Warren
text:
Capital One has a long history of abusing customers. 

Allowing it to get even bigger by acquiring Discover would subject millions more Americans to these illegal practices. 

Financial regulators need to block this deal.

name: E. Warren
text:
It‚Äôs no surprise that billionaire Jeff Bezos is dumping a million dollars into Trump‚Äôs inauguration.

Trump‚Äôs tax giveaways could hand @Amazon $2.5 billion ‚Äî and working people would foot the bill.
wsj.com/politics/elections/j‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
For over a decade, Pete Hegseth said women shouldn't serve in combat roles.

Then, when Donald Trump nominated him for Secretary of Defense, he changed his tune.

I'm not letting him rewrite history.

name: E. Warren
text: Can you honestly say that Pete Hegseth ‚Äî who said women shouldn‚Äôt serve in combat, who was drunk at work events, who's credibly accused of sexual assault, and who ran a veteran's nonprofit into the ground ‚Äî should be in charge of the Department of Defense?

name: E. Warren
text:
.@SenateBanking Democrats are focused on what Americans have asked for in election after election: unrig the economy to make life more affordable.

If President-elect Trump and Republicans want to actually do that, here's where we can start: wsj.com/opinion/ill-work-wit‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Some much needed good news: The Biden-Harris administration has now canceled student loan debt for over 5 MILLION people.

Four years ago, this seemed impossible. But thanks to our persistence, millions of people have had their lives changed for good.

name: E. Warren
text:
Women make up nearly one in five members of our military - serving on the frontlines. But Pete Hegseth, Trump‚Äôs nominee for Secretary of Defense, doesn‚Äôt believe women in the military should serve in combat roles.

That's a national security risk.

name: E. Warren
text:
America is in the middle of a full-blown housing crisis. Now more than ever, we need a strong, capable leader at @HUDgov who will cut costs for families.
 
I‚Äôm asking Scott Turner 75 questions to get to the bottom of his record and views.

name: E. Warren
text:
This was all too real with Steward in our state: private equity companies are vampires, sucking out value from our health care system and funneling it to their investors. And patients suffer.

This is a great report, and I have a bill to stop private equity's abusive practices.

name: E. Warren
text:
If you hate filing your taxes, you'll love this: the IRS is making it even easier to get your refund!

The IRS's program, Direct File, will let people file their taxes online, for free with the IRS, and now that process is even easier.

name: E. Warren
text:
Trump picked Pete Hegseth to be his Secretary of Defense - a guy with a track record of being so drunk at work events that he needed to be carried out on multiple occasions.
 
Can we really count on calling Hegseth at 2AM to make life and death national security decisions? Nope.

name: E. Warren
text:
Whether you walk, bike, drive, or take the T, this big investment will make travel safer and more reliable, connect neighborhoods, and make our infrastructure more sustainable. 

I'll keep fighting to bring home investments like these for our communities in the Commonwealth.

name: E. Warren
text:
This analysis confirms that working people should be on high alert for Trump's tax plan that overwhelmingly benefits the wealthy. 

Republicans in Congress are already scheming how to pay for these billionaire handouts with painful cuts to health care services like Medicaid.

name: E. Warren
text: Just like the first time around, Donald Trump is inheriting an economy with strong job growth.

name: E. Warren
text:
Big Tech corporations are lining up to sponsor Donald Trump‚Äôs inauguration.

You better believe these CEOs expect a return on their investment.

Trump has promised tax breaks for his "rich as hell" donors - while everyone else foots the bill.

name: E. Warren
text: Democrats weren‚Äôt elected to roll over and play dead. We‚Äôre ready to fight back for working families.

name: E. Warren
text:
Trump tapped Billy Long to head up the IRS. But Long‚Äôs only tax experience seems to¬†be as an aggressive salesman for a fraud-riddled tax credit.
¬†
I have questions. cbsnews.com/news/trump-billy‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
The labor movement is strong, it‚Äôs resilient, and now, it‚Äôs united to build even more worker power.

When workers fight, workers win!

name: E. Warren
text:
Unimaginable loss. Parents fighting to keep their kids safe from smoke. Homes engulfed in flames.

I‚Äôm grateful for the tireless work of our firefighters and first responders. Long term, we must do more to protect communities and stop the climate crisis from taking even more.

name: E. Warren
text:
Regulators like @NHTSAgov exist to keep people safe, not to protect corporations. That only works if they follow the facts and conduct unbiased investigations ‚Äî in this case, into Tesla.
 
What happens now that Tesla CEO Elon Musk is Trump's right-hand man?

name: E. Warren
text:
Giant corporate landlords are allegedly scamming renters by using algorithms and sensitive data to jack up rent costs.
 
I investigated and asked the Justice Department to act. 

Now, this expanded lawsuit holds these landlords accountable for putting profits over people.

name: E. Warren
text:
Pete Hegseth is the most unqualified Defense Secretary nominee in US history.

-Mismanaged a veteran's nonprofit into the ground
-Reports of public intoxication at work
-Accused of rape
-Thinks women can't serve in combat

How can we trust him to protect our national security?

name: E. Warren
text:
No one should have their credit ruined because of a medical emergency or billing mistakes. 

The @CFPB is saving Americans money and making sure medical bills don‚Äôt stand in the way of people getting car, home, and small business loans ‚Äî a big win.
 cnn.com/2025/01/07/business/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Trump pardoning the insurrectionists who attacked our Capitol four years ago would be a betrayal of the American people.
¬†
Many of the rioters were convicted of assaulting police and other serious crimes ‚Äî including by Trump-appointed judges. They must be held accountable.

name: E. Warren
text: A huge win for 3 million of our teachers and firefighters, police officers and postal workers who will finally get the full Social Security benefits they‚Äôve earned.

name: E. Warren
text:
.@AnnTelnaes resigned after the Washington Post editorial page killed her cartoon. It‚Äôs worth a share.

Big Tech executives are bending the knee to Donald Trump and it‚Äôs no surprise why: Billionaires like Jeff Bezos like paying a lower tax rate than a public school teacher.

name: E. Warren
text: üéØ

name: E. Warren
text: It‚Äôs no secret why Apple‚Äôs CEO is sucking up to Donald Trump: Republicans are planning more corporate tax cuts that would give Apple an extra $2.7 billion in handouts.

name: E. Warren
text:
.@POTUS's move to block this deal puts American manufacturing first, protects our national security, and stops executives from selling out steelworkers for a fat payout.
 
As this plays out, U.S. Steel must uphold its commitments to the steelworkers that built our country.

name: E. Warren
text:
EasyKnock deceived countless families into selling their homes, turned them into renters, and then ripped the rug out from under them as they tried to get back on their feet.

I‚Äôm ringing the alarm so people can be on alert for these housing scams. npr.org/2024/12/17/nx-s1-523‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Millions of consumers have been ripped off, but Zelle and the banks that run it have refused to stop the fraud or accept responsibility.
