This is exactly why we need a strong CFPB ‚Äì to protect middle-class consumers when the big banks won‚Äôt.

name: E. Warren
text:
Last night should‚Äôve been a celebration. Instead, people ringing in the new year were targeted in a horrific act of terrorism. 

My heart is with the victims, their loved ones, and all of New Orleans today.

name: E. Warren
text:
Our troops are having seizures and dying by suicide because of brain injuries from firing their own weapons.

I wrote a bill to protect our troops from these blasts and Congress passed major reforms from my bill.

Our work doesn't stop here, but it's a good first step.

name: E. Warren
text: Jimmy Carter was a true public servant and peacemaker. Our country is a better place because of him. My thoughts are with his family.

name: E. Warren
text:
New year, new ways to save money.

Starting in 2025, people across the country no longer have to hand their money over to TurboTax to file their taxes.

Instead, you can file your taxes online, for free with the IRS.

See if you're eligible at directfile.irs.gov

name: E. Warren
text:
BIG WIN: If you or a loved one have asthma, you may see the price of your inhaler go down. 

I‚Äôve sounded the alarm about companies like Teva rigging the patent system to keep the price of inhalers high.

The @FTC is fighting to bring your health care costs down, and winning.

name: E. Warren
text:
Big car companies are making it harder for people to get their car fixed at a local, independent shop ‚Äì a tactic that lets them jack up the repair price and sell your data for an extra buck.

We‚Äôre pushing these automakers to stop ripping Americans off. theverge.com/2024/12/20/2432‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
E. Warren
text:
Thanks to the teachers and firefighters, police officers and postal workers, and 
everyone who stood up and raised their voice, we made change.

~3 million public servants will get their full Social Security benefits that they earned.

We fought hard and got it done.

name: E. Warren
text:
This is a smart move by Leader Jeffries. 

Let's get rid of the debt limit once and for all.

President-elect Trump wants to eliminate it, so next year is our next best chance to shake things up and get it done.

name: E. Warren
text:
Billionaires think they can get away with anything. But delivery drivers and warehouse workers are standing up to Jeff Bezos this week by launching the biggest strike against Amazon in U.S. history.

Amazon Teamsters: I‚Äôm with you all the way.

name: E. Warren
text: Here's what this means: Republicans are plotting to cut health care for seniors and veterans to grease the wheels for tax cuts for giant corporations and billionaires like Elon Musk.

name: E. Warren
text: We now know what it looks like when Elon Musk calls for ‚Äúgovernment efficiency.‚Äù For starters? Cuts to funding for child cancer research. I wish I were making that up.

name: E. Warren
text: A two-year increase in the debt limit to grease the wheels for Donald Trump and Congressional Republicans' tax handouts for billionaires is a terrible deal.

name: E. Warren
text: I agree with President-elect Trump that Congress should terminate the debt limit and never again govern by hostage taking.

name: E. Warren
text:
Pete Hegseth's lack of experience is one thing.

But to say our brave servicewomen who are willing to serve in combat‚Äîand meet the same standards as men‚Äîmake our military weaker?

It‚Äôs yet another reason proving he's unqualified to be Secretary of Defense.

We demand answers. 1/2

name: E. Warren
text:
Corporate profits are higher than ever, but workers‚Äô salaries have barely moved.

It‚Äôs time to stand up for working people and hold big corporations responsible for decisions that hurt workers and consumers while lining shareholders‚Äô pockets.
theguardian.com/us-news/2024‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
I‚Äôve got news for Donald Trump: @USPS isn‚Äôt for sale. 

It‚Äôs a public good that‚Äôs supposed to serve Americans in every corner of the country ‚Äî not boost some billionaire‚Äôs bottom line.

name: E. Warren
text:
Elon Musk owns SpaceX, Tesla, and X, and is a major government contractor. As ‚Äúco-president,‚Äù he can steer billions of federal dollars toward his own companies.
 
How can we be sure what he's whispering to Trump is good for the country ‚Äì not just good for himself?

name: E. Warren
text:
Just a reminder that in 2019, RFK Jr.'s anti-vaccine misinformation campaign helped cause a measles outbreak in Samoa that killed 83 people, mostly kids. 

Do you really want him to lead the Department of Health and Human Services?

name: E. Warren
text:
When you‚Äôre shopping for a hotel room or making plans to attend a concert, you should know the full price up front.

These bait-and-switch traps to trick you into paying more must end.

The Biden administration agrees. The FTC and @linakhanFTC are fighting back to save you money.

name: E. Warren
text:
Candidate Trump promised to lower grocery prices,¬†but now it seems he¬†isn't even going to try.

While champagne corks pop at Mar-a-Lago, President-elect Trump says that he can't really lower grocery prices because it's "very hard."

Sad. It‚Äôs the start of a broken promise.

name: E. Warren
E. Warren
text: Say goodbye to your smile and say hello to polio - that's what's on the horizon if Robert F. Kennedy Jr. becomes the Secretary of Health and Human Services.

name: E. Warren
text:
Southern Glazer's, the largest distributor of wine and spirits, may have charged mom & pop shops MORE than big chain stores. That means you pay more when you shop at your local grocer.

@FTC is enforcing a law against illegal price discrimination.

name: E. Warren
text:
Not only did Navient push predatory student loans onto people attending fraudulent for-profit colleges‚Äînow, they're rejecting 80% of borrowers who apply for relief.
 
I‚Äôm calling on @CFPB and @FTC to ensure Navient cancels debts for all cheated borrowers.
businessinsider.com/student-‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
So Donald Trump won't lower prices for hard working people, but he will give his rich friends on Wall Street another handout.

Got it.

name: E. Warren
text:
As storms devastate communities from coast to coast, families have been denied housing assistance because they lack proper documentation to prove ownership or residency. 

My bill will make it easier for survivors to get disaster assistance.

name: E. Warren
text:
I stood out in the rain with our police officers, firefighters, and teachers who are fighting back to get the Social Security they earned.

Today, thanks to their hard word, @SenSchumer has agreed to bring a vote to the floor to fix this.

Fair is fair. Let's get this done.

name: E. Warren
text:
Let‚Äôs talk about Direct File.

It‚Äôs a free, easy way for people to file their taxes directly online with IRS.

You keep your tax refund ‚Äî rather than paying $150 to a sleazy tax prep company.

It‚Äôs more efficient!

But these Republicans want you to keep wasting money on TurboTax.

name: E. Warren
text:
PBMs have manipulated the market to enrich themselves ‚Äî hiking up drug costs, cheating employers, and driving small pharmacies out of business. 

My new bipartisan bill with Sen. @HawleyMO will rein in these middlemen.

name: E. Warren
text: BIG NEWS: Today, a federal judge blocked grocery giant Kroger‚Äôs $24.6 billion effort to merge with Albertsons and create the biggest supermarket merger in U.S. history ‚Äì a move that could've led to serious grocery price increases.

name: E. Warren
text:
If you shop at Kroger or Albertsons, the FTC just stopped your grocery prices from surging higher.

FTC Chair @linakhanFTC is showing what it looks like for the government to work for working people.

name: E. Warren
text: Misconstrued? Pete Hegseth has been crystal clear: he doesn't think women in the military belong in combat and now he's trying to cover up his dangerous views.

name: E. Warren
text:
The @DeptofDefense awards billions in AI and cloud computing contracts to a few huge companies. All our eggs are in one giant Silicon Valley basket.
 
My new bill ensures that DoD is making good deals that keep our data secure and our government resilient. washingtonpost.com/politics/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump‚Äôs family business shouldn‚Äôt be able to rake in foreign dollars while he sits in the Oval Office.
 
This is just common sense. How could anyone ‚Äî Democrat or Republican ‚Äî disagree? nytimes.com/2024/12/05/us/po‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Health care workers do so much to care for our communities.

I‚Äôm standing with the interns and residents at Mass General Brigham fighting for a fair contract, and I encourage both parties to keep coming to the table and bargaining in good faith so patients get the care they need.

name: E. Warren
text:
Tl;dr on Pete Hegseth, Trump's pick for the Department of Defense:

- Accused of raping a woman. Forced her silence with an NDA.
- Preyed on female staff and attended work events drunk.
- Ran a veterans nonprofit so far into debt they nearly went bankrupt.

This is disqualifying.

name: E. Warren
text:
If the IRS keeps going after the wealthy tax cheats abusing just this one loophole, that‚Äôll save $100 billion over the next decade.
 
Republicans want to defund the IRS and put a commissioner in place who will go after you ‚Äî not the billionaires skirting taxes.

name: E. Warren
text: Long has zero relevant experience for this critical management role and this pick ‚Äî along with the unprecedented firing of the current commissioner ‚Äî should set off alarm bells about the weaponization of the tax agency.

name: E. Warren
text:
Billy Long‚Äôs nomination is bad news for middle-class taxpayers and a win for ultra-wealthy tax cheats.

If he‚Äôs confirmed, you can expect longer wait times for customer service, a more complicated process to file taxes, and free rein for the rich to rig the system at our expense.

name: E. Warren
text:
I joined Bluesky! I hear it‚Äôs a good place to talk about taxing the rich, breaking up big tech, and ending Washington corruption.
bsky.app/profile/senwarren.b‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
In 2023, over 29,000 active-duty troops were sexually assaulted, including more than 6 in every 100 women in the military.

Many servicemembers never report these crimes. The rates of assault are estimated to be up to 4x higher.

Pete Hegseth must not be the Defense Secretary.

name: E. Warren
text:
Right now, it's perfectly legal for a worker with a disability to be paid pennies on the dollar for doing exactly the same job as a worker without a disability.

The subminimum wage is unfair, it‚Äôs inhumane, and @USDOL is working to put an end to it once and for all.

name: E. Warren
text:
Trump threatened to weaponize the U.S. military against other Americans. 

Just take a moment to think about how dangerous that is.

While still in office, @POTUS must do everything he can to prevent the military from being used against the American people.

name: E. Warren
text:
In America, companies known as "data brokers" scrape and slurp up massive amounts of data on us without our knowledge or consent.

Today, @CFPB proposed a rule to prevent these companies from selling sensitive personal data to scammers, stalkers, & spies. wired.com/story/cfpb-fcra-da‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: In other words, Trump's pick to run the Department of Defense is a predator who couldn't even manage a small nonprofit.

name: E. Warren
text:
But this nomination is an early test: will Trump stand with workers or bow down to his corporate donors and the Republican establishment‚Äôs opposition?

And if Republican Senators block her for standing with unions, it'll show that the party‚Äôs support for workers is all talk.

name: E. Warren
text:
I'm going to hold Trump‚Äôs feet to the fire for working people, but if Lori Chavez-DeRemer commits to strengthening unions, she's a strong candidate to lead the @USDOL.

It‚Äôs a big deal that she's one of the few Republicans who has endorsed the PRO Act. huffpost.com/entry/elizabeth‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Good news: I just voted to confirm Brian Murphy as our newest federal judge in Massachusetts!

Judge Murphy started as a public defender in Worcester, and he's led with humanity and a deep commitment to delivering justice ever since. He'll be an outstanding addition to the bench.

name: E. Warren
text:
I talked with @LizShuler of the @AFLCIO about Donald Trump's tax plan.

Spoiler: It's great for the billionaires and giant corporations, and it's not great for workers and everyone else.

name: E. Warren
text:
If a high-ranking government nominee is in the pocket of a foreign government, the American people deserve to know about it. 

My new bill will guarantee Congress will know if nominees were on foreign payrolls.

name: E. Warren
text:
Taxpayers are getting tricked and trapped into paying junk fees just to get their tax refunds.
 
Filing your taxes should be free. Period. That‚Äôs why the IRS is offering Direct File to 30 million Americans next year. washingtonpost.com/business/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Congrats to @UMassAmherst for being chosen as one of just a handful of marching bands to play in this year‚Äôs Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade.

Go Minutemen ‚Äî¬†you make Massachusetts proud!

name: E. Warren
text:
We need to legalize marijuana. And in the meantime, we need to do everything we can to repair the harms of an unjust war on drugs.
 
@POTUS has made good progress, but I'm pushing him to do even more before the end of his term. rollingstone.com/politics/po‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: The reliance on private donors to fund the transition is nothing more than a ploy for well-connected Trump insiders to line their pockets while pretending to save taxpayers money.

name: E. Warren
text:
This announcement fails to answer key questions about national security threats and FBI vetting of nominees, and increases concerns about corruption.

There appear to be serious gaps between the Trump transition‚Äôs ethics agreement and the letter of the law.

name: E. Warren
text: I look forward to learning more about Turner‚Äôs views on how to address the housing crisis and will review his record with an objective and open mind ahead of his confirmation hearing.

name: E. Warren
text:
A good HUD Secretary must be serious about building more housing, taking on predatory corporations, and lowering costs for families.

If Turner implements Trump‚Äôs Project 2025 plans, it'll be a disaster for first-time home buyers and working people struggling to afford rent.

name: E. Warren
text:
Trump Transition's delay in signing agreements, publishing a comprehensive ethics pledge, and starting FBI background checks is dangerous.

The 9/11 Commission found the delayed presidential transition in 2000 may have contributed to security gaps leading to the terrorist attack.

name: E. Warren
text: I do not know if Mr. Bessent will transfer his loyalty from Wall Street investors to America‚Äôs workers, but I am willing to work with anyone to advance the interests of working families.

name: E. Warren
text:
I‚Äôve been a fierce critic of Fed Chair Powell‚Äôs interest rate hikes and lack of transparency, but I‚Äôve never questioned that it is his job to make those decisions.

It‚Äôd be a serious error for the Trump admin to interfere with the Fed‚Äôs independence, as Mr. Bessent has suggested.

name: E. Warren
text: A Treasury Secretary must safeguard our financial system, ensure the fairness of our tax system, and expand economic opportunities for the middle class, particularly around housing affordability.

name: E. Warren
text:
Wall Street may be breathing a sigh of relief at Scott Bessent‚Äôs nomination, but working people see no help coming their way. 

Bessent‚Äôs expertise is helping rich investors make more money, not cutting costs for families squeezed by corporate profiteering.

name: E. Warren
text:
Last time around, Trump talked a big game about his tariffs. But then he handed out exemptions to Russian oligarchs, industry insiders, and giant foreign corporations.

How can we trust him to help American workers when he failed so badly last time? cnn.com/2018/10/31/politics/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump talks tough on tariffs, but he has a long record of corrupt giveaways to his ‚Äúrich-as-hell‚Äù donors.

He and his billionaire nominees need to explain to working people why this time is any different. nytimes.com/2024/11/23/us/po‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump lied through his teeth to pretend he had nothing to do with Project 2025.

But Trump named the lead architect of Project 2025 to oversee the budget office.

He doesn‚Äôt want you to see this news on the Friday night before Thanksgiving.

We‚Äôll hold them accountable.

name: E. Warren
text:
Have you gotten a surprisingly expensive vet bill lately?

That‚Äôs because Wall Street and corporations like Mars (yes, the candy company) know you‚Äôll do anything for your pet, so they buy up clinics and squeeze you for every last cent.

Bailey and I are fighting back.

name: E. Warren
text:
It‚Äôs time to break up Google‚Äôs monopoly.

A federal judge ruled the company illegally controls the search market. @AAGKanter‚Äôs proposal will make sure Google can‚Äôt use products like Chrome and Android to illegally crush competitors and limit consumer choice.

name: E. Warren
text:
If Donald Trump really wants to take on the credit card industry, count me in. 

The CFPB will back him up.

name: E. Warren
text: .@SenWarren: "The Trump tax cut for billionaires & billionaire corporations alone would have been big enough to build 3 million new homes and lower rents by 10% nationwide, to cut childcare costs for most families to $10/day & to invest in paid leave for all American workers."

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and Congressional Republicans have made perfectly clear that they are planning another huge tax giveaway to billionaires and billionaire corporations.

The tax fight is starting now, and I'm leading a Senate hearing to fight back. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1djGXrnkw‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump picked an unqualified, billionaire wrestling mogul to lead the Department of Education.

This is an insult to our teachers and to every kid in America who relies on a good public school education.

name: E. Warren
text:
Trump‚Äôs pick of a Wall Street CEO for Commerce Secretary is a win for the billionaire class at the expense of working people.

The across-the-board tariff plan is a distraction from the MAGA scam to extend tax giveaways for giant corporations and billionaires like Howard Lutnick.

name: E. Warren
text:
Running Medicare and Medicaid for over 100 million Americans isn't like hosting a daytime talk show.

Dr. Oz is another rich guy who doesn't care if your health care costs go up or an insurance company denies you coverage. These decisions have life and death consequences.

name: E. Warren
text:
At a time when people ‚Äî especially young people ‚Äî are disheartened by the state of politics, we need to shake things up more than ever to meet people where they are.

There is no one better to lead Democrats into the future of messaging than @RepMaxwellFrost.

name: E. Warren
text:
It‚Äôs nearly midnight and the Senate is STILL on the floor voting to advance fair and independent judges.

This is our constitutional duty ‚Äî and it‚Äôs a check and balance on the Trump admin's future lawlessness.

name: E. Warren
text:
BREAKING NEWS: Trump wants to strip health care from poor people and increase grocery bills.

Here's the new Republican plan to pass tax giveaways for Trump's billionaire backers and giant corporations on the backs off struggling Americans.

Democrats must unite and fight back.

name: E. Warren
text:
While still in charge of the Senate, we need to put safeguards in place to uphold our laws.

That means confirming fair judges and regulators that can't be removed by the next President.

Senate Democrats should not rest until we get this done.

name: E. Warren
text:
This ruling is an insult to the hard work of millions of Americans. If you work overtime, you deserve overtime pay.

That‚Äôs what the Biden admin fought to make real. But a Trump-appointed judge sided with big business.

Will the incoming Trump admin right this wrong?

name: E. Warren
text: Gloria Fox was one of the trailblazers who made trails possible for others. Her legacy will go on in the service of all the people who followed in her footsteps. My deepest sympathies are with her friends and family.

name: E. Warren
text:
Private equity got us into this Steward mess ‚Äî and we can't let that happen again. 

I'm pushing hard to prevent yet another private equity firm from preying on Massachusetts patients and providers, and from using taxpayer dollars to line the pockets of corporate executives.

name: E. Warren
text: Today, the @CFPB announced that it will enforce the @FTC's Click-to-Cancel Rule against financial companies that illegally create an obstacle course to cancel a subscription.

name: E. Warren
text:
RFK Jr. poses a danger to public health, scientific research, medicine, and health care coverage for millions.

He wants to stop parents from protecting their babies from measles and his ideas would welcome the return of polio.

I have a lot of questions for his Senate hearing.

name: E. Warren
text:
If we learned anything from Trump's presidency, it's that he uses his power to enrich himself and his buddies.

That's why on Day One of his term, it's important that we'll have a government ethics chief in place who serves the American people, not Trump's wallet.

name: E. Warren
text:
We have 50 days left to do everything we can on behalf of the American people.

This is our final window to confirm independent judges who will make decisions based on the law - not for special interests.

Senate Democrats cannot leave a single judge behind.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Office of Government Efficiency is off to a great start with split leadership:  two people to do the work of one person.  

Yeah, this seems REALLY efficient.

name: E. Warren
text:
A Fox & Friends weekend co-host is not qualified to be the Secretary of Defense.

I lead the Senate military personnel panel. All three of my brothers served in uniform. I respect every one of our servicemembers.

Donald Trump‚Äôs pick will make us less safe and must be rejected.

name: E. Warren
text: Army Special Forces veteran Dennis Hernandez had to seek help outside the VA to get treatment he needed for traumatic brain injuries. Sen. Elizabeth Warren, D-Massachusetts, has introduced a bipartisan bill to help vets like him. on.necn.com/DAqsOxn

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and his transition team are already breaking the law.

I would know because I wrote the law.

Incoming presidents are required to prevent conflicts of interest and sign an ethics agreement.

This is what illegal corruption looks like.¬†cnn.com/2024/11/09/politics/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
There are many unknowns about exactly how a second Trump term will play out and precisely which types of chaos it will bring about. 

One thing is certain: it will start with tax cuts for Musk and his billionaire boys club. My latest for @RollingStone. 

rollingstone.com/politics/po‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: From @SenWarren: "To everyone who feels like their heart has been ripped out of their chest, I feel the same. To everyone who is afraid of what happens next, I share your fears. But what we do next is important, and I need you in this fight with me" ti.me/3YWcu0d

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and Mitch McConnell stole two seats on the Supreme Court to overturn Roe v. Wade.

Now, women in states with abortion bans are being told to hemorrhage in the parking lot until they‚Äôre closer to death before they can get emergency abortion care.

We must fight back.

name: E. Warren
text:
1. Today @USDA announced an end to school lunch junk fees for low-income families.

This follows a @CFPB report showing that school lunch payment platforms collectively charge families upwards of $100 million in fees per year: consumerfinance.gov/about-us‚Ä¶
usda.gov/media/press-release‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Housing is for families, not for corporations.

Democrats are fighting to crack down on corporate vultures and lower your housing costs.

name: E. Warren
text:
Don‚Äôt be fooled: Donald Trump and Republicans in Congress are coming for IVF.

If you don‚Äôt believe me, ask Senate Republicans why they blocked IVF protections not once, but TWICE this year.

name: E. Warren
text:
Why won‚Äôt Republicans talk about price gouging?

Because they‚Äôre not doing anything about it. They‚Äôve let big corporations squeeze families for decades, and they‚Äôre not going to stop now.

name: E. Warren
text: This is your daily reminder that Donald Trump is responsible for overturning Roe v. Wade.

name: E. Warren
text:
Think about a patient whose water breaks too early, before the pregnancy is viable. She's at high risk for infection, or worse, sepsis.

In states with Trump abortion bans, her doctor can‚Äôt intervene until she‚Äôs on death‚Äôs door.

It doesn‚Äôt have to be this way.

name: E. Warren
text:
When giant hedge funds and big banks took down our economy and put pension funds at risk, Democrats stepped up to protect nearly 1.4 million workers and retirees.

And I‚Äôll keep fighting so everyone can count on the retirement funds they earned.
bostonherald.com/2024/10/31/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
How many more mothers need to die before Republican lawmakers understand the consequences of extremist abortion bans?

Democrats will keep fighting to restore the protections of Roe vs. Wade so that what happened to Josseli never happens again.

name: E. Warren
text: I'm all in on West-East Rail to get people in Massachusetts traveling faster and safer. With this grant, we're working to get that done.

name: E. Warren
text:
Thanks to @CopyrightOffice, McDonald‚Äôs franchisees now have the right to repair their own ice cream machines. 

In March @FTC filed a comment in support of this change, and we‚Äôll keep using our tools to protect people‚Äôs right to repair. 

ftc.gov/news-events/news/pre‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
We need to use every tool to combat the opioid epidemic and protect families. 

I‚Äôm asking @USTreasury and @DHSgov to use their authority to close this dangerous loophole.

name: E. Warren
text:
It's a no brainer that your birth control should be covered by your health insurance.

I worked with the Biden-Harris admin to expand cost-free birth control options for millions of women. This is a big deal.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump did this.
 
Make no mistake: Democrats will keep fighting to keep extremist politicians out of these gut-wrenching, personal decisions.

name: E. Warren
text:
It's dystopic: Tech companies are selling people's location data, including trips to abortion clinics, to law enforcement.

Because of Trump, 20+ states have restricted abortion, and they could use this to track patients down.

I have a bill to protect this data. We must pass it.

name: E. Warren
text:
I beat the big airlines and passed a bipartisan bill guaranteeing you a cash refund when your flight is canceled.

These new protections for travelers are one more way the Biden-Harris admin is saving people time and money.

Great news ahead of the holiday travel!

name: E. Warren
text:
The Project 2025 agenda is disastrous for women who need abortion care AND for women trying to grow their families through IVF.  

We must protect the right to access comprehensive reproductive health care.

name: E. Warren
text: All parents deserve access to high-quality, affordable child care.

name: E. Warren
text:
Clearing the work permit backlog means more migrants will be able to work, get out of the shelter system, and provide for their families. 

That makes their lives better, our economy stronger ‚Äì and it‚Äôs just the right thing to do.

name: E. Warren
text:
This apology from @POTUS is a historic step toward long-overdue accountability.

By publicly acknowledging the truth, we're supporting Native communities in healing from this unimaginable trauma and helping heal Federal-Tribal relations.

name: E. Warren
text:
Newsflash: Holding greedy corporations accountable works.

Together, we can stop these big businesses from price gouging us. Enough is enough.

name: E. Warren
text:
Shocker: The CEO of @Intuit (owner of TurboTax) doesn‚Äôt want you to know that they're lobbying to make your life harder ‚Äì so much so that they asked a podcast to delete part of his interview.

Give me a break. 

Whether he likes it or not, the IRS is expanding free Direct File.

name: E. Warren
text:
Want to know why housing costs are so high? Well, here's one reason: Private equity firms like KKR are gobbling up thousands of apartment units and raising rents on families to rake in profits.
 
I'm sounding the alarm. nbcnews.com/news/senators-ta‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: We all just want a government that works ‚Äì not for the billionaires ‚Äì but for working people.

name: E. Warren
text:
Parents spend an average of $11,582 a year on child care. That‚Äôs for one kid. 

Families should not have to spend that much on quality care for their babies.

How do we solve this? Federal investments in child care and child care workers.

name: E. Warren
text:
Big Techü§ù Wall Street

Trying to rip off consumers

Not on the @CFPB's watch.

name: E. Warren
text:
Why is it so hard to cancel your recurring subscriptions? This is why.

While the Biden-Harris administration is trying to save you money, corporations are aiming to team up with Donald Trump-appointed judges to make your life worse.

name: E. Warren
text:
You're telling me that when big corporations got massive tax cuts from Donald Trump, the money didn't trickle down?

Nothing has ever trickled down.

name: E. Warren
text:
McDonald‚Äôs is squeezing customers to make massive profits, paying out billions to their shareholders, and then blaming inflation for high costs.

Fast food should be about making life easier for Americans, not a fast payout for McDonalds‚Äô executives and Wall Street shareholders.

name: E. Warren
text:
To solve our nation‚Äôs housing crisis, we need to build more housing.

That‚Äôs why I have a plan to build nearly 3 million housing units over the next decade. My bill will lower rents by 10% for American families. That‚Äôs how we make sure everyone has a place to call home.

name: E. Warren
text: When billionaires don‚Äôt pay their taxes it falls on hardworking Americans to pick up the tab. Somebody has to keep this country running ‚Äì and it shouldn‚Äôt have to fall on our teachers, nurses, and firefighters.

name: E. Warren
text:
Corporate greed is a big reason that prices have gone up. 

This is true at the grocery store and the gas pump.

We need to crack down on corporations and bring costs down.

name: E. Warren
text:
The two visions of government couldn't be more different.

Trump's abortion bans caused more infants to die in the arms of their parents.

The Biden-Harris admin's actions protect and expand reproductive rights.

name: E. Warren
text:
Investing in child care will lower costs for families AND raise the wages of child care workers across America.

That‚Äôs a win-win.

name: E. Warren
text:
It's simple: No matter where you live, you deserve clean drinking water. 

Thanks to the Biden-Harris Administration's landmark rule ‚Äî and $50M in federal funds I helped bring home ‚Äî we're working to replace dangerous lead pipes and keep families safe across Massachusetts.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Patriot State, a brand new ship, just arrived in Massachusetts to train the next generation of cadets!

It was great to join the Massachusetts Maritime Academy with @USRepKeating to celebrate its arrival.

name: E. Warren
text: You bet I have a bill for that.

name: E. Warren
text: Thank you, Joe!

name: E. Warren
text:
Every day, 134 women become pregnant by rape in states with total abortion bans, compelling many of them to carry forced pregnancies. It's cruel beyond words.

I want to be clear: Donald Trump did this.
americanprogressaction.org/a‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
John Deere blocks farmers from fixing their own equipment, costing American farmers billions of dollars per year, while Deere has raked in a 270% increase in profit since 2020.

John Deere shouldn‚Äôt force farmers to wait on them for weeks while their livelihoods suffer.

name: E. Warren
text:
Higher education should be a pathway to economic opportunity ‚Äî not a lifetime of debt.

Since President Biden and I took office, over one million teachers, nurses, first responders, and other public service workers have received student debt cancellation.

In total, our Administration has forgiven over $170 billion in student debt for nearly five million Americans ‚Äî more than any administration in history.

name: E. Warren
text:
This is why we dream big and fight hard.

Before @POTUS Biden took office, this program had cancelled student debt for only 7,000 public service workers.
 
Now, over 1 million public servants have received relief because the Biden-Harris Administration turned this program around.

name: E. Warren
text:
1. Too often, businesses make people jump through endless hoops just to cancel a subscription.

Today @FTC finalized a rule requiring that businesses make it as easy to cancel a subscription as it is to sign up for one. 

ftc.gov/news-events/news/pre‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Grateful to hear about the work our leaders are doing to help communities like Plymouth recover from the opioid crisis.

As communities now turn to healing from this deadly overdose crisis, we‚Äôll keep fighting to hold the companies that fueled it accountable.

name: E. Warren
text:
No more searching for how to cancel your subscriptions.

Today, the FTC finalized a "Click-to-Cancel" rule to make it as easy to cancel a subscription as it is to sign up for one.

Thank you, @linakhanFTC!

name: E. Warren
text:
6. Now that Medicare can negotiate drug prices, a number of high-priced drug costs will come down starting in 2026.

These changes are a big deal and will save seniors a lot of money. But make no mistake: I'll keep working to bring costs down even more.

name: E. Warren
text:
4. We've taken on the drug manufacturers that are increasing their prices faster than inflation. That's right - no more price gouging.

5. We've expanded the "Extra Help" program, allowing low-income Medicare enrollees to save even more on prescription drugs.

name: E. Warren
text:
1. We've capped monthly out-of-pocket costs for insulin at $35.

2. If you're enrolled in Medicare Part D, we're capping your out-of-pocket costs at $2,000/year.

3. All recommended vaccines are free: no out-of-pocket costs at all.

name: E. Warren
text:
PSA: Medicare open enrollment begins this week!

I've worked hard to lower health costs, and now, Massachusetts seniors will save over $170 million on prescription drugs when they choose their Medicare Part D plan for 2025. Here's how. üßµ
bostonherald.com/2024/10/15/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: If you have ever lost time and money because companies made it really hard to cancel recurring subscriptions, you should know that the Biden-Harris Administration and the FTC are ending that once and for all.

name: E. Warren
text:
Americans already pay far too much for drugs, and this deal could jack up prices even more for life-changing medications like Ozempic and Wegovy. 

I‚Äôm asking @FTC to take a closer look and block the deal if it hurts competition in violation of the law. reuters.com/markets/deals/us‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Anyone denying climate change is contributing to the problem instead of the solution.

Denying reality will not change reality.
nytimes.com/2024/10/09/clima‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
BIG NEWS: We secured a $470 million grant ‚Äì the largest ever federal award for the T.

This will be a game-changer for the thousands of riders who pass through North Station every day.

I‚Äôll keep fighting to bring federal investments like this one back home to Massachusetts.

name: E. Warren
E. Warren
text:
A private equity firm bought Steward Health Care, sold the land from under the hospitals, and walked away with a fat profit while the hospitals failed and workers & patients suffered.

This PE game plan is happening across the U.S. It's legal looting and I have a bill to stop it.

name: E. Warren
text: LIVE: GM Eng, @MassGovernor, @MassDOT Sec, @SenWarren, @SenMarkey, @MayorWu, MBTA board members, and state officials, celebrate $472 million federal grant - the T‚Äôs largest award to date - for @MBTA_CR‚Äôs North Station Draw One Bridge Replacement Project. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1mnxeAjVe‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Regulators have put Citibank on the hook again and again for multiple failures, including fraud and failing to protect customer deposits.

After years of Citi refusing to change, I‚Äôm calling on @USOCC to protect consumers and consider breaking up this big, out of control bank.

name: E. Warren
text:
Grandparents are going broke trying to take care of their grandchildren. It's not right.

That's why I fought to secure $3M to develop an affordable housing village for families in Worcester taking care of their grandkids. I'm grateful down to my toes for their work.

name: E. Warren
text:
U.S. Steel executives are trying to pull a fast one by selling out to Nippon Steel, a foreign company, in a deal that could hurt steelworkers and undermine national security.

Why? It might be because these execs would get a $156M+ payout. I'm looking into this.

name: E. Warren
text:
If you think your Cheerios box or bag of Doritos are getting smaller, you‚Äôre right, and those same corporations may even be paying a lower tax rate than you.

Big companies like Pepsi & Coke are ripping us off by price gouging and tax dodging. We can‚Äôt let them get away with it.

name: E. Warren
text:
Private landlords are using NDAs to silence servicemembers and military families about the terrible housing conditions these companies created.

@RepSaraJacobs and I have a bill to end this abuse and empower military families to hold bad landlords accountable.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Supreme Court is telling women in Texas: your lives don't matter. 

By refusing to hear this case, the extremists appointed to the Supreme Court by Donald Trump are allowing Texas to deny women abortion care - even in a medical emergency.

name: E. Warren
text:
October 7th was the deadliest day for the Jewish people since the Holocaust. I‚Äôve met with Israelis and Americans whose loved ones were brutally killed by Hamas, and I‚Äôve held parents whose children were violently taken as hostages. People are experiencing deep pain. Israel has the right to defend itself from terrorist attacks, and we must bring these hostages home.

Instead of securing the release of the hostages, however, Prime Minister Netanyahu has unleashed unthinkable violence on innocent civilians in Gaza. More than a million Palestinians are facing starvation. We see videos of dead children held in the arms of their parents. Violence is escalating throughout the region, including most recently in Lebanon, threatening even more human suffering.

This cycle of violence won't make anyone safer. The United States must commit to upholding human rights, international law, and accountability for the use of U.S. weapons. We urgently need a ceasefire, release of the hostages, massive humanitarian relief in Gaza, and diplomatic efforts towards a two-state solution.

name: E. Warren
text:
As people get sick and grapple with a mountain of medical bills, some are also being targeted by debt collectors using illegal tactics - things like pushing people to pay fake charges. It's disgusting.

But thanks to @VP Harris and the @CFPB, we're putting a stop to this.

name: E. Warren
text: Massachusetts has always led the way in science and technology, and with the over $800,000 we've secured for the EcoTarium's NASA STEM Engagement project, even more people will have the opportunity to get curious about our planet and space.

name: E. Warren
text:
Tax credits meant to reduce carbon emissions should not be used as loopholes to ramp up fossil fuel production and undermine the Biden Administration‚Äôs historic climate wins. 

I‚Äôm asking @USTreasury, @EPA, and @IRSnews to set up strong guardrails to protect American taxpayers.

name: E. Warren
text:
When companies like Boeing break the law and people die because of decisions to put profit over safety, executives who are responsible should be criminally prosecuted. Too often, they escape accountability. 

It‚Äôs dangerous and denies victims justice. nytimes.com/2024/10/03/us/po‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
President Biden has the legal authority to cancel student debt under the Higher Education Act.

What‚Äôs lawless and unprecedented is for a judge to block a rule that doesn't even exist.

This is another unfounded decision by a Trump judge to block relief for millions of Americans.

name: E. Warren
text:
Big news: 24 states are making it free and easy for you to file your taxes next year. That's right - no more shelling out for TurboTax or H&R Block.

Americans spend about 9 hours and $150 just to file their taxes. That's why we fought to make IRS Direct File a reality. Woo-hoo!

name: E. Warren
text:
Pentagon contractors restrict DoD‚Äôs ability to fix critical equipment. This puts our servicemembers at risk & costs billions. 

I‚Äôm fighting for servicemembers‚Äô right to repair the equipment they depend on, but greedy defense contractors are opposing my bipartisan solution.

name: E. Warren
text:
Right now, shoppers in Jamaica Plain are paying 30% more for the same frozen pizza as shoppers in Dedham. That's just not right. 

I‚Äôm pressing Stop & Shop on how they set prices because we've got to make sure big companies aren't ripping families off.
bostonglobe.com/2024/10/01/m‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
After losing the 2020 election Donald Trump told his family: ‚ÄúIt doesn‚Äôt matter if you won or lost the election. You still have to fight like hell.‚Äù

While rioters on January 6th threatened Vice President Pence at the Capitol, Trump said ‚Äúso what?‚Äù

165-pages of damning evidence.

name: E. Warren
text: @SenWarren stopped by our #Union Hall today and met w/President Mari, business agents and our executive board. Senator Warren has been a tireless advocate for workers and union families. She also visited w/ #TeamstersCare and Local 25 staff. #mapoli @Teamsters

name: E. Warren
text:
Democrats have a plan to make the rich pay their fair share, which would move us toward a stronger and fairer economy.

Republicans have a plan centered on giving their rich buddies more tax cuts, which would increase inflation and make it harder to find a job.

name: E. Warren
text:
U.S. ports are powered off the backs of American workers.
 
While the shipping industry makes hundreds of billions of dollars in profit from the hard work of dock workers, these workers deserve a bigger slice of those profits and basic job security.

name: E. Warren
text: I condemn Iran's attack on Israel. Israel has a right to defend itself, but Netanyahu can‚Äôt be allowed to drag us into a war in the Middle East. This cycle of violence won't bring the hostages home or make anyone safer. We need deescalation, a ceasefire & an end to this conflict.

name: E. Warren
text:
Private equity just drove Steward's Massachusetts hospitals into bankruptcy. Now private equity wants to take control of Steward's doctors?

@SenMarkey, @RepAuchincloss, @RepLynch, and I are making sure we don't get blindly sucked into private equity's schemes again.

name: E. Warren
text:
Professional financial advice should be about helping you save for retirement, not an advisor cashing in on a luxury cruise. 

I‚Äôm exposing how these kickbacks hurt savers‚Äîand pushing back on the corporate lobbyists and far-right judge stalling reforms. thehill.com/business/4899017‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: I'm heartsick for the families who lost their homes and their loved ones to Hurricane Helene. It‚Äôs a sad reality that this hurricane rapidly intensified into a powerful Category 4 storm because of climate change. We must do more to confront the climate crisis as we rebuild.

name: E. Warren
text:
Do you ever think maybe there‚Äôs a giant conspiracy to keep your rent high? Well, you might be right.

I launched an investigation into a company called RealPage for practices that sound a lot like price fixing. And now, the DOJ is filing an antitrust lawsuit against them.

name: E. Warren
text:
Good riddance.

Massachusetts communities are finally free from Ralph‚Äôs destructive reign, but he‚Äôs not off the hook yet ‚Äî the authorities still must prosecute his contempt charge and investigate him for other possible crimes he may have committed as Steward‚Äôs CEO.

name: E. Warren
text:
Today is international safe abortion day and also the anniversary of mifepristone‚Äôs FDA approval. 

Let‚Äôs be clear: medication abortion is safe. Abortion bans are not.

name: E. Warren
text:
If you've defaulted on your student loans, listen up.

You have 2 more days to sign up for Fresh Start. This program has changed people‚Äôs lives by making it easier to get back on track with their loans.

Sign up now. It only takes 10 minutes!

name: E. Warren
text:
It‚Äôs been almost three decades since the Community Reinvestment Act was meaningfully updated, and the old rules are giving banks a free pass to discriminate while still technically meeting standards. 

@RepMaxineWaters and I are fighting back to protect communities.

name: E. Warren
text: Donald Trump and Republican politicians making decisions about what kind of medical care women can receive? That‚Äôs just creepy.

name: E. Warren
text:
RealPage has been scamming people in Massachusetts and across the country, using computer algorithms to jack up the cost of your rent.

That's why I'm taking on companies that use RealPage and have a plan to lower housing costs. It's time to get this done.
bostonglobe.com/2024/09/25/o‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
This kind of progress gives us hope‚Äîbut we've got lots more to do. 

We'll keep fighting to pass my CARE Act to get resources to communities to end this crisis, hold big corporations accountable for profiting off addiction, and save even more lives. npr.org/2024/09/18/nx-s1-510‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
In 2025, Congress will confront big, across-the-board decisions on tax policy.

Will we give more massive tax cuts to those at the top? Or will we tax the rich to build a stronger, fairer America?

name: E. Warren
text:
Ralph de la Torre was just held in contempt of Congress.

Newsflash, Ralph: after spending nearly two decades sucking every last bit of value out of Steward Health Care, you will be held accountable.

name: E. Warren
text: I want to be clear: Republican politicians want to enact a nationwide abortion ban. And if we don't stop them, this will become the reality for millions of people across the country. We can't let that happen. We won‚Äôt.

name: E. Warren
text:
It‚Äôs no wonder that doctors - no matter their political affiliation - in states with abortion bans are distressed. It‚Äôs no wonder why some are making the difficult decision to leave their homes and practices.

Make no mistake: abortion bans threaten access to care for everyone.

name: E. Warren
text: Think about a patient whose water breaks too early, before the pregnancy is viable. That patient is at a high risk of infection - or worse, sepsis, which can cause the loss of limbs, fertility, and organ function, or can even cause death. And their doctor can't help.

name: E. Warren
text: Think about the doctors who have to choose between endangering a woman‚Äôs life by delaying the emergency abortion she needs, or providing life-saving care ‚Äútoo soon‚Äù and risking prison time themselves, leaving their own families and kids behind. That is cruel beyond imagination.

name: E. Warren
text:
Think about Kayla Smith who learned that her son had a fatal fetal anomaly. Since she was at high risk for preeclampsia, carrying the pregnancy to term also risked her life.

She had to cross state lines to get care, endangering her health and leaving no room to grieve her loss.

name: E. Warren
text:
This is a powerfully important piece on the horrendous consequences of Trump‚Äôs abortion bans for patients and doctors. I want to share some of the stories.

We must fight for abortion access before this becomes a reality nationwide.üßµtheatlantic.com/magazine/arc‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Junk fees, missing security deposits, unfair evictions ‚Äî private equity-backed Invitation Homes has long been screwing over families. 

I called them out for their predatory behavior years ago, and thanks to the @FTC, they're being held accountable.wsj.com/real-estate/landlord‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
If you have a debit card, chances are it's a Visa. That's not an accident - for years, @Visa has allegedly used its size to smother competition and in turn charge you an arm and a leg in fees just because it can.

This is a great step by the DOJ to rein in Visa's monopoly power.

name: E. Warren
text:
When a natural disaster strikes, the rules for federal relief don't always reflect the experiences of people on the ground.

My bipartisan RIDER Act will change that, supporting Massachusetts communities when they need it most. masslive.com/politics/2024/0‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: Wall Street banks love mergers, but bigger isn't better for Main Street. I've been pushing for stronger scrutiny of bank mergers for years, and thanks to the Biden-Harris administration, it's finally happening. bloomberg.com/news/articles/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: From bringing down the cost of inhalers to her work to get rid of junk fees, @linakhanFTC continues to show us what it looks like for government to stand up to greedy corporations and lower costs for working people.

name: E. Warren
text:
Big news: @MassGovernor, @SenMarkey, & I brought home nearly half a billion dollars to replace the North Station bridge.

This investment ‚Äî the biggest federal award for @MBTA ever! ‚Äî will build a safer, more reliable public transit system in Massachusetts.wcvb.com/article/north-stati‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
It's true: private equity feeds on the health care system like vampires.

They suck resources out of hospitals, physician practices & nursing homes, saddle them with debt, & make off like bandits while patients & workers suffer.

I have a bill to stop them.statnews.com/2024/08/19/priv‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Who really benefits from student debt relief? 

Low- and middle-income Americans. 
Seniors. 
Black Americans. 
Women. 

The Biden-Harris Administration is committed to delivering student debt relief to give everyone a fighting chance.

name: E. Warren
text: These 3 drug middlemen - which control 80% of all U.S. prescriptions - schemed with drug makers & abused their market power to block patients from accessing cheaper, generic insulins. @linakhanFTC is taking action to restore competition & lower prices for life-saving medicine.

name: E. Warren
text:
.@TheJusticeDept sued RealPage last month, alleging that its software helps landlords illegally coordinate rent hikes. 

I sent letters to 13 corporate landlords in Massachusetts that have allegedly used RealPage‚Äôs algorithm to get to the bottom of this scheme.

name: E. Warren
text:
I've got great news: Massachusetts is a clean energy jobs leader, home to more than 120,000 clean energy jobs. And there's more: clean energy jobs account for over 70% of energy jobs in MA!

Let's keep leading the way to create good, new jobs and stop the climate crisis.

name: E. Warren
text: How we treat our active duty military, veterans, and military families impacts who serves and what their experiences are like. I'm proud of all I've gotten done on @SASCDems for servicemembers in the Commonwealth and across the country. boston.com/news/politics/202‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: Good. Ralph de la Torre is one more rich guy who thinks the rules don‚Äôt apply to him. He must answer for the destruction he left behind after running Steward‚Äôs hospitals into the ground.

name: E. Warren
text:
When kids pay for their school lunch, their families shouldn‚Äôt be squeezed by online payment processors for every last nickel and dime.

I'm pushing @USDA to stop these greedy middlemen from ripping off American families. nbcnews.com/news/us-news/law‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
E. Warren
text:
This cut in interest rates is yet another acknowledgement that Powell waited too long to reduce rates.

The Fed has finally changed course to follow its dual mandate on prices and jobs.

Lower rates mean relief for consumers and aspiring homeowners. More rates cuts are needed.

name: E. Warren
text:
40 years ago, the typical home in Boston cost 4.5x the salary of a Boston Public Schools teacher. Today, that home costs nearly 10x that teacher‚Äôs salary - about $950,000.

We must do more to end the affordable housing crisis. I have a bill to do just that.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and Republicans love to say they're going to protect IVF. But Senate Republicans have blocked IVF protections not once, but TWICE now. 

Women are not stupid. We know that this has always been about controlling women's bodies. And we're fighting back.

name: E. Warren
text:
It may seem like the money you store in CashApp, Chime, or Yotta is safe and insured ‚Äî but that‚Äôs not necessarily true. Just ask the thousands of people whose savings have been frozen in apps like these for months. 

I'm pushing for more protections to keep your money safe.

name: E. Warren
text:
We're in a world where doctors have to tell women in the middle of a miscarriage they can't get the medical care they need because they're not near enough to death, and that they need to hemorrhage in the parking lot for a few more hours.

Donald Trump's Supreme Court did this.

name: E. Warren
text:
Amber Nicole Thurman‚Äîa mother to a 6-year-old son‚Äîdied after routine medical care was delayed.

Her doctors feared criminal prosecution under Georgia's abortion ban.

Her death was preventable.

Donald Trump said abortion bans are a "beautiful thing." propublica.org/article/georg‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: Big boost for small students: Sen. Warren delivers $1.6M for preschool expansion buff.ly/4gnrLxY

name: E. Warren
text:
For years, politicians promised they'd get Medicare to negotiate on drug prices, but never did - until now. 

The Biden-Harris administration got it done, and now more than 9 million Americans will have lower drug costs as a result. That's a big deal.

name: E. Warren
text: I am thankful that former President Trump was not harmed during an apparent assassination attempt at his golf course. Political violence is never ok.  Never.

name: E. Warren
text: .@SenWarren (D-Mass.) recently hosted a forum at Spaulding with the @homebaseprogram to spotlight the need for advancing care and research on traumatic brain injuries (#TBI) and blast overpressure injuries in the military. Learn more: spklr.io/6010tAAg.

name: E. Warren
text:
Thanks to my 15% corporate minimum tax, the days of giant corporations paying next to nothing in taxes on their billions in profit are over. 

@USTreasury‚Äôs new rules enforcing this law are a critical step toward making the tax system more fair. washingtonpost.com/business/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
I've long held @Navient's feet to the fire for its appalling abuse of borrowers.

Now, thanks to @CFPB & @chopracfpb, millions of borrowers are finally getting the relief they deserve and a guarantee that Navient will never work as a federal student loan servicer again.

name: E. Warren
text:
A congressional subpoena is a legal order, not an optional invite. 

Ralph de la Torre must be held in contempt of Congress for his refusal to show up to @HELPCmteDems this morning, and held accountable for the damage he‚Äôs done to patients, workers, and communities.

name: E. Warren
text: The Biden-Harris Administration is focused on increasing tax fairness, supporting small businesses, and reducing the deficit, which is why Treasury is addressing significant corporate tax avoidance by some of the largest and most profitable corporations in the country.

name: E. Warren
text:
In the past month, two groundbreaking lawsuits by @AFTunion and affected borrowers have alleged countless failures by @MOHELA as a student loan servicer.

I‚Äôm leading over 50 lawmakers telling @SecCardona to consider ending MOHELA‚Äôs contract.

name: E. Warren
text:
We all love our pets and would do anything for them. But private equity is taking advantage of that love - charging pet owners an arm and a leg for shoddy care.

I talked to vets (and pets!) about the problems of private equity in veterinary care. We've got to stop these guys.

name: E. Warren
text:
I passed a bipartisan law to break up the hearing aid monopoly.

Now millions of Americans with hearing loss can save thousands of dollars on hearing aids without a doctor visit.

It‚Äôs an example of how competition policy lowers costs, spurs innovation, and delivers more choices.

name: E. Warren
text:
For years, the Republicans in Washington underfunded the IRS. So for years, rich tax cheats got away with not paying what they owe.

Now, thanks to the Biden-Harris administration, the IRS has clawed back over a BILLION dollars and counting from rich tax cheats.

name: E. Warren
text: .@linakhanFTC has been a fearless champion for consumers. She‚Äôs brought deep knowledge and expertise to the agency, and has shown us what it looks like when government works for working people. This honor is well-deserved! fastcompany.com/91175726/lin‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: AI chipmaker Nvidia has become the world's second most valuable company ‚Äî but it may be choking off innovation with anticompetitive behavior. I'm glad that @TheJusticeDept is investigating.

name: E. Warren
text: 86% of renters in the US want to buy a home but can‚Äôt afford one. It doesn‚Äôt have to be this way. I have a bill to solve this housing crisis ‚Äì all paid for by taxing the ultra wealthy.

name: E. Warren
text: This morning on @IssueNBCBoston, @SenWarren discussed the work she's doing to help service members dealing with traumatic brain injuries and PTSD due to blast exposure

name: E. Warren
text:
We have a duty to keep servicemembers safe and protect them from unnecessary risks. That's why we need to address the impacts of blast overpressure and improve access to care.

Thank you @homebaseprogram, @DeptofDefense, and Spaulding for your partnership in getting this done.

name: E. Warren
text: Real Estate Investment Trusts ‚Äî REITs ‚Äî are stretching tax rules while squeezing hotel workers and health care providers. I‚Äôm calling on the IRS to crack down on REITs meddling in hotel union contracts and hospital operations while claiming tax breaks meant for passive investors.

name: E. Warren
text:
For decades, drug cartels, Russian oligarchs, and criminals have exploited massive loopholes to buy up American homes as a way to store their dirty money. 

I've long urged @USTreasury to close these loopholes and they just closed two big ones. 

Next up: commercial real estate.

name: E. Warren
text:
Are airlines actually giving you what they promise when you sign up for their reward programs? Or are they devaluing your points and adding junk fees? 

Well, thanks to @DOT we‚Äôre finally going to find out. This is great news.

name: E. Warren
text: Instead of doling out tens of millions to executives, the Federal Home Loan Banks should be doing what Congress created them to do: funding affordable housing. bloomberg.com/news/articles/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: As Steward hospitals got poorer, Ralph de la Torre got richer. Law enforcement authorities need to investigate Dr. de la Torre for possible crimes ‚Äî and Congress needs to pass my Corporate Crimes Against Health Care Act to ensure that what happened at Steward never happens again.

name: E. Warren
text: When they get hit with a subpoena, most crooks have to show up and say publicly that they want to take the Fifth Amendment.  But Ralph de la Torre's lawyers say he just shouldn't have to show up next week.  One more rich guy who thinks the rules don't apply to him.

name: E. Warren
text:
I'm heartsick by the school shooting in Atlanta where mamas and daddies still don't know if their kids are safe, and where another class of students have had their lives shattered by gun violence.

How many more people have to die before Congress acts?

name: E. Warren
text:
Weapons of war do not belong on our streets. Especially not ones that were manufactured using taxpayer money.

My new bill will stop our tax dollars from helping to pump military grade ammunition and weapons onto our streets to harm innocent people. bloomberg.com/news/articles/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: .@Navient helped fraudulent for-profit colleges swindle hundreds of thousands of students into private student loan debt. Navient knows it‚Äôs responsible for canceling these loans, but the process it set up is convoluted & opaque. Navient should cancel this fraudulent debt ‚Äì now.

name: E. Warren
text:
Frances Perkins, from Massachusetts, was the first female Cabinet member and a fierce fighter for big, structural change. What did she get done?¬†

Social Security.¬†
Minimum wage.¬†
Union rights.¬†
The weekend.¬†¬†

Let‚Äôs honor her by creating the Frances Perkins national monument.

name: E. Warren
text: Hamas‚Äôs brutal murder of Hersh Goldberg-Polin and five other hostages is another act of terrorism. We must keep pushing for a ceasefire to free all the hostages and stop the suffering of Palestinians in Gaza.

name: E. Warren
text: I stand in solidarity with Local 26 because one job should be enough. I support these workers now as they fight for a fair contract.

name: E. Warren
text:
Thousands of Massachusetts students in

‚úÖ Worcester
‚úÖ Pioneer Valley
‚úÖ New Bedford
‚úÖ Lawrence
‚úÖ Fall River
‚úÖ Cape Cod
‚úÖ Boston

will take an electric bus to school! üöå 

I fought hard for this investment, and now it‚Äôs improving life for our kids.

name: E. Warren
text:
To solve our nation‚Äôs housing crisis, we need to build more housing. 

That‚Äôs why I‚Äôm leading legislation that will build nearly 3 million housing units over the next decade. That‚Äôs how we make sure everyone has an affordable place to call home.

name: E. Warren
text: I‚Äôll always fight to deliver better equipment and support Massachusetts firefighters who protect our communities.

name: E. Warren
text:
Google is an illegal monopoly, according to a federal judge, and it will now be held accountable.

Smaller companies deserve a chance to compete without being strong-armed by giant corporations.

This is an important milestone in the antimonopoly movement.

name: E. Warren
text: Cleaner air, more sustainable transit, and good-paying jobs ‚Äî clean energy investments are a win-win-win for Massachusetts.

name: E. Warren
text:
Are we really supposed to believe that Supreme Court justices can go on luxury trips paid by Republican megadonors and then fairly judge their allies in court?

I‚Äôm not buying it. To restore trust in our judiciary, we need a binding, enforceable code of conduct for SCOTUS.

name: E. Warren
text: Let's be clear: federal agencies have the power to lower drug costs ‚Äî and rulings from far-right Supreme Court justices don‚Äôt change that fact. I‚Äôm urging @HHSGov & @CommerceGov to finalize guidance that'll boost competition and bring down drug prices. thehill.com/policy/healthcar‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: It‚Äôs time for a big cut in interest rates by the Fed ‚Äî at least 75 basis points. Chair Powell already admitted he‚Äôs waited too long. Delay puts too many jobs at risk and threatens our entire economy.

name: E. Warren
text:
For years, companies got away with putting military families in housing infested with rats or black mold.

But I fought back, and now there's a housing database that'll incentivize companies to do right by their tenants and hold companies accountable when they fail.

name: E. Warren
text: You shouldn‚Äôt go broke from your medical bills. @VP Harris is fighting to help families drowning in medical debt.

name: E. Warren
text:
If you want to understand some of the ways that private equity-owned companies are pushing up the cost of housing, here's a good example.

Today, @TheJusticeDept and several states sued @RealPage for its algorithmic collusion scheme to drive up rents. bloomberg.com/news/articles/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
RealPage‚Äôs software helps landlords illegally coordinate rent hikes, hurting families in Massachusetts and beyond. 

After my investigation exposing these harmful practices, I asked @TheJusticeDept to act. This new lawsuit is an important step to cut housing costs.

name: E. Warren
text:
It‚Äôs outrageous that billionaires pay less taxes than public school teachers. 

It‚Äôs time that we make the wealthy pay their fair share. My ultra-millionaire tax would do just that.

name: E. Warren
text: We won‚Äôt just sit back and do nothing while women lose fundamental freedoms. Fighting back begins with restoring abortion rights nationwide.

name: E. Warren
text:
Have you noticed that groceries cost a lot more than they did a few years ago?

You‚Äôre not the only one. Massive food corporations have kept prices up nationwide to exploit consumers and make a profit.

It‚Äôs time to bring them down.

name: E. Warren
text:
Overturning Roe was just the start. Republicans are chipping away at reproductive rights, and they‚Äôre not just going after abortion in red states ‚Äî they want to ban it nationwide.

Today, 30% of women live in states that ban abortion. Republicans politicians want it to be 100%.

name: E. Warren
text:
The federal government must partner with local communities to tackle the housing crisis.

I have a bill that rewards communities that lower housing costs‚Äîwhether through zoning reforms or more housing near public transit.

It‚Äôs common sense.

name: E. Warren
text: My statement on the Healey administration's actions to keep six Steward hospitals open under new operators.

name: E. Warren
text:
Two years ago Congress passed the Inflation Reduction Act, the largest climate package in the history of the world ‚Äì paid for by my corporate minimum tax. 

Democrats are building a world we can be proud of.

name: E. Warren
text:
Right now, Americans pay two to three times more for prescription drugs than they would anywhere else.
 
But the Biden-Harris Administration beat Big Pharma. And after months of negotiations, Medicare has reached agreements to lower the price for 10 of the highest-cost drugs.

name: E. Warren
text:
Those high prices you‚Äôre seeing at the grocery store? They‚Äôre not just inflation.

A handful of big corporations control the food industry, and they‚Äôre keeping prices high because they know they can.

Democrats are calling them out and forcing them to bring down costs.

name: E. Warren
text:
You ever wonder how your grandparents bought a home for 7 raspberries, but you can‚Äôt afford a one bedroom apartment? It‚Äôs not you. 

We‚Äôre facing a national housing shortage. The government needs to tackle this crisis head on.

name: E. Warren
text:
Two Massachusetts hospitals are closing and communities are suffering because of private equity‚Äôs looting of Steward.

Selling Massachusetts doctors to another private equity firm could be a disaster. We can't make the same mistake again. Regulators must scrutinize this deal.

name: E. Warren
text:
No one should be above the law ‚Äî not even the president of the United States.

This Supreme Court has completely jumped the guardrails and threw democratic principles out the window. We need SCOTUS reform.

name: E. Warren
text:
Here's the deal: @FTC's new rule banning noncompetes gives power back to Americans. It'll protect millions of workers by putting an end to these unfair agreements and reining in corporate abuse. 

Share how noncompetes have impacted you by writing in to noncompete@ftc.gov

name: E. Warren
text: Once again, extremist Republican judges are ignoring the law and stopping the Biden-Harris Administration from giving life changing relief to millions. cnn.com/2024/08/09/politics/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: Republican judges, in response to claims from Republican AGs, have now blocked hundreds of billions of dollars of debt relief for lower- and middle-income people despite clear legal authority to provide that relief.

name: E. Warren
text: As @usedgov upgrades their student loan system, they need to make sure millions of student loan borrowers have the transparency they need to hold servicers accountable. thehill.com/homenews/educati‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Grocery chain @kroger is trying to pull a fast one on us by using digital price tags - a move that could let them use surge pricing for water or ice cream when it's hot out.

Corporate greed is out of control. @SenBobCasey & I are saying enough is enough.
cnbc.com/2024/08/07/2024-ele‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
You can‚Äôt make this stuff up.

Ralph de la Torre drove hospitals into bankruptcy and now struts around Paris like an Olympic champion.

We should claw back every penny of the money he looted out of Massachusetts. He must be held accountable.

name: E. Warren
text:
Corporate greed is coming for your pet.

Ever wonder why your vet bill is so high? Private equity companies are spending billions taking over vet practices and profiteering while cutting quality, increasing prices, and taking advantage of vets.

I'm fighting back.

name: E. Warren
text:
It‚Äôs not your avocado toast. Families are struggling with housing costs because we have a national housing shortage.
 
We need to build more housing, and I have a bill to do just that ‚Äì all paid for by making the wealthy pay their fair share.

name: E. Warren
text: PLAs ensure good wages and benefits, safe working conditions, and sustained investment in the local economy and workforce, write Senator Elizabeth Warren and Chrissy Lynch, president of the Massachusetts AFL-CIO. trib.al/zX0Pyho

name: E. Warren
text:
For years, Google has illegally squashed competition to maintain its search monopoly. This is a big win for antitrust enforcement by Assistant Attorney General Kanter. 

It's time to hold Google accountable - and break it up.

name: E. Warren
text:
The IRS recently collected $1 billion from millionaire tax cheats. Just imagine raking in $1 million in a single year, and then not paying taxes.

Democrats fought for IRS funding to crack down on rich tax cheats. Every Republican voted no.

name: E. Warren
text:
Toxic mold. Lead paint. Water damage. Rat infestations. Our military housing is in disrepair.

Private housing companies aren‚Äôt being held accountable for their failures because the system is rigged.

DoD needs to step up for military families.

name: E. Warren
text: Worcester native Stephen Nedoroscik making America proud! Nerds get the job done.

name: E. Warren
text:
Democrats made sure that people on Medicare would have their insulin capped at $35 per month. 

And Republicans? They voted no. 

I think that says it all.

name: E. Warren
text:
Fed Chair Powell made a serious mistake not cutting interest rates. He‚Äôs been warned over and over again that waiting too long risks driving the economy into a ditch.

The jobs data is flashing red.

Powell needs to cancel his summer vacation and cut rates now ‚Äî not wait 6 weeks.

name: E. Warren
text:
Families should be able to sit together on a flight without paying more.

Today, the Biden-Harris Administration continues our work to lower costs and fight price gouging by proposing a ban on airlines charging those fees ‚Äî saving families as much as $200 for roundtrip flights.

name: E. Warren
text: The release of Americans detained in Russia is tremendous relief, and I‚Äôm grateful for their safe return. It‚Äôs a testament to @POTUS Biden‚Äôs steadfast diplomacy and a reminder of the importance of strong alliances. We will never stop working to free all American hostages abroad.

name: E. Warren
text:
Parkland. Uvalde. Las Vegas.

What do these shootings have in common?

The shooters used military-grade ammunition from the Lake City Plant, a government-owned military facility.

We must make sure our tax dollars aren‚Äôt subsidizing mass shootings.
military.com/daily-news/2024‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: I just¬†sent a letter with @SenWarren, @RepPressley, @RepLynch & @RepLoriTrahan¬†urging Steward to follow the law, MPT to renegotiate its hospital leases, and private equity to pay for what they‚Äôve done. We must protect patients and workers.

name: E. Warren
text:
We can transform how housing works in America by asking the richest Americans to give a tiny slice of their millions and billions to fix this crisis.

Let‚Äôs get this done. boston.com/news/local-news/2‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
I‚Äôm here with Hayley Paige to play a new game called Say NO to the Noncompete.

Thanks to @linakhanFTC and the Biden-Harris administration, over a hundred million workers will have the freedom to pursue a new job or start a new business.

name: E. Warren
text: Remember: abortion is just the start. Last month, a majority of Republican senators voted AGAINST protections for birth control and IVF too.

name: E. Warren
text:
These aren‚Äôt just statistics.

It‚Äôs more money in families‚Äô pockets.

It‚Äôs new businesses for communities.

It‚Äôs an economy working better for working people, not only the wealthy.

More work to do, but this economic progress matters.

name: E. Warren
text: If you do one thing today, watch this powerfully important Senate testimony from renowned wedding dress designer Hayley Paige on the harms of noncompetes and how @FTC has empowered millions by banning them.

name: E. Warren
text: Tune into @SenWarren‚Äôs Economic Policy Subcommittee hearing: Banning Noncompete Agreements: Benefits for Workers, Businesses, and the Economy. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1gqxvNLMb‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
When 600,000 Teamsters were on the verge of losing their hard earned pensions, I worked with the Biden-Harris admin and Democrats passed legislation to save seniors from retirement cuts ‚Äî all without a single Republican vote.

Every American deserves to retire with dignity.

name: E. Warren
text:
America is in a full-blown housing crisis, and it‚Äôs no secret why: we don‚Äôt have enough housing.

I'm introducing a major bill to build 3 million new homes and lower the cost of housing ‚Äì all paid for by taxing the ultra-wealthy. bostonglobe.com/2024/07/29/b‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Giant corporations are using far-right, unelected judges to undermine our government.

I‚Äôm fighting back hard with a bill to keep our federal rulemaking processes out of the hands of corporate interest groups and bring back reliance on agency experts for our rulemaking.

name: E. Warren
text:
Unexpected fees can add up quickly and make a big dent in a family‚Äôs budget.

That‚Äôs why the Biden-Harris administration is cracking down on surprise junk fees and requiring companies to tell you the real price up front.

name: E. Warren
text:
Today‚Äôs inflation report shows continued progress bringing down inflation, which is now down to 2.5%. 

President Biden and Vice President Harris will keep fighting to lower costs for all Americans ‚Äì from capping prescription drug costs to lowering rents.

name: E. Warren
text:
We pay some of the highest prices in the world for our cell phone bills. And if @TMobile buys @UScellular, it could get worse.

@TheJusticeDept and @FCC need to carefully review this deal to protect competition and cell phone users. cnbc.com/2024/07/23/warren-s‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: School lunch junk fees should not exist in America.

name: E. Warren
text:
Workers are collapsing and even dying from heat exhaustion‚Äîwith climate change only making things worse. We need to finalize the Biden-Harris rule to protect workers from extreme heat.

Let's get this done, @RepCasar.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Biden-Harris administration‚Äôs new minimum staffing requirements for nursing homes would save 13,000 lives per year. It‚Äôs wrong that the nursing home industry is fighting this life-saving rule.
usatoday.com/story/news/heal‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
.@POTUS has given us a lesson in patriotism and a message for the future.

We can only go forward when everyone in this country steps up and comes together to strengthen our democracy. That's how we'll build a future that works for all of us.

name: E. Warren
text: MOHELA‚Äôs failures have harmed millions of student loan borrowers. It‚Äôs time they‚Äôre held accountable.

name: E. Warren
text:
I will not attend Prime Minister Netanyahu's political show in Congress. 

After nearly 300 days, Netanyahu has failed to bring the hostages home and he has created a humanitarian catastrophe ‚Äì this war must end.

name: E. Warren
text:
I fought tooth and nail to make sure you get an automatic refund when your flight is canceled or severely delayed. But now, after disastrous flight disruptions, airlines are trying to pull a fast one on us.

Airlines need to follow the law. @SecretaryPete, go get 'em.

name: E. Warren
text: Woo-hoo! This grant will be transformational for Massachusetts families and for accelerating our transition away from fossil fuels.

name: E. Warren
text: Jack Connors dedicated his life to looking out for families in Boston who were too often left behind. He was always focused on what more we can do to help others. His legacy will echo for generations. bostonglobe.com/2024/07/23/o‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Sonya Massey should still be alive. Her death is a senseless tragedy and a sickening reality that Black Americans know all too well. 

Sonya‚Äôs family deserves justice. Congress must step up to build more trust and accountability in policing.

name: E. Warren
text:
Democrats have plans to make billionaires pay taxes like everyone else. Republicans are desperate to give their rich buddies more tax cuts.
usatoday.com/story/money/202‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
E. Warren
text:
Over nearly two decades, JPMorgan Chase made commitment after commitment to fight the climate crisis. Now, CEO Jamie Dimon is walking them back.

JPMorgan‚Äôs climate record has always been sketchy. But if Dimon lied to investors, Congress and regulators must respond.

name: E. Warren
text: I‚Äôm heartsick by the loss of Congresswoman Sheila Jackson Lee. I‚Äôve known Sheila since I was hired as a young law professor at the University of Houston. She has always been a fighter, a trailblazer, and a friend. Her legacy will live on.

name: E. Warren
text:
What a terrific day in Pittsfield!

It was great to talk about all the federal investments we‚Äôve secured for Massachusetts veterans, small businesses, and accessible health care.

This is what it looks like when the federal government works hand in hand with our communities.

name: E. Warren
text: It‚Äôs long past time for Congress to strengthen judicial ethics, including with an enforceable code of ethics for the Supreme Court. I‚Äôve got a bill for that. npr.org/2024/07/17/nx-s1-504‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: This is a good first step, but it can‚Äôt be the last. FHFA has the power to protect renters from abusive rent hikes and evictions. Renters need relief now.

name: E. Warren
text:
I've said it before and I'll say it again: under @POTUS, more and more people are getting their student loan debt canceled every single day.
