Nearly 5 million Americans, including almost a million public service workers, have now had their student debt canceled.

name: E. Warren
text:
Private equity firms get rich off of looting companies and leaving Americans with the consequences ‚Äì and the tax bill. 

Since 2000, private equity has raked in more than $1 trillion by abusing tax loopholes. I‚Äôm fighting to end these breaks and hold private equity accountable.

name: E. Warren
text:
Insurance companies are diagnosing healthy patients as sick on paper so they can steal BILLIONS of dollars from Medicare for illnesses never treated by a doctor.

We are living in a nightmare created by a few health insurance CEOs and we must crack down.
wsj.com/health/healthcare/me‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
With $1.72 billion from the Biden administration, we‚Äôve got what we need to get shovels in the ground on the Sagamore Bridge ‚Äî and we‚Äôre going after every federal dollar we need to rebuild the Bourne Bridge, too.¬†

This is a huge deal, and teamwork with @SenWarren, @SenMarkey, @USRepKeating, and state and local officials made it happen.

name: E. Warren
text:
Together, we won over a BILLION dollars to start replacing the Cape Cod Bridges - one of the biggest bridge grants in US history.

Two years ago we had zero federal dollars to replace these bridges, and now we have 1.7 BILLION in federal funds alone. This is a big deal.

name: E. Warren
text:
The rent is too damn high. But @POTUS has a plan to crack down on corporate landlords, boost our housing supply, and lower housing costs.

Republicans hand out massive tax breaks to corporations. President Biden is standing up for working people.

name: E. Warren
text: Political violence is wrong and I condemn it. I hope everyone who attended the rally is ok and I am glad the former president is safe.

name: E. Warren
text:
I‚Äôve spoken to people who cried after having their student debt canceled.¬†
¬†
These are hardworking people ‚Äî public school teachers, city employees ‚Äî who can now save up money to buy a house, or start a family, or retire.
¬†
Student loan debt cancellation is life changing.

name: E. Warren
text:
Long wait times. No responses. Millions of billing errors.

Those are just some of the failures that student loan borrowers in America have had to deal with.

Student loan servicers like @MOHELA are failing to do their jobs. We must hold them accountable.

name: E. Warren
text:
Massachusetts just hit a billion dollar home run to start replacing the Cape Cod Bridges.

Two years ago, we had zero federal dollars for these bridges. But thanks to my teamwork with @MassGovernor, @SenMarkey and @USRepKeating we have 1.7 BILLION in federal funds alone. Woo-hoo!

name: E. Warren
text:
The same companies set to receive over $30 billion in CHIPS Act grants have spent $41 billion on stock buybacks since 2019, with billions more planned.

@CommerceGov needs to ensure the American people aren‚Äôt subsidizing stock buybacks.

name: E. Warren
text: Here‚Äôs a great investment idea: the IRS. Well, unless you‚Äôre a wealthy tax cheat. Let me explain.

name: E. Warren
text:
Democrats boosted IRS funding, and it's already gotten back $1 BILLION from millionaire tax cheats.

Republicans want to cut IRS funding again to protect their rich tax-dodging buddies - no way.

name: E. Warren
text: Fed Chair Powell‚Äôs cozy relationship with big banks means they get to write their own rules, play games with people‚Äôs money, and grow their market power unchecked. Enough is enough.

name: E. Warren
text:
Govt funding from the CHIPS & Science Act should go toward investing in American manufacturing & research, not billions in stock buybacks.

I‚Äôm leading a letter w/ @SenWarren, @RepCasten, & @RepBillFoster calling on the admin to stop this corporate greed. cnbc.com/2024/07/01/democrat‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: Cancelling student debt advances racial justice.

name: E. Warren
text: Pay packages that reward executives who take big risks with the bank's finances are a threat to our financial stability. Chair Powell needs to do his job and write the rules to rein them in.

name: E. Warren
text:
I‚Äôve long warned that the 3 big middlemen that control 80% of drug claims are padding their profits, forcing patients to pay higher drug prices & driving pharmacies out of business.

@FTC's investigation confirms it. I‚Äôm glad @linakhanFTC is taking action. nytimes.com/2024/07/09/healt‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: While Steward plundered hospitals into financial ruin, CEO Ralph de la Torre & executives spent millions spying on potential critics‚Äîyet they are still leading this company. It's time to appoint an independent trustee to replace Steward's executives & protect patients & workers.

name: E. Warren
text:
When you stroll down the grocery aisle, nearly everything you see is made by a handful of big corporations.

During the pandemic, those companies jacked up prices. But because of the lack of competition, they‚Äôve continued to keep them high. And it‚Äôs hurting everyday Americans.

name: E. Warren
text:
Americans are being forced to pay sky-high prices for prescription drugs ‚Äî sometimes the very same drugs their taxes paid to develop.

The Biden administration is standing up to Big Pharma, which has cheated the American people for far too long.

name: E. Warren
text:
From overcharging for and delaying prescriptions to squeezing out competing pharmacies, DoD‚Äôs health care contract with pharmacy benefit manager Express Scripts isn‚Äôt working. 

@RepBuddyCarter and I are urging DoD to revise this contract to ensure military families come first.

name: E. Warren
text: President Biden has canceled student loan debt for nearly 5 million Americans, and I'm working with @EdDebtJustice to make sure that people right here in Massachusetts can feel the benefits of those life-changing policies.

name: E. Warren
text:
4 in 5 Americans support raising taxes on the rich. And that‚Äôs Americans of ALL parties.

The American people are telling us that they are ready for a tax code that promotes their values. It‚Äôs time that we listen.

name: E. Warren
text:
Pentagon contractor TransDigm has been cheating the military for decades, buying up companies to reduce competition and hiking up prices to boost profits.

Its acquisitions of 2 new companies need to be scrutinized. Price gouging the military endangers our national security.

name: E. Warren
text:
Donald Trump and Mitch McConnell stole two seats on the Supreme Court, and we're living with the consequences.

I've said it before and I'll say it again: it's time to expand the Court.

name: E. Warren
text:
And can Trump get away with doing the same to the Supreme Court while he's at it? 

This decision is a grave reminder of the stakes in this moment in history.

name: E. Warren
text:
Could President Trump get away with sending an FBI hit squad to eliminate anyone he decided was a threat? 

If Trump doesn't get the votes on a bill he wants, can he get away with  ordering the military to round up every lawmaker in Congress?

name: E. Warren
text:
If Donald Trump were President, could he get away with telling the Justice Department to make up dirt to put his political opponents in jail? 

Could President Trump get away with taking a bribe in exchange for vetoing a law?

name: E. Warren
text:
An extremist Supreme Court stacked by Donald Trump has ruled that the President is above the law. 

Six right-wing justices have given the President free rein to abuse the power of the presidency without constraint.

name: E. Warren
text: This Supreme Court is undermining the foundations of our democracy; Congress must restore balance by adding more justices to the Court.

name: E. Warren
text: An extremist Supreme Court stacked by Donald Trump has snatched power away from an elected Congress and handed lawmaking power over to a few far-right unelected judges.

name: E. Warren
text: Today‚Äôs decision, along with the Court‚Äôs decision to overturn¬†Chevron, is an assault on the separation of powers under the Constitution.

name: E. Warren
text: For every federal law passed in the last forty years, Congress understood that agency experts would execute the will of democratically elected representatives and that court challenges would occur during a short, defined time period. That was settled law until this week.

name: E. Warren
text:
DOJ‚Äôs Antitrust Division fights back when monopolists like Apple and Ticketmaster hurt consumers. But a House subcommittee voted to cap one of @JusticeATR‚Äôs sources of funding ‚Äì dollars that should go to protecting Americans from corporate greed.

We need to have ATR's back.

name: E. Warren
text: Republican politicians are trying to ban abortion nationwide. But I have lived in a world where abortion was illegal, and we will not go back.

name: E. Warren
text:
People shouldn‚Äôt have to choose between life-saving medication and food and shelter.

President Biden has capped insulin at $35 for seniors so that Americans don‚Äôt have to make that choice. It's not just about lowering costs ‚Äî it's about saving lives.

name: E. Warren
text:
The middlemen between your pharmacy and your insurance company are ALSO screwing you over. The big 3 PBMs control 80% of the market & are also owned by huge insurers ‚Äì a gross conflict of interest.

No wonder drug costs are so high. It‚Äôs time to break up these companies ‚Äì now.

name: E. Warren
text:
Let's call this Supreme Court ruling on Chevron what it is: a power grab by the far-right to benefit the wealthy and well-connected. 

Corporate interests want extremist judges to write the rules at the expense of consumers, workers, safety, and the environment.

name: E. Warren
text:
Bribery is bribery. The American people should be able to trust that their representatives are working for them, not the highest bidder.

This extremist Supreme Court continues to hurt public trust by cutting protections against the influence of the wealthy and well-connected.

name: E. Warren
text:
Our service members are suffering traumatic brain injuries from their own weapons. We need solid research and solutions that identify, treat, and prevent these injuries.

I‚Äôm going to continue to hold DoD accountable and fight to protect our service members.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Supreme Court is giving big corporations and billionaires free rein to rip off American workers and families.

This decision will gut our ability to enforce the law, stripping away the tools we need to go after corporate crime and making enforcement time-consuming and costly.

name: E. Warren
text:
The Sackler family made a fortune from hooking people to opioids that killed hundreds of thousands of Americans, and then tried to use the bankruptcy system to keep their money.

My statement following the Supreme Court‚Äôs decision on Harrington v. Purdue Pharma LLP.:

name: E. Warren
text:
The Supreme Court decided to wait until after the election to tell Americans whether women who are in crisis can get the emergency medical care they need. 

The Supreme Court doesn‚Äôt get the final word on abortion ‚Äì the American people do.

name: E. Warren
text: We need to invest in universal child care ‚Äì now.

name: E. Warren
text: Building new housing is how we‚Äôll dig ourselves out of the housing crisis, and I‚Äôm grateful to see @POTUS make these investments in Massachusetts.

name: E. Warren
text:
Climate change affects everything from our farms to our financial markets. But U.S. financial regulators haven‚Äôt been acting that way.

@RepCasten and I have had enough. Regulators must act to tackle climate-related financial risks. thehill.com/policy/energy-en‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
President Biden & Democrats will always fight for Americans' right to be with who they love.

It was a devastating mistake to punish people who wanted to serve their country. We stand with you & will keep fighting for justice & dignity. Thank you @POTUS.

name: E. Warren
text:
Gun violence is an urgent public health crisis. It‚Äôs time to start treating it like one.

@Surgeon_General‚Äôs announcement is a much-needed call for our government to study this crisis and protect the American public.

name: E. Warren
text:
.@POTUS's SAVE plan eased the burden of monthly student loan payments for millions.

What did radical Republicans do? They sued to block relief for their own constituents.

Now, thanks to extremists and the Supreme Court, working people will pay the price.nytimes.com/2024/06/24/busin‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Corporations are doing everything they can to rip off Americans and make an extra buck - even by using unfair and illegal practices.

The Biden admin is fighting back. In 2023 alone, @linakhanFTC and @FTC returned $324 million to consumers who were ripped off. That's a big deal.

name: E. Warren
text:
Home prices hit a record high. Also at a decades long high? Interest rates. 

The Fed needs to lower interest rates and we must build more housing to bring down costs for families. wsj.com/economy/housing/home‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Today marks 2 years since Donald Trump‚Äôs Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade.

We will not forget that Republican politicians unleashed this new form of hell on us. As extremists try to ban abortion, IVF, and birth control, we will not back down. We will fight back.

name: E. Warren
text:
Giant corporations used inflation as a cover to raise prices.

Then, they shrunk their products but kept the prices the same.

Now, they may use electronic labels to surge pricing.

Tackling high costs means standing up to giant corporations. Period.

name: E. Warren
text:
Thanks to @POTUS Biden's Inflation Reduction Act:
- Medicare, for the first time, can negotiate lower drug prices
- No senior will pay more than $2,000 out-of-pocket for prescription drugs or more than $35 per month for insulin.¬†

It's a big deal! washingtonpost.com/opinions/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Why is health care so expensive? Wall street-backed companies are stomping out real competition, buying every link in the health care chain, and colluding to keep prices high.
¬†
It's great to see @TheJusticeDept & Jonathan Kanter crack down.
news.bloomberglaw.com/antitr‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: President Biden has canceled more student loan debt for more Americans than any president in history ‚Äî nearly 5 million Americans. That is life-changing.

name: E. Warren
text:
Republican politicians want to slash taxes for giant corporations and the ultra-rich. 

@POTUS Biden is canceling student debt for millions of hardworking Americans, half of whom have no household wealth. The contrast couldn‚Äôt be more clear.

name: E. Warren
text:
Right-wing billionaires hoped an obscure legal case would blow up the tax code to avoid paying what they owe, but this effort failed at the Supreme Court.

The fight goes on to tax the rich, pass a wealth tax on ultra-millionaires and billionaires, and make the system more fair.

name: E. Warren
text:
Families shouldn‚Äôt live in fear of being torn apart by our immigration system. President Biden‚Äôs announcement is the right move and brings long-needed relief to mixed-status families.¬†

We need to see additional pathways to citizenship that keep families together.

name: E. Warren
text:
In 2022, President Biden signed the biggest climate package in history ‚Äî and a good chunk of it was paid for by my 15% minimum tax on billionaire corporations. 

This law is helping us tackle the climate crisis and creating hundreds of thousands of good union jobs too.

name: E. Warren
text:
Turning private equity and corporate greed loose in our health care system kills people. We need real accountability now.
¬†
I introduced my Corporate Crimes Against Health Care Act to prevent what happened with Steward from ever happening again.
¬†
boston.com/news/health/2024/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text: Sen. Elizabeth Warren is accusing Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell of doing the financial industry‚Äôs bidding by considering changes to a sweeping set of regulations aimed at boosting the capital cushion that large American banks would be required to hold. cnb.cx/3VQa81G

name: E. Warren
text:
When just a few companies make a generic drug, prices can skyrocket, forcing families to choose between paying rent & taking medicine. It's wrong. 

My Affordable Drug Manufacturing Act allows the government to step in when the market fails, boosting competition & cutting prices.

name: E. Warren
text:
At the end of the 2025 tax reform process, large corporations must pay higher taxes. 

A typical billionaire must pay a higher tax rate than a typical middle-class family. 

And wealthy tax cheats must be sweating because the IRS has enough money to enforce the law.

name: E. Warren
text:
It's time to stiffen our spines.

President Biden is right: if the 2025 tax bill doesn‚Äôt call on the wealthy and giant corporations to shoulder a bigger share of what it costs to run this country, Democrats should reject it outright.

No more Trump tax breaks for billionaires.

name: E. Warren
text:
The super wealthy use complex tax schemes to avoid paying what they owe. @TreasuryDepSec and @IRSnews are right to end these shell games.

Thanks to President Biden and Democrats in Congress, a well-funded IRS is closing a loophole to make the rich pay their taxes.

name: E. Warren
text:
Insurance companies shouldn't be secretly paying financial agents with cars & vacations to deliberately give bad advice to people working toward retirement. 

The Biden admin is fighting back with a new rule requiring advisors to do right by clients & not put families' savings at risk.

nytimes.com/2024/03/26/busin‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Overturning Roe is just the tip of the iceberg for extremist anti-abortion politicians. 

Republican politicians are pushing to ban abortion nationwide, restrict access to birth control, and even limit prenatal care. It‚Äôs extreme, and it‚Äôs dangerous.

name: E. Warren
text: American families are already being squeezed by the price gouging and junk fees of giant corporations ‚Äì they shouldn‚Äôt have to subsidize another giant corporate tax break too.

name: E. Warren
text: Big Pharma. Trump‚Äôs new corporate tax cut plan would hand the five largest drug makers $3.1 billion per year, after they reported over $50 billion in profits last year.

name: E. Warren
text: Big Oil. Trump wants to give the five largest U.S. oil companies a $2.5 billion annual tax cut, which made more than $90 billion in profits last year.

name: E. Warren
text: Big Banks. Trump‚Äôs 2nd corporate tax cut would give $4.1 billion per year to 5 of the largest Wall Street banks, which reported nearly $113 billion in profits last year.

name: E. Warren
text:
Trump‚Äôs one legislative accomplishment is a $2 trillion tax cut for the wealthy & corporations. Now he‚Äôs proposing another giant tax cut - $48 billion per year to just the Fortune 100, which raked in $1.1 trillion in profits last year.

Here‚Äôs who your money would be going to:

name: E. Warren
text:
It's no shock prices are high when companies are price gouging and fixing their prices.

Look at the sugar industry - a new case alleges that sugar companies coordinated price hikes. The result? Prices increased by nearly 60% between 2019 to 2023.

foodandpower.net/latest/suga‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
Bump stocks are designed to kill en masse by converting firearms into machine guns. This Supreme Court decision keeps a dangerous loophole in place and enables mass shooters to inflict carnage.

Congress must ban bump stocks and take immediate action to prevent gun violence.

name: E. Warren
text:
Junk fees are one way that big companies like Ticketmaster jack up prices and squeeze people for every last penny.

The @CFPB is standing up for working people and cracking down on junk fees.

name: E. Warren
text:
Chair Powell has allowed a culture of corruption to fester at the Fed. His long-delayed ethics policy doesn't fix a thing.

Top Fed officials should not be making trades with inside information ‚Äì and we need a strong ethics policy to hold them accountable.

bloomberg.com/news/articles/‚Ä¶

name: E. Warren
text:
I‚Äôm on my way to vote to protect access to IVF.

text: The Supreme Court has confirmed that the way Congress chose to fund the @CFPB is constitutional. It is now beyond dispute that arguments about the CFPB‚Äôs funding should provide no basis to challenge our work on behalf of the American people.

text:

text:

text: The @CFPB is here to stay! In a 7-2 decision, the Supreme Court followed the law and confirmed that the CFPB‚Äôs funding structure is constitutional.

text:

text:

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Unique to America, our health care system is designed not to make people well, but to make CEOs & wealthy stockholders incredibly rich. The result: We have the highest infant mortality rate of any wealthy country on earth. How cruel, how immoral is that? We need Medicare for All.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Medicare for All isn't radical.

What's radical is that we are the only major country not to guarantee health care as a human right. Every other major country figured out years ago how to provide health care to all at a much lower cost.

Please don't tell me we can't do the same.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Secretary Lutnick: You are a billionaire. 

Maybe your mother-in-law wouldn't complain if she didn't get her Social Security check, but tens of millions of seniors struggling to survive would. They're not fraudsters. They earned it. 

How out of touch are you not to realize that?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The United States of America is the only major country on earth that does not guarantee health care as a human right. 

The result: We rank dead last among wealthy nations in life expectancy. 

We must end that international embarrassment. 

Yes. We need Medicare for All.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Right now, we have an authoritarian president. 

He called CNN "illegal." He is trying to encroach on the spending powers of Congress. He is going after the courts. 

Trump does not respect our Constitution. He just wants more and more power for himself.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
At a recent Veterans' Affairs Committee meeting, I made it abundantly clear: I agree with the Veterans of Foreign Wars (VFW):

Arbitrarily laying off 83,000 VA employees and lowering the quality of health care that veterans receive is absolutely unacceptable.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
If Republicans cut $880 billion from Medicaid:

- Millions of children will lose their health care.

- Funding for community health centers will dry up.

- Your mom and dad may not be able to get the nursing home care they need.

That's what happens when Musk runs the government.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Do you know why Americans are angry? 

Over the last 50 years, real weekly wages have been stagnant.¬† 

At the same time, there was a $79 trillion transfer of wealth from the bottom 90% to the top 1%. 

We need an economy that works for all, not just billionaires.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Netanyahu has not allowed any food, water, or fuel into Gaza in two weeks. 

Now he has resumed bombing, killing hundreds of people and breaking the ceasefire that had given Gaza a chance to live again. 

NO MORE MILITARY AID TO ISRAEL.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
10 years ago, when I introduced a bill to make public colleges & universities tuition free, it was called "radical." Not today. Over 100 colleges & universities now offer free tuition to working class students.

Now, we must expand that idea to all public colleges & universities.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Not surprisingly, Trump‚Äôs overall tax and tariff proposals would make the very rich much richer and working families poorer. 

If you earn less than $360,000 a year, your taxes are going to go way up.
 
If you‚Äôre in the top 1%? Don‚Äôt worry. You‚Äôll save big.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today, we have more income and wealth inequality than ever before.

But the greed of the oligarchs never stops.¬† 

Now, in order to get huge tax breaks, they want to cut back on Social Security, Medicaid and veterans programs.

Together we can stop them.¬† We must stop them.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
STRESS KILLS.

60% of Americans live paycheck to paycheck, struggling every day to keep their families going.¬†¬†

The result: working class people die 7 years earlier than the rich.

We need an economy that works for all, not just the few.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We have a health care crisis in this country. 
 
Americans are dying because they can't afford to see a doctor. 
 
We agreed on BIPARTISAN legislation to improve health care in America. 
 
And one Republican kills the bill.
 
The American people are watching.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The terrible CR Budget bill ‚Äî written by right-wing House Republicans with no input from anybody but themselves ‚Äî was passed tonight with the support of 10 Democrats.
¬†
An absolute failure of Democratic leadership. NOBODY in the Senate should have voted for this dangerous bill.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
It is unconscionable that Geisinger nurses are not guaranteed quality health care by their employer.

Geisinger: do the right thing. Get back to the table and give your nurses the same quality of care that they provide to patients.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Yes a shutdown would have consequences.

And a Republican President, Republican House, and Republican Senate would be responsible.

They have acted in a unilateral and unprecedented way.

Democrats cannot cave. They must fight back.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: This CR would literally take food out of the mouths of hungry children, take healthcare away from seniors, and give a huge tax break to the wealthiest people on the planet. It cannot pass. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1MnGnworn‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The CR passed in the House will provide a blank check for Trump and Musk to continue their savage war against working families, the elderly, children, the sick and the poor in order to lay the groundwork for massive tax breaks for billionaires.

This is a bill I cannot support.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
No, Mr. President, you cannot illegally arrest and detain legal US residents because of their political views or opinions.
 
In America, we have a little something called the First Amendment.
 
Throwing protesters in jail is yet another step on the path to authoritarianism.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Don‚Äôt tell me that Trump/Musk are not trying to destroy Social Security.

30,000 people died last year while waiting to get their benefits.

Under this new policy, those numbers will skyrocket.

We can‚Äôt kill seniors so that billionaires get their tax breaks.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We are supposed to be a democracy.

Elected officials are supposed to listen to the vast majority of the American people when they say:

NO tax breaks for the ultra-wealthy

NO cuts to Medicaid

NO more billionaires buying elections

name: Bernie Sanders
text: There is a reason Elon Musk and Donald Trump LIE about Social Security.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Senator Mark Kelly is a combat fighter pilot and Navy captain who bravely served his country. 
¬†
Elon Musk is a multi-billionaire trying to dismantle the VA who called Kelly, a veteran who put his life on the line, a ‚Äútraitor.‚Äù
¬†
Disgusting.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
LIVE: I'm on the Senate floor asking my colleagues a simple question: 

Isn't it time for Congress to respond to the demands of 92% of the American people who want to expand Medicare to cover dental, vision and hearing?

I have a bill to do just that. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1OdKrDdam‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text: cbsnews.com/news/education-d‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Let‚Äôs be clear: the Dept. of Ed. provides resources to 26 million children living in high-poverty school districts; Pell Grants to over 7 million students; & funding for millions of children with disabilities. 

Closing its doors would be a disaster for working class families.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I was pleased to meet today with Dr. Tedros, head of the World Health Organization. 

In order to combat future pandemics there must be global cooperation.  

Trump‚Äôs withdrawal from the WHO puts us, and people around the world, at greater risk of preventable deaths.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
For the first time in 10 years, a child has died from measles in the United States.
 
Vaccines prevent measles.
 
Americans need to hear our top health officials say clearly: every child in America should get vaccinated against this terrible disease.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Lincoln talked about a government of the people, by the people, for the people.

Today, with Trump as our president, we have a government of the billionaires, by the billionaires, for the billionaires.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Cutting off humanitarian aid to millions of civilians is a war crime. That is exactly what the extremist Netanyahu government is doing now to Palestinians in Gaza.

I‚Äôve introduced resolutions to block billions in offensive arms sales to Israel & will demand votes on these bills.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Mr. Musk plans to layoff 83,000 workers at the VA. That means lower quality care for our vets. Unacceptable.

I agree with the VFW: The VA must ‚Äúreconsider its planned reduction of 83,000 employees & thoroughly review any proposed cuts prior to rolling out further announcements.‚Äù

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Elon Musk's plan to cut the Social Security Administration's staff by 50% would cause 37,000 more Americans to die each year waiting to receive their disability benefits while the average wait time to collect these benefits would jump to 412 days. 

That is beyond unacceptable.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This is what it looks like when the federal government cuts essential funding for programs that support working class families:

Kids go hungry. Families worry about keeping a roof over their heads. Communities suffer.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The massive income and wealth inequality that exists in America today is literally a matter of life and death.

People in wealthy counties live SEVEN years longer than people in poorer communities. That‚Äôs unacceptable.

EVERYONE has the right to a long, happy and productive life.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I have talked to veterans all over the country. They‚Äôre not happy that, when the VA is already understaffed, Musk wants to dismember the VA by laying off 83,000 employees. 

A commitment has been made to those who put their lives on the line to defend us. We must not betray them.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Trump and Musk are going after Social Security, Medicaid, the VA, and public education.

In what universe, in what world, in what religion is it morally acceptable to cut programs for hungry children in order to reward the wealthy?

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Musk says millions of dead people get Social Security. That's a lie. Here's the truth: 30,000 people die a year waiting for an understaffed Social Security to approve disability benefits. Musk's plan to cut Social Security's staff by 50% will make this tragic reality even worse.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Elon Musk, at the behest of President Trump, is now on the warpath against the working families of our country.
 
Saving money by illegally and unconstitutionally dismantling the Dept. of Education so that the billionaire class can get bigger tax breaks is morally reprehensible.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Musk and Trump are working feverishly to cut Social Security, Medicaid, the VA, public education, nutrition and other programs. 

Why? So Musk and other billionaires can get a huge tax break.  

Together, we‚Äôre not going to let them get away with that.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: The stakes are just too high.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: LIVE from the Senate Floor: Now more than ever before, the Senate must come together in a bipartisan manner to make it clear that we stand with Ukraine and fellow democracies throughout the world, and not with the murderous dictator of Russia. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1PlKQMlBd‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Great to meet with VFW members from Vermont. 

These are the men and women who put their lives on the line to defend our country. 

We are proud of them and what they've done. 

No cuts to the VA. No privatization.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
When Trump effectively shuts down the NLRB, corporate bosses can illegally fire workers who are trying to form a union and flagrantly violate labor laws.

Today, I am reintroducing the PRO Act to strengthen unions, and restore power and legal rights to workers.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Trump wants to fire 83k VA workers, many of whom are veterans themselves, decimating the VA & making it harder for veterans to get health care & benefits. 

When Americans put their lives on the line to defend our country, we must keep our commitments to them ‚Äî not betray them.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
At a time when the Social Security Administration is grossly understaffed, Trump plans to lay off up to 50% of its employees.

Outrageous.

This will make it HARDER for Americans to get the services they need. 

This is clearly a step toward the privatization of Social Security.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: LIVE: President Trump‚Äôs Congressional Address needs a response. Here‚Äôs mine. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1zqJVjvdY‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Elon Musk and Donald Trump‚Äôs dismantling of USAID will lead to millions of preventable deaths.
 
The decision of the richest person in the world to destroy an agency that delivers life-saving aid to the poorest people on the planet is unconscionable.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
For 250 years, the United States has supported democracy. 

Now, in the middle of a horrific war that Putin started, Trump is turning his back on Ukraine and democracy, all to the benefit of a brutal dictator in Moscow.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Late tonight, I will deliver a response to President Trump's Congressional Address. 

NO to Oligarchy. NO to Authoritarianism. YES to Democracy and an economy that works for all. 

I hope you'll join us.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Netanyahu‚Äôs extremist government has halted ALL humanitarian aid into Gaza.
 
Starving children is a war crime.
 
UN leaders said: "International humanitarian law is clear: we must be allowed access to deliver vital lifesaving aid. We need to get aid in and the hostages out.‚Äù

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
No. Now is not the time to play dead. 

The Democrats have already played dead for too many years.
 
60% of our people are living paycheck to paycheck. Millions of seniors are going hungry.

Now is the time to stand up for the working class of this country.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Meet Trump's new best friend, Vladimir Putin.

At the heart of Putin‚Äôs rule are two forces: corruption & violence.

In Putin's Russia, there is no freedom of speech. Protests are violently suppressed. Dissidents are murdered. And the billionaire oligarchs become even richer.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Medicaid is quite literally a matter of life and death for people across this country.

Don‚Äôt take it from me, take it from people like Ashley, whose husband‚Äôs life was saved by Medicaid.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Putin can‚Äôt believe his luck. Here is Kremlin spokesman Dmitri Peskov on Trump: ‚ÄúThe new administration is fast changing all foreign policy configurations‚Ä¶This coincides with our vision in many ways.‚Äù 

Trump now backs dictatorship, not democracy. We cannot allow that to stand.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
If Republicans make massive cuts to Medicaid, it will impact all aspects of our health care system. Millions of kids will lose coverage, hospital and insurance rates will soar and nursing homes will shut down.

All this in order to give huge tax breaks to billionaires.¬†

NO CUTS TO MEDICAID.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Trump berates Zelensky, the leader of a democratic country courageously fighting Russian imperialism, while he allies himself with Putin, a dictator who started the bloodiest European war in 80 years.  

Sorry, President Trump. We believe in democracy, not authoritarianism.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
It was great to talk today with UFCW Local 7 in CO who recently ended a 12-day strike involving 10,000 King Soopers workers. 

Kroger: it‚Äôs time to do what‚Äôs right. Negotiate a fair contract with your workers. Stop ripping off consumers with high prices at your grocery stores.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: LIVE: From the Senate Floor: Instead of cutting Social Security and giving tax breaks to billionaires, Congress must expand Social Security, so that every senior in America can retire with dignity nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1eaJbWMEL‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
It doesn't matter who Donald Trump "nominates."

The next Secretary of Labor,  Secretary of Education, Secretary of Treasury, and Secretary of Housing ... is Elon Musk.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I want to thank the 34,000 Vermonters who joined Sen. Welch, Rep. Balint and me in our delegation town hall by phone & online. 

An extraordinary turnout for a state of 650,000 people. Needless to say, the people of VT are deeply concerned about what‚Äôs going on in DC right now.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We need a Labor Secretary who will be a champion of working families.

We need a Labor Secretary who will raise the minimum wage and vigorously defend workers' right to bargain collectively.

We need a Labor Secretary who has the courage to stand up to an anti-worker POTUS.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I met some of our nation‚Äôs veterans this week in the hall and shared with them a grave concern:
 
Privatizing the VA would be an insult to the more than 18 million veterans who risked their lives to defend our country.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I appreciated meeting with Vermont veterans to discuss veteran homelessness, mental health, health care and other issues at the VA.

Veterans put their lives on the line for this country. We must do everything in our power to ensure they receive the benefits & care they earned.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Medicaid provides 40% of the funding for community health centers.

Medicaid supports 2 out of 3 people in nursing homes.

Medicaid provides health care to 41 million children.

Trump and his Republican friends want to enact massive cuts to the program.

We won't let them.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Three years ago today, Putin's tanks rolled into Ukraine, and Russian aircraft began bombing the country. 

Trump is lying. Russia started the war, not Ukraine. 

Putin is a dictator, not Zelensky.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Please. No more speeches in the Senate about ‚Äúfreedom‚Äù until one Republican has the guts to stand up to Trump‚Äôs lies about Ukraine & Putin. Ukraine did not start this horrific war. Russia did. Zelensky isn't a dictator. Putin is. The US must not enter into an alliance with Putin.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: This week, I was on the floor to discuss the state of our country, and what‚Äôs at stake: nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1yoKMobDD‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text: NO. At a time of massive income and wealth inequality we should not be giving tax breaks to billionaires. We should demand that they start paying their fair share.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
LIVE: I‚Äôm on the Senate floor asking my Republican colleagues:

When will you stand up to the President of the United States and call him out on his lies? nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1yNGaLoNq‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In the wealthiest nation on earth, 25% of seniors should not be living on $15,000 a year or less. 

We should EXPAND Social Security, not cut it. I will soon be introducing legislation to significantly raise Social Security benefits and extend the solvency of the program.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Legislation that I passed and was funded by Congress, Solar for All, could reduce electric bills for working class families by 80%.

The Trump Admin is refusing to release the money in order to protect the profits of fossil fuel billionaires.

Unacceptable. Release the funds NOW.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We are witnessing a very sad moment in American history.

The President of the United States is aligning himself with the dictator of Russia, Vladimir Putin, to undermine the independence of Ukraine and its democracy.

Here are my thoughts:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Working class Americans live 6 years shorter lives than the wealthy. Doctors believe economic stress is a major factor in that disparity. 

I asked Americans to describe how stress impacts their lives & well-being. The responses were heartbreaking. 

Here are some of them:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Winston Churchill was right: "Democracy is the worst form of government except for all those other forms that have been tried.‚Äù  

Too many Americans have fought and died defending democracy. We must stand with our European allies against the authoritarianism of Putin and Trump.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: theguardian.com/commentisfre‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Republicans will soon bring forward a ‚Äúreconciliation‚Äù bill, that encapsulates the value system of greed and their obedience to oligarchy. 

It is the economic essence of Trumpism. It will make the rich richer & the poor poorer. 

It must be defeated. And we can defeat it.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Trump and his American oligarchs are now openly aligning themselves with Putin and his Russian oligarchs. 

This Putin-Trump alliance means abandoning our allies, supporting authoritarianism and undermining our democratic traditions.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The oligarchs' nightmare is that we will not allow ourselves to be divided up.

Their worst fear is that we will come together and have the courage to take them on.

It won't be easy. They control the government & own the media.
 
But we cannot despair. We will fight. We will win.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Veterans deserve the best health care available. At a time when the VA is already understaffed, these layoffs will hurt veterans. Unacceptable.

Trump must not cut VA health care so that he can give tax breaks to Musk and other billionaires.

The VA must rescind this order.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
While Trump appoints 13 billionaires to his cabinet and Musk, Bezos and Zuckerberg see their wealth increase by $217 billion since the election, 60% of Americans live paycheck to paycheck, 25% of seniors live on $15g or less and millions cannot afford rent. 

SAY NO TO OLIGARCHY.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Republicans aren‚Äôt hiding anything. Their priorities are written in black and white: trillions of dollars in tax breaks to the rich, while making savage cuts to Medicaid, housing, nutrition and education. The reconciliation bill will make the rich even richer and the poor poorer.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
While Trump ‚Äúfloods the zone,‚Äù we must stay focused.¬†

NO to oligarchy, tax breaks for the rich and cuts to working class programs.¬†NO to authoritarianism and unlimited power for one man.

YES to growing the union movement and raising wages.¬†YES to health care as a human right.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
European friends: Do not accept lectures on democracy & freedom of speech from an Administration that denies the 2020 election results and is now suing & intimidating news outlets whose reporting they don‚Äôt like. 

Stand tall against right-wing extremism.

nytimes.com/2025/02/15/world‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Public education is the backbone of American democracy.

In the richest country in the history of the world, we cannot abandon our teachers and our public schools.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
As Robert F. Kennedy becomes Secretary of HHS, we must remember that ‚ÄúJust asking questions‚Äù about vaccines, and casting doubt on well-established science could have fatal consequences. Just ask the people of South Africa. 

Researchers estimate over 300,000 South Africans died because their leaders denied scientific truths.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: foxnews.com/opinion/sens-ber‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
77% of the American people want to cap credit card interest rates. It is about time that we listened to them.

Congress must provide financial relief to working families struggling to pay for the high price of groceries, rent, gasoline, and prescription drugs.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Privatizing public education will create an increasingly segregated school system in America ‚Äì not just based on race, but by class.  

We must not have a two-tier educational system: Private schools for the wealthy, and public schools for low-income and working-class students.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
At a time of massive income & wealth inequality, Republicans in Congress just introduced a budget to provide trillions in tax breaks to the wealthy, paid for by massive cuts to Medicaid that will throw millions of kids off health care & seniors out of nursing homes. 

Unacceptable.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Conservative billionaires are funding a coordinated effort to dismantle public education to pay for private school vouchers that largely benefit wealthy families and enable corporations to avoid their fair share in taxes. 

Now they have a friend in the White House.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This is Oligarchy. The three richest men in the world have become $196 BILLION richer since Donald Trump was elected. 

$196 billion for three men in 99 days. 

Meanwhile, 60% of Americans live paycheck to paycheck.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The top health care companies in America spent 95% of their profits to make their CEOs & stockholders obscenely rich.

How many Americans would be alive today if those companies spent $2.6 trillion on disease prevention and primary care, instead of stock buybacks and dividends?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Working class Americans have a significantly shorter lifespan than people who are wealthy.

Why? Economic stress can have a major impact upon your body, your mind & how long you live. 

I‚Äôd love to hear from you: How has stress affected your heath?
outreach.senate.gov/iqextran‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Musk & his fellow oligarchs feel entitled to power, control & wealth. In other words, they think they're modern-day kings. 

They think it is their RIGHT to rule. 

I'm LIVE on the Senate Floor to discuss oligarchy's war on the working class. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1YqKDZzOm‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
47,000+ Palestinians killed. 111,000 injured. 

Trump‚Äôs response? Forcibly expel Palestinians to make Gaza ‚Äúa real estate development for the future. A beautiful piece of land.‚Äù¬†

No. Gaza must be rebuilt for the Palestinian people, not billionaire tourists.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
At least $12 *trillion* from global oligarchs is hidden offshore in secret tax havens worldwide. And it is headquartered right here in the USA.
 
Instead of cutting lifesaving programs like the VA, Medicaid, and food stamps, we should be cracking down on tax havens for the ultra-rich.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Now, on top of everything else, we see the blatant racism of the Musk-Trump agenda.

As a result of the legacy of apartheid, White South Africans, 8% of the population, own 3/4 of the country‚Äôs farmland while Black South Africans, 80% of the population, own just 4%.¬†

And Musk-Trump are worried about discrimination against Whites.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Republicans want to slash Medicaid ‚Äî a death sentence for thousands of Americans.¬†Medicaid provides health care to more than 37 million kids, funding for 2/3 of seniors in nursing homes & is 40% of the revenue for community health centers.¬†

We must EXPAND Medicaid, not cut it.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Our current health care system is not designed to provide quality care to all people.

It is designed to make huge profits for insurance & drug companies.

In that sense, the system is working very well.

But it is not working for the average American.

We need Medicare for All.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Trump claims he‚Äôs on the side of the working class. Really?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Is the criteria to be an FBI agent swearing allegiance to the Constitution? 

Or is it swearing allegiance to Donald Trump?

name: Bernie Sanders
text: This week, I gave a speech on the floor of the Senate to discuss how President Trump has brought our country closer to authoritarianism, oligarchy, and kleptocracy. Tune in: nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1kvJpyrqg‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The world‚Äôs richest man has decided that the world‚Äôs richest country shouldn't help some of the world‚Äôs poorest people.
 
This is blatantly illegal. An unelected billionaire cannot simply shut down federal agencies authorized by Congress at will.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
By illegally neutering the National Labor Relations Board, Trump has enabled Jeff Bezos, the 2nd wealthiest man alive, to ignore the union victory at Whole Foods in Philadelphia. 

Trump has given the green light to corporations to violate labor law with impunity. Unacceptable.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The "peace candidate" Trump wants to force 2 million Palestinians from their homes, give another $1 billion in weapons to Netanyahu, and enact a "plan" to turn the decimated Gaza strip into a billionaires' Riviera.
 
If this is his "peace" policy, I'd hate to see his war policy.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Musk, Zuckerberg and Bezos are working with Trump for one very simple reason:

They understand that Trump's policies are designed to make the wealthiest Americans even richer. 

These three men have become $232 billion richer since November.

Not bad in a couple of months‚Äô time!

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
How do you Make America Healthy Again if 1 out of 4 people in this country cannot afford the medication that their doctors prescribe?
 
This country will not be healthy until we guarantee health care as a human right to every man, woman and child who lives here.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: I'm LIVE on the Senate floor to discuss America's dangerous movement toward oligarchy, authoritarianism & kleptocracy nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1nAKEgOmq‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I voted to reject RFK Jr.'s nomination to HHS. 

I cannot in good conscience support someone who denies and will dilute our public health protections, sow distrust in science and oversee massive cuts to health care programs for vulnerable Americans.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Trump pledged to cap credit card interest rates at 10%. 

Today, I introduced legislation with Sen. Hawley to do just that. 

We cannot continue to allow big banks to rip-off Americans by charging outrageously high credit card interest rates of 25 or 30%.
nytimes.com/2025/02/04/busin‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Just like Bezos and Musk wished, Trump neutered the National Labor Relations Board. 

Now, union-busting corporations can exploit their employees with impunity. 

Last I checked, that's not standing with workers the way Trump promised.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The US spends 2x more per capita on health care than any other nation. Yet 85 million are uninsured or underinsured, 68,000 die because they can‚Äôt afford a doctor & we pay the highest prices in the world for Rx drugs. 

Health care is a human right. We must pass Medicare for All.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Trump‚Äôs unilateral decision to impose a 25% tariff on Canada and Mexico is most likely illegal and most definitely harmful.¬† 

Economists estimate that these will increase costs for the average American family by as much as $1,200 a year.

We need to drive prices DOWN, not UP.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
When millions of struggling workers want to join unions, Trump's decision to neuter  the NLRB is blatantly illegal. It is also a huge gift to Musk, Bezos & other billionaires who want to abolish the only federal agency that can stop their union busting. 
washingtonpost.com/technolog‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Let me say something to Americans who are justifiably worried right now.

While Republicans may control the House and the Senate, their margins are slim.

They are susceptible to citizen outrage. If they try to give tax breaks to billionaires while cutting Medicare, FIGHT BACK.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Vermonters & Americans need lower electric bills.

I'm outraged that Trump‚Äôs EPA put an illegal hold on funding Solar for All, which could lower electric bills for working families by 80% through the installation of solar panels on rooftops. The funding freeze must be rescinded.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The plane crash outside of Washington last night is devastating.

My thoughts are with the families and friends of all of those killed.

I also want to thank the first responders who did an outstanding job responding to this tragedy.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Yes, the system is broken.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Scientists estimate that the COVID vaccine saved 3 million lives and prevented 18 million hospitalizations. 

President Trump called it "one of the greatest miracles of the ages."

RFK Jr. asked the FDA to revoke the emergency use of vaccines.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
RFK Jr. wants evidence that vaccines do not cause autism. 

The evidence is there. He refuses to see it.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: I asked RFK Jr. a simple question:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
RFK's Children's Health Defense is making money selling a child's onesie with the phrases "No Vax, No Problem" and "Unvaxxed, Unafraid" to parents for $26. 

Now that RFK is "pro-vaccine", will he ask his organization to stop selling these vehemently anti-vaccine products?

name: Bernie Sanders
text: I have never seen anyone flip as quickly as Robert F. Kennedy did on the question of whether a woman has the right to control her own body.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I like the slogan "Make America Healthy Again." 

I agree with that effort. 

But when I asked Robert F. Kennedy if health care is a human right, he couldn't give me an answer:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The president can veto or support legislation. He can make recommendations to Congress. But he doesn't have the unilateral right to change laws.

Trump has very little respect for the rule of law & our Constitution. He is moving us toward authoritarianism.

We must stop him.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The Trump Administration‚Äôs action to suspend all federal grants & loans will have a devastating impact on the health and well-being of millions of children, seniors on fixed incomes, and the most vulnerable people in our country. 

It is a dangerous move towards authoritarianism.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Mr. President: Instead of stealing Greenland from Denmark, I have a better idea.
¬†
In Denmark, everyone is guaranteed health care, college education is free, parents receive 1-year of paid paternity leave & workers don‚Äôt make less than $22 an hour.¬†

Let's steal those ideas.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Trump is trying to bully our allies Canada, Colombia, Denmark, and Panama, threatening tariffs if they don't do what he says.

Really? 

What about imposing tariffs on drug companies that charge us 10 times more than other countries pay for the same drug?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Trump said he wants to ‚Äúclean out‚Äù Gaza and push the millions of Palestinians living there into neighboring countries.

There is a name for this ‚Äî ethnic cleansing ‚Äî and it‚Äôs a war crime.

This outrageous idea should be condemned by every American.

washingtonpost.com/politics/‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
While 60% of Americans live paycheck to paycheck, Musk, Bezos and Zuckerberg, combined, own more wealth than the bottom half of America.¬†

Apparently, that‚Äôs not enough. Republicans want to give them a massive tax break by slashing Medicaid.

Together, we will stop them.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This is what we mean when we talk about corporate greed: Starbucks gave its CEO $96 million for just 4 months of work. Meanwhile, Starbucks is refusing to offer a raise of more than 50 cents an hour to 12,000 union workers.
 
That's unacceptable. Starbucks must end their greed.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Hegseth has defended war criminals & rejected international law. He‚Äôs a prominent advocate for privatizing the VA. He was forced to step down from leading two advocacy groups after repeated allegations of financial mismanagement, sexual harassment & alcohol abuse. I‚Äôm voting NO.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Vaccines have saved millions of lives, prevented massive human suffering and stopped the spread of infectious diseases like polio, smallpox & measles.

Despite this, an increasing number of Americans are raising questions about vaccines. 

So we asked doctors to answer them:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In the new Trump presidency, we have got to remain focused. We can‚Äôt panic. 

No matter how many executive orders he signs or statements he issues, our goal is the same:

We must fight to create an America based on economic, social & environmental justice.
theguardian.com/commentisfre‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
When someone puts their life on the line to defend this country in uniform, we in turn, promise them health care after their service.

Trump froze all hiring at the VA at a time when the VA is experiencing a shortage of doctors & nurses. Unacceptable. Our veterans deserve better.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Elon Musk has been backing neo-Nazi parties around the world, interfering in elections and using his massive platform to attack anyone who doesn‚Äôt share his extreme right-wing views.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: LIVE: Many Americans have pressing questions about vaccines and their public health impact. I've brought together doctors and scientific experts to answer them. Join us. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1LyxBggNr‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
As someone who was on the Hill that day, I'm grateful to the officers who put their lives on the line to defend myself and my colleagues. 

It's outrageous that the President would betray officers who defended our democracy by absolving violent insurrectionists of their crimes.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
President Trump: You do not stand for law and order when you give a free pass to rioters who attacked the police. 

In fact, you are signaling that violence is okay and attacking law enforcement is acceptable behavior.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today, Pres. Trump gave a sweeping legal reprieve to nearly 1,600 defendants who attacked the US Capitol on January 6, 2021, including those convicted of violent crimes & seditious conspiracy.

More than 150 police officers were assaulted during that attack. Some eventually died.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I attended Trump‚Äôs inauguration yesterday.

Here are my thoughts:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I am delighted that 3 Israeli hostages have been released today. 

The immediate goal is that the ceasefire must hold, the hostage-prisoner exchange must be completed, and massive humanitarian aid must reach starving Palestinians.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I look forward to working with President Trump when he stands with the working families of this country. 

I will vigorously oppose him when he represents the needs of the billionaire class and wealthy special interests.

foxnews.com/opinion/sen-bern‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Yes. We must protect the privacy and data of the American people. 

Shutting down this entire platform is not the answer.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: SCOTUS is wrong. Last year, I voted against the TikTok ban because I feared Congress getting into the business of shutting down media platforms in violation of the 1st Amendment. If implemented, this ban would impact 170 million Americans who use TikTok for news & entertainment.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
My hope is that the war in Gaza will now end, and the hostages will finally return to their families.

But let's be clear: the US enabled this mass atrocity by providing an endless supply of weapons to Netanyahu and failing to exert real leverage. 

This must not happen again.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The Biden Administration is right in demanding that Medicare negotiate prices for Ozempic and Wegovy. 

We should not pay ten times more than other countries for prescription drugs.

The Trump administration must continue those policies.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Right now, in America, 22 million workers make less than $15/hr. 40 million make less than $17/hr.  

Shamefully, the federal minimum wage hasn't been raised since 2009 and remains at $7.25/hr.

I asked Trump's nominee for Treasury if we should raise it.

His response?

"No sir."

name: Bernie Sanders
text: I‚Äôm LIVE on the Senate floor to discuss the H-1B program, which replaces good-paying American jobs with hundreds of thousands of lower-paid guest workers from abroad who are often treated as indentured servants. That must change. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1ynJODyAb‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
A ceasefire-hostage deal in Gaza has been reached. This is welcome, long-overdue news. Both sides must honor it. 

The killing must stop. The hostages must be released. The UN must be allowed to provide humanitarian aid. There must be accountability for war crimes by both sides.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The mainstream media may not discuss it, but here's the fact: 

Three people ‚ÄîMusk, Bezos & Zuckerberg ‚Äî now own more wealth than the bottom half of American society. 

A handful of corporations control what is produced & the prices we pay. 

Capitalism is broken.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today's food label proposal by the FDA is pathetically weak.

Tobacco labels don't say, ‚ÄúHigh in tar, medium in nicotine & low in carcinogens.‚Äù They say, ‚ÄúCigarettes cause cancer."

We need warning labels on unhealthy products that make clear they could lead to serious illness.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
People are angry at a health insurance industry which denies people the care they desperately need while Big Pharma makes billions and billions of dollars in profit.
 
The time is long overdue to guarantee healthcare to every man, woman, and child in this country.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Musk is hiring ‚Äúsuper high-IQ small government revolutionaries‚Äù for DOGE.

What do these super-humans have in store for us mere mortals?

Will they create universal health care, address the housing crisis or climate change? 

Or will they just make the rich richer?

Stay tuned.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
American workers are more than 400% more productive than they were in the 1940s. 

But all of the economic gains are going straight to the top.

Workers deserve more.
 
It‚Äôs time for a 32-hour work week with no loss in pay.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Yes. We need to deal with excessive federal bureaucracy and waste. ¬†

But don‚Äôt kid yourself. 

Musk-Trump‚Äôs goal is to privatize USPS, the VA, NASA, Medicare, Medicaid, and Social Security and give them to their billionaire friends.

Oligarchy marches on ‚Äî unless we stop it.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Trump claims he wants to limit credit card interest rates to 10%. 

Great. So do I.

That‚Äôs why I'm introducing the legislation to do just that during this Congress.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In the wealthiest country on Earth, getting sick or injured shouldn‚Äôt ruin a family‚Äôs financial future. 

This rule is one step in the right direction.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: If there is truly a major shortage of skilled tech workers in this country,¬†why did Tesla lay-off over 7,500 American workers last year ‚Äî including many software developers and engineers at its factory in Austin, Texas ‚Äî while applying to hire thousands of H-1B guest workers?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Together, Bezos, Musk & Zuckerberg own more wealth than the bottom half of America. 

Billionaires are buying elections. 

And there's a greater concentration of ownership than at any time since the Gilded Age. 

Is that the society we want for our country?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The U.S. must not send more bombs to Netanyahu‚Äôs extremist government, which has already killed 45,000 people; destroyed Gaza's housing, healthcare, and educational systems; and caused starvation by blocking humanitarian aid. 

I will do all that I can to block these arms sales.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We are the wealthiest nation on earth. 

We should have the best health care systems in the world, not one of the worst. 

We should be the healthiest nation on earth, not 32nd in life expectancy out of 38 major countries.

We need major reforms in our broken health care system.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
It‚Äôs not just that the billionaires control the economy.

It‚Äôs not just that the billionaires increasingly control our political system.

It‚Äôs that these oligarchs also control the media and the information the American people receive. This is a very dangerous situation.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Expanding Medicare.

Expanding Social Security.

Fair taxation.

Fair trade policies.

These are just some of the reasons I am looking forward to joining the Senate Finance Committee.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We are losing the struggle for economic justice. While 60% of Americans live paycheck to paycheck, the gap between the 1% and everyone else is growing wider. 

We must take on oligarchy. commondreams.org/opinion/202‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Thank you to the people of Vermont for sending me to Washington for a fourth term in the United States Senate.

There are enormous challenges ahead as we fight for the needs of the working people in this country. I am grateful for your trust in me to take on this important work.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The past few years have seen an absolute explosion in foreign money sloshing around Washington ‚Äì especially from dictatorships.

The golden age of global oligarchy in Washington is here.

The only question now is: What are we going to do about it?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Elon Musk is wrong.

The main function of the H-1B visa program is not to hire ‚Äúthe best and the brightest,‚Äù but rather to replace good-paying American jobs with low-wage indentured servants from abroad.

The cheaper the labor they hire, the more money the billionaires make.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Here‚Äôs a question that needs answering: despite spending twice as much per capita on healthcare as other major countries, our life expectancy is, on average, almost 5 years lower. 

Even worse, working class Americans live 5-10 years shorter lives than the wealthy. 

Why is that? What can we do about it?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Almost 600,000 Americans are sleeping out on our streets.

Millions of people in this country are paying as much as 60% of their limited income on housing.

We must invest in low-income and affordable housing. Now.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We are the wealthiest nation on earth.

There is no rational reason why we are not the healthiest nation on earth.

If we‚Äôre going to reform our broken & dysfunctional health care system and ‚ÄúMake America Healthy Again,‚Äù this is some of what we must do. 
theguardian.com/commentisfre‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today, Medicare‚Äôs $2,000 cap on out-of-pocket drug costs goes into effect. 

That‚Äôs good progress, but we still have a long way to go. 

We must take on PHARMA greed.  Americans should not be paying, by far, the highest prices in the world for prescription drugs. 

We must make health care a human right.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: During the recent campaign Donald Trump proposed a 10% cap on credit card interest rates.  Great idea.  Let‚Äôs see if he supports the legislation that I will introduce to do just that.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I tried to raise the minimum wage to $15/hr.

Not ONE Republican supported it.

A $7.25/hr minimum wage is an absolute disgrace. Americans should not be forced to work for starvation wages.

We must raise the wage to at least $17/hr.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Jimmy Carter, both for what he did as president and in his later years, will be remembered as a decent, honest and down-to-earth man. He will be sorely missed. Jane and I send our condolences to the Carter family.
nytimes.com/live/2024/12/29/‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Our country is rapidly evolving into two Americas.

One, where the vast majority live, consists of millions of working class families struggling to get by. The other: less than a thousand billionaires who have never had it so good.

That is not democracy. That is oligarchy. sanders.senate.gov/op-eds/tw‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text: In the richest country on earth, millions of Americans work for starvation wages. Many states have done the right thing and raised their minimum wage. Now Congress must act. No U.S worker should live in poverty. I will reintroduce a bill to raise the minimum wage to $17 an hour.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Former State Senator Vincent Fort was one of the outstanding state legislators in the country. He was a fierce fighter for workers‚Äô rights, civil rights, consumers and the children of Georgia. He was truly the ‚ÄúPeople‚Äôs Champion.‚Äù He will be sorely missed.
fox5atlanta.com/news/vincent‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The precedent set today should upset every American who believes in our democratic form of government.

It appears that from now on no major legislation can be passed without the approval of the wealthiest person in this country.

That‚Äôs not democracy, that‚Äôs oligarchy.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Welcome to the world of oligarchy.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
While Mr. Bezos ‚Äî the 2nd wealthiest person in the world ‚Äî is dining with President Trump & engaging in illegal union busting, Amazon workers are on strike, fighting for decent wages and working conditions.

Amazon: Obey the law. Negotiate a fair contract with the Teamsters.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Democrats and Republicans spent months negotiating a bipartisan agreement to fund our government.

The richest man on Earth, President Elon Musk, doesn‚Äôt like it.

Will Republicans kiss the ring?

Billionaires must not be allowed to run our government.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
You want to talk about government efficiency?
 
We waste hundreds of billions a year on health care administrative expenses that make insurance CEOs and wealthy stockholders incredibly rich.
 
Expand Medicare to cover every American.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
When it comes to improving life for the working class in this country, what do I hear? ‚ÄúNo, no, no, we can‚Äôt afford it.‚Äù

But when it comes to the military-industrial complex? ‚ÄúYes, yes, yes‚Äù ‚Äì with almost no debate.

Congress needs to get its priorities straight.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Congratulations to the UVM Catamounts soccer team for defeating Marshall, 2-1, to win the Division One National Championship. 

Yup. Vermont is a soccer state!

name: Bernie Sanders
text: LIVE: As the holiday season approaches, it‚Äôs a good time to talk about our national priorities. Where we are today as a nation, and where we should be going in the future. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1RDGlyQWl‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
A year ago, Denise broke her ankle working at Amazon.

The company fired her while she was on approved medical leave. Then, they fired her husband for taking time off to care for her.

"When you are injured on the job, you should be taken care of."

Listen to her story here:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
It's beyond unacceptable that Amazon, the 2nd largest corporation in America, owned by Jeff Bezos, the 2nd wealthiest person on Earth, continues to put their huge profits ahead of the health & safety of their workers.

Sadly, that's precisely what my 160-page report today found.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This is Oligarchy.

Since Election Day, Elon Musk, Jeff Bezos & Mark Zuckerberg have become $232 billion richer & are now worth $920 billion combined. Meanwhile, 60% of Americans live paycheck to paycheck.

We must fight for an economy that works for all, not just the few.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Thanks to all the Vermonters who came out to our holiday parties in Vergennes, Burlington, Bennington, and Rutland. The singers and musicians, from 4 to 80 years of age, were great ‚Äì and so was the eggnog and cookies.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
At a time when tens of millions of American families are struggling to survive, we are told we can‚Äôt afford to help them.

But when the military-industrial complex and its well-paid lobbyists demand another massive payout, Congress is happy to oblige ‚Äî with no questions asked.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Amazon delivery drivers and warehouse workers deserve decent wages, benefits and working conditions ‚Äî and the right to form a union.

I strongly support the thousands of Amazon workers who will go on strike tomorrow if Amazon doesn't end its illegal union busting.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This is a major step toward ensuring Americans can afford the medicine they need to BREATHE. Now other manufacturers, like GSK, must do the same & cap the cost of any similar products at $35.

No one should get sick or die because they can't afford what their doctor prescribes.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Oligarchy is not just a Russian phenomenon. It exists right here in the USA.

In 2024, just 150 billionaire families spent nearly $2 billion to purchase candidates.

We must stand together to save democracy.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I asked FDA Commissioner Califf: Has the FDA had the courage to take on the very powerful food and beverage industry?

No. It has not.

Bottom line: We cannot continue to allow large corporations to put their profits ahead of the health of our children.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: I will be voting NO on this military budget. Tune in now to hear why: nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1YqKDknej‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I agree with Mr. Musk that weight-loss drugs like Wegovy can save lives & save money, but not at the price that Novo Nordisk is charging.

Will Mr. Musk make clear that Medicare shouldn't pay more for these drugs than they cost in Europe, where prices are up to 15 times cheaper?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The proposed Kroger-Albertsons merger would have led to higher prices at the grocery store and harmed workers.

Let me thank FTC Chair Lina Khan for successfully fighting this merger and standing up to corporate greed.

nytimes.com/2024/12/11/busin‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The defense budget is bloated.

Defense contractors engage in fraud and waste.

That's why we should cut military spending by 10%.

I hope Musk and the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) will support that effort.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
As Chair of the National Labor Relations Board, Lauren McFerran has done an exceptional job protecting workers‚Äô rights & standing up against illegal union busting.

It‚Äôs imperative that a majority of Senators vote to reconfirm her this week so she can continue this vital work.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In his farewell address in 1961, President Dwight D. Eisenhower, a former 5 star general, stated:

‚ÄúIn the councils of government, we must guard against the acquisition of unwarranted influence, whether sought or unsought, by the military-industrial complex. The potential for the disastrous rise of misplaced power exists and will persist.‚Äù 

Eisenhower was right in 1961. And that message is right today. A handful of huge defense contractors and their many lobbyists wield enormous power over the Pentagon‚Äôs budget and our foreign and military policies. 

It‚Äôs time to take a hard look at the Department of Defense.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The US needs a strong military, but we do not need a defense system that is designed to make huge profits for a handful of giant defense contractors. 

We do not need to spend almost a trillion dollars on the military, while children go hungry.

theguardian.com/commentisfre‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text: While the diabetes and obesity rates in America soar, while we spend hundreds of billions of dollars to treat diabetes, the food and beverage industry spends $14 billion a year on advertising to make many of their unhealthy products irresistible to the American consumer.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
For more than 100 years, Planned Parenthood has provided essential health care to millions of women.

Let me be clear: Reproductive health care is a human right.

I was proud to meet with members of @ppnnehealth who are providing care to anyone who needs it.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Yes.

We waste hundreds of billions a year on health care administrative expenses that make insurance CEOs and wealthy stockholders incredibly rich while 85 million Americans go uninsured or underinsured.

Health care is a human right.

We need Medicare for All.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
LIVE: America has a diabetes and obesity crisis. 

And it‚Äôs not happening by accident.

Junk foods are designed to be addictive, like cigarettes and alcohol.

The FDA must act. Corporations cannot put their profits ahead of the health of our children. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1ZkKzRrAe‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Last year, Coca-Cola spent $327 million on advertising in the U.S. while it raked in $9.5 billion in profits.

Not one of their ads will tell you that a 20oz bottle of Coke contains more than 15 teaspoons of sugar.

It‚Äôs time to take on the greed of the food & beverage industry.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
For decades, the food and beverage industry has made massive profits by enticing children to consume unhealthy products purposely designed to be overeaten.

The time has come for the FDA to stop dragging its feet on addressing the obesity and diabetes epidemics in America.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Yes. We can cut military spending by targeting massive waste & fraud from defense contractors.

One example: In October, RTX (Raytheon) was fined $950 million for defrauding DOD, lying about costs, and paying bribes to secure foreign business.

RTX is not alone.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Former Israeli Defense Minister Yaalon is right.

Netanyahu's government is committing war crimes & ethnic cleansing in Gaza. You don't fight terrorism by starving people & killing tens of thousands of civilians.

I hope more Israeli military leaders will join him in speaking up.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Elon Musk is right.

The Pentagon, with a budget of $886 billion, just failed its 7th audit in a row. It‚Äôs lost track of billions.

Last year, only 13 senators voted against the Military Industrial Complex and a defense budget full of waste and fraud.

That must change.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Our job in the coming months and years is clear. We must defeat the oligarchs and create an economy and government that works for all, not just the few.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This time of year, I am always reminded of the Thanksgiving scene painted by one of my favorite artists, Norman Rockwell. Many people don‚Äôt know this, but Rockwell actually lived for a time in Arlington, Vermont, and painted some of his most well-known pieces there, including his ‚ÄúFour Freedoms.‚Äù He even used many of his Vermont neighbors as models and inspiration in his work.

Rockwell‚Äôs ‚ÄúFour Freedoms‚Äù series was published in the Saturday Evening Post in 1943.
