They were paintings that reflected the vision that President Franklin Delano Roosevelt articulated in his 1941 State of the Union speech: Freedom of Speech, Freedom of Worship, Freedom from Want, and Freedom from Fear.  

In that speech Roosevelt stated:

‚ÄúIn the future days, which we seek to make secure, we look forward to a world founded upon four essential human freedoms.

‚ÄúThe first is freedom of speech and expression‚Äîeverywhere in the world.

‚ÄúThe second is freedom of every person to worship God in his own way‚Äîeverywhere in the world.

‚ÄúThe third is freedom from want‚Äîwhich, translated into world terms, means economic understandings which will secure to every nation a healthy peacetime life for its inhabitants‚Äîeverywhere in the world.

‚ÄúThe fourth is freedom from fear‚Äîwhich, translated into world terms, means a world-wide reduction of armaments to such a point and in such a thorough fashion that no nation will be in a position to commit an act of physical aggression against any neighbor‚Äîanywhere in the world.

‚ÄúThat is no vision of a distant millennium. It is a definite basis for a kind of world attainable in our own time and generation. That kind of world is the very antithesis of the so-called new order of tyranny which the dictators seek to create with the crash of a bomb.‚Äù

In my view, Roosevelt‚Äôs vision from 1941 remains relevant today.

On behalf of Jane, my children, and my grandkids, let me take this opportunity to wish everybody a very happy Thanksgiving and a wonderful holiday season.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
While billionaire Bezos tours the world on his $500m yacht, Amazon workers in 20+ countries are rising up this Black Friday to demand fair wages, union rights & climate action. Amazon must pay its fair share & respect workers. I stand with #MakeAmazonPay
theguardian.com/business/202‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Unless Medicare demands that Big Pharma substantially reduces the prices for anti-obesity drugs, Medicare premiums for all seniors will skyrocket.

We cannot allow Medicare and Medicaid to simply be a cash cow for Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Billionaires are pouring huge amounts of money into the political process ‚Äî and both political parties.

Never before in American history have so few had so much wealth and economic and political power.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Vermont has great musicians and they were out in full force last night at the Flynn Theater in Burlington to support farmers and flood relief efforts across Vermont. Great show. Important cause. 

Let‚Äôs stand with our family farmers.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Vermonters dealing with the aftermath of multiple devastating floods cannot wait any longer for help.

Congress must act with urgency to pass President Biden‚Äôs request for nearly $100 billion to help Vermonters and our nation recover and rebuild.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I am proud of what we‚Äôve accomplished during my time as Chairman of the HELP Committee.

In the next Congress, I look forward to serving both as HELP‚Äôs Ranking Member and on the Finance Committee, where I will prioritize protecting Social Security, Medicare & Medicaid.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Netanyahu, Gallant, and Deif have all launched indiscriminate attacks against civilians and caused unimaginable human suffering.

If the world does not uphold international law, we will descend into further barbarism.

I agree with the ICC.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Last night, 19 Senators voted to end illegal arms sales to Israel.

We stood up to AIPAC, the Democratic Senate leadership, and the Biden administration.

We must continue going forward to end illegal arms sales and hold Netanyahu accountable for his war crimes.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I am holding a vote on the floor of the U.S. Senate to block the sale of offensive arms to Israel. 

The extremist Netanyahu government is breaking U.S. and international law. Every Senator who believes in the rule of law should vote for these resolutions. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1dRKZdgkN‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The resolutions I am offering today are simple: It is against the law for the U.S. to provide weapons to any country that is violating human rights or blocking U.S. humanitarian aid.

That is precisely what Netanyahu is doing in his savage war in Gaza.

We must obey the law.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Tomorrow I will bring to the Senate floor a series of votes to block the sale of offensive weapons to Israel:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Tune in LIVE to our press conference ahead of tomorrow's vote to block offensive arms sales to Israel. 

The United States must stop blatantly violating its own laws by selling more of the offensive weapons Israel is using against civilians in Gaza. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1lPKqOkQP‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The death and destruction in Gaza is funded by U.S. taxpayer dollars, which has provided over $18 billion in military aid to Israel.

In other words, we are complicit.

That is why I am forcing a vote on the floor of the Senate this Wednesday to block additional offensive arms sales.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
You do not effectively combat terrorism by starving thousands of innocent children.

You do not effectively combat terrorism by bombing schools and hospitals.

You do not effectively combat terrorism by turning the entire world against your country.

washingtonpost.com/opinions/‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We cannot allow billionaires to determine the outcome of our elections.

Citizens United has got to go.

It's time for public funding of elections.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Bottom line: the pharmaceutical industry must stop ripping off the American people.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I look forward to working with the Trump Administration on fulfilling his promise to cap credit card interest rates at 10%. 

We cannot continue to allow big banks to make record profits by ripping off Americans by charging them 25 to 30% interest rates. 

That is usury.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Next week, the Senate will vote on resolutions to block certain offensive arms sales to Israel.

The carnage in Gaza has been carried out with U.S.-provided military equipment. 

Providing more offensive weapons to continue this disastrous war would be both immoral and illegal.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Americans today walk into doctor's offices much sicker than they should be.

Why?

People are frightened of the bill they'll get after the visit.

When your deductible is $10,000, you risk going bankrupt just for getting the care you need.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Americans understand: Something is very wrong when three people on top own more wealth than the bottom half of society. 

As a result of the disastrous Citizens United Supreme Court decision, the billionaire class not only controls our economy, but also our political process.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The war in Gaza has been conducted almost entirely with American weapons and $18 billion in U.S. taxpayer dollars.

We cannot continue to be complicit in this war by supplying more military aid and weaponry to the Netanyahu government. Congress must act to block these arms sales.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Overturn Citizens United.

Billionaires cannot continue to buy elections in this country.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: I love participating in the St. Albans, Vermont Veterans Day Celebration. It‚Äôs a community affair with a large turnout and with young people playing an active role. Congratulations to the VFW and the American Legion for doing this successfully every year.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
On Tuesday, Missouri, a conservative state, voted to raise the minimum wage to $15/hr and to guarantee paid sick leave to workers.

These are popular ideas that Democrats, Republicans, and Independents support.

The only people who don‚Äôt support them are the billionaire class.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Let me congratulate the 33,000 workers with the Machinists union for waging a 7-week strike against Boeing's corporate greed and winning a 38% pay raise, a $12,000 ratification bonus and much better benefits. When workers stand together there is nothing they cannot accomplish.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The function of our current health care system is to provide huge profits for the insurance industry and drug companies.

We need to join every other major country on earth and move to a Medicare for All, single-payer system with no out of pocket expenses.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Large corporations continue to make record-breaking profits by charging outrageously high prices for gas, rent, food, and prescription drugs.

We cannot continue to allow them to make obscene amounts of money by price gouging Americans in virtually every sector of our economy.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Suzzanne's daughter has sickle cell anemia. Her medication costs $10k every month.

Suzzanne earns $12.60 an hour as a homecare worker.

She was only able to make ends meet because of the Child Tax Credit, which cut childhood poverty by 40%.

We must extend and expand the CTC.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Congratulations to the 33,000 members of the Machinists union who stood up to corporate greed, went on strike, and forced Boeing to offer a contract that includes a 38 percent pay raise over 4 years and a $12,000 ratification bonus. 

Thanks for fighting for economic justice.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
How do you feed your family, pay for your prescription drugs, or see the dentist when you're spending 50% of your income on rent?

You don't.

We need to build the affordable housing that our country desperately needs.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The idea that you can eliminate all income taxes and replace them with a tariff is insane economics.

It makes no sense.

It will hurt desperately poor people and enrich the wealthy.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I am proud of the significant progress we have made with the Harris-Biden administration in taking on the greed of the pharmaceutical industry.

If Congress has the guts to listen to the American people, we can continue to substantially lower prescription drug prices for all.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
60,000 Americans die unnecessarily every year because they can't afford to see a doctor.

1 out of 4 cancer patients in this country go bankrupt or lose their home.

Insane. Cruel. Wrong.

We need a health care system that works for all of us.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We saw a spike in inflation due to the record-breaking profits of the food and oil industries, which have raised their prices exponentially to rip off the American consumer.

Want to know why everything costs more these days?

Corporate greed.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We need the best educated workforce in the world.

It is absurd that millions go into debt to get a higher education.

I applaud the Biden-Harris Administration for proposing to cancel student debt for another 8 million working class Americans.

This is a very positive step.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I stand in solidarity with union workers at Boeing who are on strike against corporate greed.

If Boeing can afford to give its last 2 CEOs golden parachutes worth over $100 million, it can afford to provide all of its workers with the defined benefit pension plans they deserve.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
100 members of the Senate.

435 members of the House.

That's 535 members of the U.S. Congress.

Guess how many well-paid lobbyists representing Big Pharma we have in Washington, D.C.

1,800.

That's why we pay the highest prices in the world for prescription drugs.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
While blue collar workers in Belvidere were being laid off, Stellantis' CEO received a 56% raise, boosting his compensation to $39.5 million.

.@Stellantis promised to strengthen & expand good-paying union jobs.

Stellantis: live up to your commitments to the @UAW.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I don't care if you're in rural Wyoming, or New York City.

You can't make it on $12 bucks an hour.

It's time to raise the minimum wage.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
More than a year ago, an Israeli tank fired on a group of clearly marked journalists, killing one and wounding six others, including an American from Vermont. There have been no steps toward accountability.

Today, my colleagues and I are demanding an independent investigation.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: LIVE: Join me and and Pres. Biden as we discuss our progress in taking on the greed of the pharmaceutical industry and lowering prescription drug costs. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1YpKklddg‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I don't always agree with FDA Commissioner Califf, but he's absolutely right when he says that Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly ‚Äúshould be ashamed of themselves for what they are charging Americans‚Äù for weight loss drugs.

Their profit margins are ‚Äúoutrageous.‚Äù

Their greed must end.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Under the leadership of @POTUS and @VP, we are making significant progress in taking on the greed of the pharmaceutical industry and lowering prescription drug costs.

It's time to stop listening to the needs of Big Pharma and start listening to the needs of the American people.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We must rebuild the manufacturing sector in America.

It's not about building a wall.

It's about a fair trade policy.

Corporations can't just throw workers out on the street while they take their business to Mexico and China.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
With one bill, we were able to cut childhood poverty in this country nearly IN HALF.

This is what good public policy can do.

We must extend the expanded Child Tax Credit.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
People are hurting.

They know that the people on top are doing phenomenally well. They see unprecedented levels of corporate greed.

They need to know that someone is standing up and fighting for them.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Climate change is an economic, public health, national security, and environmental problem.

It is every kind of issue at once.

We must transform our energy system away from fossil fuel NOW to save the planet.

No excuses.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Yahya Sinwar is dead. This war must end.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The food & beverage industry uses deceptive tactics to entice children to eat foods loaded up with added sugar, salt & saturated fats that are designed to be overeaten.

It's no wonder that 1 out of every 5 kids and over 40% of adults in our country are obese.

The FDA must act.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Recently, we've seen a massive amount of illegal, union-breaking activity from corporations.

They threaten to shut down factories and move to China.

They drag workers into back rooms to lecture them about the dangers of joining a union.

We must pass the PRO Act to stop them.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: I stand in solidarity with the 99% of flight attendants at United Airlines who authorized a strike against corporate greed. If United Airlines can afford to spend $1.5 billion on stock buybacks and give its CEO a 90% raise, it can afford to sign a fair contract with @afa_cwa.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
When Congress returns, I will move Joint Resolutions of Disapproval to block offensive arms sales to Israel.

But President Biden should act now: Israel is clearly violating U.S. & international law, using starvation as a tool of its all-out war against the Palestinian people.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Major food and beverage companies are causing an obesity epidemic & diabetes crisis with the junk food they produce.

Other countries have taken major steps to inform parents and consumers about these harmful products with warning labels.

It‚Äôs time for the U.S. to join them.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
From the first days of this country, Native Americans were lied to, their treaties violated, and their rights ignored.

Today on #IndigenousPeoplesDay, we recommit to stand with them in the fight for justice and dignity.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In the richest country in world history, it's morally obscene that millions of Americans are making starvation wages. The first thing a new Congress must do is raise the minimum wage to at least $17 an hour. 

A job must lift workers out of poverty, not keep them in it.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Tens of thousands of people are again under siege in north Gaza. Hundreds have been killed in the last week. Food is scarce, and UN aid convoys are denied access by the Israeli military.

We must end our complicity in Netanyahu‚Äôs all out war against the Palestinian people.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
For almost 90 years, Social Security has, in good times and bad, succeeded in keeping millions of senior citizens out of extreme poverty.

We must protect it at all costs.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Let me tell you why I'm optimistic about the future of the labor movement:

Whether I'm in the Midwest or California, I meet working people who are standing up, striking & fighting for their rights.

People are coming together, taking care of each other. That's real solidarity.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
When 84% of the American people tell us that their top priority is for us to expand Medicare to include hearing and vision benefits, what should we do?

We should listen to the people.

Let's get this done.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
When it comes to a Green New Deal people ask: ‚ÄúHow will you pay for it?‚Äù

As though we're not paying for it now in loss of life & billions of dollars in destruction.

The Green New Deal isn't radical.

Transforming our energy system saves lives, saves money & saves the planet.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Here's the truth: The outrageously high price of Ozempic and Wegovy could bankrupt Medicare and radically increase insurance premiums to absolutely unaffordable rates.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
.@mcuban is wrong. Lina Khan is the best FTC Chair in modern history.

By taking on corporate greed & illegal monopolies, Lina is doing an exceptional job preventing large corporations from ripping-off consumers & exploiting workers.

Thanks @linakhanFTC for what you are doing.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: My statement on the one-year anniversary of the horrific October 7th terrorist attacks.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Is there a realistic path to remove big money from politics?

Goddamn right there is!

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Historic advances in technology, automation, and AI impact virtually every worker in America.

The question that we must ask ourselves is pretty simple: Who benefits?

Let me be clear: It is past time for workers to benefit from the revolution in new technology, not just the 1%.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Let me also congratulate our @ActSecJulieSu, who did a great job negotiating a tentative agreement to increase the wages of port workers by 62% over six years.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I congratulate the 50,000 port workers who went on strike against the outrageous corporate greed of the shipping industry & won an historic increase in wages. 

Billionaires in the shipping industry must not be allowed to get even richer by replacing port workers with robots.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This week, $15 billion in funding for federal child care subsidies expired.

In almost every state, child care costs more than rent or a mortgage. That is absurd.

We must do more to ensure all families have access to high-quality, affordable child care.

tcf.org/content/report/child‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In America today, over 60% of our people are living paycheck to paycheck & millions of children are living in poverty.

All while corporations make record-breaking profits & CEOs now make nearly 300 times as much as their average worker.

Does that sound right to you?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Severe flooding in Central Europe forced tens of thousands of people to evacuate their homes last month.

24 people have died and more are missing.

Climate change is making these disasters more frequent and severe.

We must end our use of fossil fuels.

nytimes.com/2024/09/24/clima‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Ozempic is a lifechanging drug. But it won't do any good for the millions of people who cannot afford it.

The CEOs of major generic pharmaceutical companies say they can sell a generic version of Ozempic for less than $100.

So why is Novo Nordisk still charging us $969?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I strongly condemn Iran‚Äôs attack on Israel. For months, leaders in Israel & Iran have chosen to escalate rather than pursue diplomatic solutions. The U.S. must now demand an end to hostilities.

A ceasefire for hostage deal remains the key to resolving the wider conflict.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
My thoughts are with people across the Southeast who are suffering from the devastating flooding brought by Hurricane Helene.

If we do not act boldly to combat climate change, what we see today will become the norm as the planet becomes more uninhabitable.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: President Biden is right. He should not invoke Taft-Hartley to end the port strike. Dock workers are striking against excessive corporate greed. The shipping industry has made $400 billion in profits since 2020. It's time for dock workers to be treated with respect, not contempt.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Nobody is asking Novo Nordisk to provide charity to the American people.

All we are saying is: treat the American people the same way you treat people all over the world.

Stop. Ripping. Us. Off.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
If Dr. de la Torre believes that by resigning as CEO of Steward Health Care he can evade responsibility for looting hospitals from Massachusetts to Arizona, he is sorely mistaken.

It‚Äôs time for him to be held accountable for his outrageous and unacceptable corporate greed.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
At least 15 patients at Steward Health Care hospitals died as a result of a lack of medical equipment or staffing shortages.

2,000 others were put in ‚Äúimmediate peril.‚Äù

Meanwhile, Steward's CEO made hundreds of millions.

Last night, the Senate held him in criminal contempt.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today, with colleagues, I introduced legislation to block arms sales to Israel.

Sending more weapons to Netanyahu's extremist government is immoral & illegal: U.S. weapons are responsible for far too many civilian casualties in Gaza.

We must end our complicity in this atrocity.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
If you defy Congressional subpoenas, you will be held accountable.

If your corporate greed endangers American communities, you will be held accountable. 

If you allow patients to suffer & die, while making out with millions, you will be held accountable. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1BRJjwkOL‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today, Novo Nordisk committed to working with PBMs to lower the list price of their blockbuster drugs Ozempic and Wegovy.

I will hold them to that promise.

Because Americans with diabetes & obesity should not pay 10-15x more for their medication than people in other countries.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: LIVE: No company should get away with charging Americans up to 15x more than other countries for a lifesaving drug. The HELP Committee is holding a hearing NOW on the need to end Novo Nordisk‚Äôs corporate greed. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1nAKEpqED‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Tomorrow, I will ask the CEO of Novo Nordisk, Mr. Lars J√∏rgensen:

Why are you charging the American people up to 10 or 15 times more for the same exact product than you're charging people in Canada and Europe?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Generic drug companies can sell Ozempic ‚Äî at a profit‚Äî for less than $100.

But Americans are paying almost $1,000 a month for the drug.

So why does your prescription cost more than a luxury handbag?

Corporate greed.

Novo Nordisk must lower the price of Ozempic.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The Senate will soon vote on my resolution to block $20 billion in new arms sales to Israel. U.S.-provided weapons have caused massive death and suffering to innocent people in Gaza.
 
We cannot continue to turn a blind eye. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1RDxlywdo‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In the last year alone and against my vote, Congress has sent more than $10 billion in taxpayer dollars to the extremist Israeli government ‚Äì to buy more of the bombs & weapons they're using against the Palestinian people.

Enough.

U.S. complicity in this horrific war must end.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The Biden Administration has forgiven student debt for nearly 5 million borrowers, but right wing courts are stopping 30 million more from getting relief.

If we can provide trillions of dollars in tax breaks to the rich, we can afford to cancel student debt for working families.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
While his hospitals shut down, while patients died, while health care workers lost their jobs, the CEO of Steward Health Care and the companies he owns received $250 million in compensation over a 4-year period.

Today, the HELP Committee voted to hold him in criminal contempt.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
If you defy a bipartisan Congressional subpoena, you will be held accountable no matter how wealthy and well-connected you may be.

What happened to patients, workers, and communities under the watch of CEO Dr. de la Torre must never happen again. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1eaKbaeZe‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Much of the carnage in Gaza has been carried out with US-provided military equipment. That's why I will introduce a resolution to block this $20 billion arms sale to Israel.
We must end our complicity in the immoral & illegal war against Palestinians. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1yNGagRjb‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Netanyahu‚Äôs right-wing, extremist government is violating international & US law and has created a humanitarian disaster in Gaza.

Today, I announced that I will file Joint Resolutions of Disapproval to stop the sale of U.S. arms to Israel and end our complicity in this disaster.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Yes, we can expand Medicare, expand Social Security benefits, and raise the minimum wage to a living wage.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Generic drug companies say they can profitably sell Ozempic for just $100 a month.

Novo Nordisk, which has made nearly $50 billion in sales off of Ozempic and Wegovy, charges Americans almost $1,000 a month ‚Äî the highest prices in the world.

Why?

Excessive corporate greed.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Over the course of our investigation into the outrageous cost of Ozempic and Wegovy in the U.S., I spoke with the CEOs of major generic pharmaceutical companies who confirmed:
They can sell a generic version of Ozempic for $100/mo.  nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1rmxPoEoE‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Doctors across this country are sick and tired of seeing their patients ripped off by Big Pharma. Thank you @drsforamerica for speaking out and speaking up for your patients.

If Novo Nordisk does not end its greed and reduce the price of these drugs, we must end it for them.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Nearly 30 years ago, Congress had the courage to take on the tobacco industry, whose products killed more than 400,000 Americans every year.

Banning fast-food advertising marketed to children, could cut the childhood obesity rate by up to 18%.

Congress must act.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Last night, 33,000 Boeing workers went on strike against Boeing‚Äôs culture of reckless greed. 

Let us all stand in solidarity in support of their fight for fair wages, a secure retirement, and economic justice. amp.cnn.com/cnn/2024/09/13/b‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The ultra-processed food industry cannot continue to make our kids overweight & sick.

Like other countries, we need strong product labeling to help parents know the unhealthy stuff that‚Äôs in the food their children eat.

The FDA has delayed for too long.¬†¬†We need action NOW.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This is policy in the West Bank: shoot first, ask no questions later.

The US cannot continue to turn a blind eye to the illegal actions of the extremist Israeli government.

We cannot allow American citizens and innocent Palestinians to be killed with impunity.

We must act.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Steward CEO Ralph de la Torre today refused to comply with a Congressional subpoena and justify his $250 million pay day while he was busy bankrupting hospitals across America.

Thank you to our witnesses who bravely appeared today.

Dr. de la Torre will be held accountable.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: LIVE: We cannot allow CEOs like Dr. de la Torre and wealthy private equity executives to treat our health care system as their own personal piggy bank. We have got to make sure that what happened at Steward never happens again. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1ynJODrvB‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
While Steward was busy shutting down hospitals all over America, Dr. de la Torre and his companies received $250 million in compensation that he used to purchase a $40 million yacht.

Enough is enough.

Private equity vultures cannot be allowed to destroy our health care system.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This week: 19 people killed & scores injured in a strike in a ‚Äúhumanitarian zone‚Äù in Gaza.

An American shot in the head in the West Bank.

Now, another school bombed, killing 14 people, including 6 UN aid workers.

Enough is enough. No more money for Netanyahu's war machine.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The American Rescue Plan cut child poverty in half.

Republicans blocked the extension of the Child Tax Credit.

The result? Child poverty more than doubled from 5.2% in 2021 to 13.7% in 2023.

In the richest country in history, no child should live in poverty.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Today, let us remember the nearly 3,000 lives lost in the 9/11 terrorist attacks, and the heroism of the first responders who bravely risked their lives for others.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Whether you‚Äôre a Democrat, Republican, or Independent, you should be concerned about the disastrous Citizens United decision, which allows billionaires to play an outsized role in the political process.

We must return to being a nation where one person has one vote.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The time has come for Dr. de la Torre to get off of his yacht and explain to Congress how he was able to become extraordinarily wealthy while the hospitals he managed went bankrupt and patients lost their lives. 

bostonglobe.com/2024/09/07/m‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
If you're rich in America, the odds are you'll live as long as people in other developed countries.

If you're poor, you'll live 10 or 15 years less.

Anybody else see a problem with that?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The past 10 years have been the 10 hottest on record.

This summer was the hottest summer on record.

2024 is on track to be the hottest year on record.

We must act NOW to transform our energy system away from fossil fuels.

apnews.com/article/heat-clim‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We have got to take on the greed of the billionaire class, and say: 

‚ÄúYou know what guys? When we have 600,000 people sleeping out on the streets ‚Äî yes, you are going to start paying your fair share in taxes.‚Äù

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Do we have a democracy?

Yes. Most of us can go out there and vote.

But what most of us CANNOT do is put hundreds of millions of dollars into a Super PAC to elect candidates you like or defeat candidates you don't like.

We must move to public funding of elections.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Is it my hope that CEO Dr. de la Torre will do the right thing and join our hearing? Yes. But let me be clear: With or without him, this hearing is going forward.

He will be held accountable for the damage he has done to the American people and our nation‚Äôs health care system.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
It is absurd that a billionaire in America today pays the same amount of Social Security taxes as someone making $168,000 a year. 

It is time to scrap the cap, expand benefits, and fully fund Social Security, so that senior citizens in this country can retire with dignity.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
100 straight days of 100-degree heat.

The heat wave has killed at least 150 people this summer in Phoenix alone.

The climate emergency demands a massive-scale mobilization. There is no choice. This is a moral imperative.

washingtonpost.com/weather/2‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I‚Äôm disappointed, but not surprised, that Dr. de la Torre, the CEO of Steward Health Care, is refusing to testify in defiance of a subpoena.

Let me be clear: We will not accept this. We will hold him accountable for the damage he has caused hospitals and patients across America.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Want to know a big secret?

The progressive economic agenda is enormously popular among the American people.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Public opinion of labor unions is now at 70% ‚Äî the highest in decades. The reason: Workers know that a union helps them fight corporate greed and win decent wages, working conditions, and benefits. Let us continue to grow the American trade union movement. Happy Labor Day.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In the richest country in the history of the world, we CAN end child poverty.

We simply need the political will to do it.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Why is Congress so out of step with the American people?

Why don't we tax billionaires at a higher rate, though the American people think we should?

Why don't we have affordable health care, though the American people want it?

The answer to those questions?

Money in politics.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Defense contractors are making huge profits on the weapons systems they produce & transferring taxpayer dollars to wealthy shareholders.

There‚Äôs a name for this: war profiteering.

The result? Taxpayers pay more than they should and Ukraine receives less weaponry than it needs.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: We should not force bankruptcy upon people who are struggling with serious illnesses.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
What happened to the American dream? 

Despite huge increases in productivity, only about half of Americans born in the 1980s are better off financially than their parents compared to 90% born in 1940, according to MIT. We need an economy that works for all, not just the few.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I‚Äôm pleased that Eli Lilly took a modest step forward by reducing the starter price of Zepbound.

But let's be clear: Even with this modest price reduction, millions of Americans will still be unable to afford the diabetes and weight-loss drugs they desperately need.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
105 degrees in Philly. 104 degrees in D.C. 102 degrees in St. Louis.

The climate crisis isn't coming -- it's already arrived.

It's time to transform our energy systems away from fossil fuels.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
You want to know how many Republicans supported my proposal to raise the minimum wage to $15/hr?

Zero.

You want to know how many Republicans tried to grow union membership by supporting the PRO Act?

Zero.

Don't try to tell me that Republicans support the working class.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This is why we have to end the disastrous Citizens United Supreme Court decision and move to public funding of elections.
washingtonpost.com/elections‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Millions of seniors in this country are going hungry today. 

4 out of 5 seniors who need a home-delivered or congregate meal do not receive one.

We must increase funding for the Older Americans Act, reduce malnutrition, and meet the urgent needs of our nation's seniors.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Massive income and wealth inequality.

60% of our people living paycheck to paycheck.

A dysfunctional health care system.

A broken childcare system.

We need to start paying attention to the needs of the working class of this country & stand up to powerful special interests.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Too many good, hardworking Americans are getting ripped off by the people on top.

@TheoVon and I discuss:

name: Bernie Sanders
text: The American Rescue Plan is proof that ‚Äì when we have the political will ‚Äì the federal government can dramatically reduce childhood poverty and make life better for working families across this country.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The top 1% have never had it so good.

They are making money hand over fist.

At the same time, weekly wages for the average worker are nearly $50 less than they were 50 years ago.

What does that say about American economic policy?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Time after time, I hear my Republican colleagues talk about the high cost of addressing the climate crisis.

What they fail to mention, is how much higher the costs will be if we do not address it at all.

washingtonpost.com/business/‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The overwhelming majority of Americans ‚Äî Democrats, Republicans, Independents, Trump supporters ‚Äî think we should expand Social Security, lower prescription drug prices, and tax the rich. 

These are not radical ideas.
It's good policy that the American people support.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Nearly 18 million adults and 6 million children suffer from Long COVID.

The time has come to start treating the Long COVID crisis as the public health emergency that it is.

thedailybeast.com/bernie-san‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Let me congratulate the Biden-Harris Administration for taking on the greed of the pharmaceutical industry & slashing the list prices of some of the most expensive prescription drugs under Medicare by up to 79%.

This action will bring significant financial relief to seniors.

name: Bernie Sanders
Bernie Sanders
text: Today, on Social Security's 89th birthday, let us redouble our efforts to expand Social Security benefits by at least $2,400 a year and to extend Social Security's solvency for the next 75 years by lifting the cap so that the wealthy pay their fair share of taxes.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Donald Trump believes climate change is a ‚Äúhoax‚Äù created by China.

He thinks global sea level rise is good because it will create more oceanfront property.

He is a danger to our planet and to future generations.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: An economic agenda that serves working people is not only good policy, it's good politics.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The retail price for the most commonly prescribed inhaler for children is between $172 and $313.
 
That is absolutely unacceptable. No child in America should be sick or die because their parents cannot afford or access the inhalers they need to breathe.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We have a habit of forgetting to talk about some of the most important issues facing ordinary Americans.

At the top of my list? Today, we have more income and wealth inequality than at any time in the history of America. 

Our country is rapidly becoming an oligarchy.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This is one of the reasons why we pay, by far, the highest prices in the world for prescription drugs.

The pharmaceutical industry has some 1800 well paid lobbyists on Capitol Hill, including former leaders of the Republican and Democratic parties.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
There is not a single state in America where you can afford a two-bedroom apartment while earning the minimum wage. 

Something is wrong with this picture.

No more excuses. Tax billionaires, raise the minimum wage, build more affordable housing.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Thank you, Elle. Not just for being a two-time Olympian and world-class runner, but for representing Vermont in a way that makes us all proud. Your work ethic, discipline & love for your rural community sets a wonderful example for everyone in our state and country, young & old.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Many Americans are giving up on democracy.

They look to the government for help, and nothing changes.

They are willing to look to authoritarianism as a substitute.

If we care to preserve democracy, we should pay attention to the long-neglected needs of the working class.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
More than 75% of the American people ‚Äî including Republicans ‚Äî want Medicare to cover dental, vision, and hearing; they want to expand Social Security; they want a cap on rent increases. 

It's not radical. It's what the American people want.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In America today:

- 12 million seniors are worried about not having enough food to eat
- Nearly 25% of our nation‚Äôs seniors are socially isolated
- 25% of seniors suffer from tragic falls

That should not be happening in the richest country in the history of the world.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today in America we have unprecedented income and wealth inequality. While 60% live paycheck to paycheck, 3 people own more wealth than the bottom half of society and CEOs make 350 times more than their workers.

We must fight for an economy that works for all, not just the 1%.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Last month, July 21 broke the record for the hottest day *ever* recorded on Earth. 

Then, July 22 broke the record again.

Don‚Äôt tell me climate change isn‚Äôt real. We‚Äôre seeing it right before our eyes.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The railroad industry has slashed over 20% of its workforce, while spending $225 billion on stock buybacks and dividends since 2010.

Wall Street calls this ‚Äúprecision scheduled railroading.‚Äù

I call it unacceptable corporate greed.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today‚Äôs court decision that Google violated the Sherman Antitrust Act is a major victory for the American people. Google may be a $2 trillion corporation. Its founders may be worth $292 billion. But it's not above the law.

It‚Äôs time to hold Google accountable and break it up.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Ordinary Americans get one vote apiece.

Billionaires get to contribute hundreds of millions of dollars to Super PACS that elect their friends & defeat political opponents.

If we believe in democracy, we must overturn Citizens United and begin the public funding of elections.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The needs of working-class people are systematically ignored by political and media elites.

Progressive economic proposals are extremely popular ‚Äì not only among Democrats but also among Independents, Republicans, and even Trump supporters.
theguardian.com/commentisfre‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
It is not just about Steward Health Care.

In America today, alarmingly, private equity firms own 460 hospitals across the country.

How many of these hospitals are in danger of being shut down? How many patients are at risk?

The American people have the right to know.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
For too long, millions of Americans suffering from long COVID have had their symptoms dismissed or ignored ‚Äì by the medical community, by the media, and by Congress. Unacceptable.

Congress must act now. Yes. It is time for a Long Covid Moonshot.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Ending net neutrality would be a disaster for Americans, for small businesses, and for our democracy. Let's be clear: The Sixth Circuit's stay only benefits Big Money.

We must do everything we can to stop this decision from taking effect.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In the last 50 years, there has been a $50 trillion transfer of wealth from the bottom 90% to the top 1%.

$50 trillion.

When is "enough" really going to be "enough" for the billionaire class?

name: Bernie Sanders
text: We must address the needs of working class people in the United States. It‚Äôs time to expand Social Security, raise the minimum wage, and cover vision, dental, and hearing under Medicare. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1lDxLlWrw‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Devastating floods hit Vermont last year, this month, and again this week.

Homes destroyed. Roads washed away. Crops lost. And Vermont is not alone.

Congress must pass disaster recovery funding as soon as possible.

We cannot wait.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I cannot support the tax package that was voted on today.

When all is said and done, this bill would provide at least $3 in corporate tax breaks for every $1 in tax cuts for working families with children.

That is not a good deal for working families.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Medical debt is ruining lives.

Eliminate it.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I was proud to come together with my colleagues ‚Äì Democrats, Republicans & Independents ‚Äì to call for a 44% increase in funding for the Older Americans Act.

This legislation will help reduce senior hunger & improve the well-being of some of the most vulnerable people in the US.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: To my fellow Vermonters, on the devastating floods that have hit our communities this week, this month, and last year:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Venezuelans deserve free and transparent democratic elections.

The full vote tallies from every polling station in the country must be released, in line with Venezuelan law, and the authorities must refrain from using force against peaceful protestors.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: How many of Steward's hospitals would still be open ... how many lives could have been saved ... how many workers would still have their jobs ... if Dr. de la Torre spent $150 million on high-quality health care instead of his yacht, two private jets, and a luxury fishing boat?

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Congratulations to Vermont‚Äôs own Ilona Maher and the entire USA women‚Äôs rugby team on taking home the bronze medal today. A historic victory!
 
You have made our whole state and country proud.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The time is now. 

It is time to address the long-neglected needs of working families.  nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1ZkKzRwpE‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
VERMONTERS: We're seeing some significant rainfall in the Northeast Kingdom today. Please remember, flash flooding is extremely dangerous.

Do not attempt to walk, drive, or swim through floodwaters. Keep an eye on VT 511 for road closures and @vemvt for local updates.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Eric, from OR, recently told me:

"I received a traumatic brain injury & woke up from a coma with a bill of over a half a million dollars. How are you supposed to start a new life being $500,000 in debt after a coma?‚Äù

Getting sick in America should not mean going bankrupt.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
‚ÄúWorking Americans with decent-paying jobs simply can‚Äôt afford a place to live.‚Äù

That sentence should not exist in the United States of America.
washingtonpost.com/business/‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This is the richest country in the history of the world.

Our children deserve better than poverty.

Our seniors deserve better than surviving on $30,000 a year.

Our families deserve better than prescription drugs that wipe out their bank accounts.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Each of the last 13 months has been the hottest on record.

This summer alone has shattered hundreds of heat records across the United States. Billions of people have suffered worldwide.

Climate change is not a hoax. The future of the planet is at stake.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Nearly HALF of adults have skipped a medical appointment or the medication they need because they couldn‚Äôt access it or couldn‚Äôt afford it.

All the while, 10 top pharmaceutical companies made over $110 billion in profits in 2022.

We need to get our national priorities straight.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Ralph de la Torre, CEO of Steward Health Care, epitomizes the outrageous corporate greed of our for-profit health care system.

While Steward was busy shutting down hospitals all over America, de la Torre received $100m, which he used to purchase a $40m yacht.

Disgusting.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
My colleagues gave repeated standing ovations to Netanyahu yesterday.

I hope they remember the starving children of Gaza who will carry the scars of this disaster for the rest of their lives.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
There is no debate. There is no doubt. As we suffer through the hottest days in recorded history, it is clear the climate crisis is here.
 
Will we side with the billionaires and polluters as the world burns? Or will we protect the future of our planet?
washingtonpost.com/climate-e‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The federal minimum wage was last increased 15 YEARS ago. 1 in 4 workers earns less than $17 an hour. 60% of Americans live paycheck to paycheck.

Instead of more tax breaks for billionaires, it's long due time Congress raise the minimum wage for workers across our country.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Private equity vultures are making a fortune by taking over hospitals and leaving them in shambles.

It's time for the CEO of Steward Health Care to get off his yacht and explain to Congress how he got rich while bankrupting the hospitals he manages. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1YpKklXmd‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Netanyahu is a war criminal.

We must do everything in our power to end the war in Gaza, and provide immediate humanitarian relief to the people who are suffering there.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Since the war in Gaza began, at least 39,000 Palestinians have been killed and 89,000 injured.

Netanyahu is a war criminal. He should not be addressing Congress.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: LIVE: Congress should not be inviting a war criminal to a joint session. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1djGXrBkm‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We must bring forth an agenda that works for all people.

Because no matter if you are Black, white, Latino, Asian, rich, poor, gay, straight:

You need health care.

You need a living wage.

You need a place to live.

You need a government that works for all, not the 1%.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Creating a government and a nation that works for all is not utopian.

We are the richest country in the history of the world ‚Äì and it belongs to all of us. We can and must create a world that works for everyone, not just the billionaires.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
No, Netanyahu should not be welcomed into the U.S. Congress.

On the contrary, his policies in Gaza and the West Bank and his refusal to support a two-state solution should be roundly condemned.

As I stated last month, I will not be attending his address.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
80% of non-profit hospitals in America receive more in tax breaks than they spend on providing health care to low-income patients.

Meanwhile, 7 of the top 10 highest paid non-profit CEOs run hospitals.

We shouldn't be giving tax breaks to hospitals that rip off patients.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Not ONE of my Republican colleagues has supported my efforts to raise the minimum wage to $15/hr.

And about 90% of them want to cut Social Security. 

Anybody who is under the illusion that the Republicans care two wits for the working class is terribly wrong.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I asked the panelists at the HELP committee hearing on the medical debt crisis what they thought the function of a humane health care system should be.

Listen to what they had to say:

name: Bernie Sanders
text: The CEO of Steward Health Care is the poster child for the type of outrageous corporate greed that permeates through our health care system. It's time for this CEO to get off his $40 million yacht and explain how much he's gained financially while bankrupting Steward Health Care.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
There's no rational reason other than greed for Ozempic to cost nearly $1,000 in the United States while that same exact drug can be purchased for a fraction of the price in other countries.

It's long due time for the pharmaceutical industry to stop ripping off Americans.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Amazon may be a $2 trillion corporation. Its owner, Jeff Bezos, may be worth $215 billion. But that does not give them the right to put their $36 billion in annual profits ahead of the health and safety of their workers. This type of corporate greed must end.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Incredibly, during Prime Day week in 2019, nearly 45% of Amazon's warehouse workers were injured. Amazon is a $2 trillion corporation owned by Jeff Bezos worth $215 billion. Corporate greed at Amazon is off the charts. It must be held accountable.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We are the only major country on Earth where an emergency visit to a hospital can cause patients to lose their homes and their life savings because of the high cost of medical care.

Getting sick in America should not mean going bankrupt, losing your home, car, or life savings.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In the worst moments of their lives, trying to care for their sick loved ones, Americans are fending off calls from debt collectors.

If that is not obscene, I do not know what is.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: We must not forget Gaza.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: It is hard to believe that one year has passed since last summer‚Äôs devastating floods ‚Äì the worst natural disaster Vermont has faced since 1927. That painful memory was made even worse this week as a number of Vermont communities were hit once again with dangerous floodwaters.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
1 out of 4 cancer patients in America either declared bankruptcy or lost their homes to eviction or foreclosure as a result of medical debt in 2022.

That is insane. 

We must cancel all medical debt. 

We must move to Medicare for All.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: VERMONTERS: Please stay safe and report damage to Vermont 211. Monitor Vermont Emergency Management for local updates and Vermont 511 for road closures. Some rivers have not receded yet, so please do not attempt to walk, drive, or swim through floodwaters. Keep an eye out for boil water advisories in your area and call 802-828-1138 for fuel spills or basement issues. And sign up for VT-ALERT at vem.vermont.gov/vtalert.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Join LIVE as the HELP Committee asks a simple question: Why, in the richest country in the world, do the American people have to pay outrageous medical costs for ‚Äúthe crime‚Äù of getting sick? nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1LyxBgMDE‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
VERMONTERS: If you are in need of shelter tonight due to the extreme weather and flash flooding, there are currently two shelters open: Barre Auditorium at 16 Auditorium Hill in Barre and Williamstown Middle/High School at 120 Herbert Road in Williamstown. 

Please stay safe and keep an eye out for more updates.

Follow @NWSBurlington for weather updates, newengland511.org for road closures, and vem.vermont.gov for information on how to prepare.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
SHARE YOUR STORY: I am leading a hearing in the Senate tomorrow on the medical debt crisis in America and I want to hear from YOU.

Has medical debt or the high cost of health care impacted you or your family?

Share your story here: outreach.senate.gov/iqextran‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
VERMONTERS: With some extreme weather forecasted over the next few days, please everyone stay alert and stay safe. Flash flooding can be very dangerous. Do not attempt to walk, drive, or swim through flood waters.

Follow @NWSBurlington for weather updates, newengland511.org for road closures, and vem.vermont.gov for information on how to prepare.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Getting cancer or some other terrible illness should not mean going bankrupt, losing your home, or your life savings.

It is time to address the medical debt crisis in America.

Share your medical debt story by commenting below.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Who should decide the future of someone's pregnancy?

Is it mostly male-dominated legislatures?

I don't think so.

Let me be clear: Despite what Trump's right-wing Supreme Court justices believe, it‚Äôs women, not the government, who must control their own bodies.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In poll after poll, the American people make themselves clear: It is unconscionable that in the United States we punish people for the "crime" of getting sick with outrageous debt or bankruptcy.

Cancel all medical debt.
apnews.com/article/medical-d‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Thank you, @SenSanders, for joining us at today‚Äôs big match, and for speaking on Vermont‚Äôs collective values during half-time!

Bernie IS a soccer fan!

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The American people are hurting.

They want an agenda that speaks to the needs of working people.

That means taking on corporate greed, ending massive wealth and income inequality, and forcing the rich to pay their fair share.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In the richest country in the world, public school teachers should not have to work 2 or 3 jobs just to make ends meet. End of discussion.

And no, I don‚Äôt think that is a very radical or controversial concept.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
In America, 1 in 4 cancer patients declared bankruptcy or lost their homes to eviction or foreclosure in 2022, while 42% deplete their life savings within 2 years.

This is insane and unspeakable. Getting cancer should not cause bankruptcy. We must cancel medical debt.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The religion of the billionaire class is greed.

They would rather give up democracy than take a hit.

They will do anything to keep their power.

We won't let them.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Nearly 30,000 people in Northern California have been forced to evacuate their homes because of this terrible wildfire.

We cannot continue to stand by as climate change devastates communities across this country, AGAIN and AGAIN.

We must act.

nbcnews.com/news/us-news/tho‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I've got some bad news for my Republican colleagues:

No, we are not going to let you cut Social Security.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
President Biden and I are working together to lower the outrageously high cost of prescription drugs in our country.

Today, we wrote a joint op-ed that appeared in USA Today.

Americans cannot continue to be ripped off by the pharmaceutical industry.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The Supreme Court is out of control.

If these conservative right-wing, corporate-sponsored justices want to make public policy, they should simply quit the Supreme Court and run for political office.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We may be a politically divided nation, but I think we can all agree on one thing: It's time for Big Pharma to stop ripping off the American people.

No more corporate greed.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: This is what corporate greed & a rigged tax code looks like: Since Trump's tax breaks for the rich became law large, profitable companies spent $4.4 trillion on stock buybacks and dividends ‚Äî 7 times more than they paid in taxes. We must ban stock buybacks & end Trump's tax scam.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Birth control in this country is free by law.

So why are women across the country still paying for it?

Because private insurance companies are breaking that law.

They must be held accountable. nytimes.com/2024/06/26/well/‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Ozempic will likely become one of the best-selling pharmaceutical products in history.

Its manufacturer, Novo Nordisk, will make billions of dollars from U.S. consumers every year.

Americans should not be charged 10-15x more for this drug than people in other countries.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: I agree with these leading Israelis.  Netanyahu should not be addressing a joint meeting of Congress. nytimes.com/2024/06/26/opini‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Teachers are heroes. They are saving children's lives every single day.

They deserve to be paid at least $60,000 a year.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Elections should be about debating ideas, not about who can befriend the most billionaires.

We have got to overturn Citizens United and move to public funding of elections in America.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Elle St. Pierre, a dairy farmer from Montgomery, VT is attempting something extraordinary at the Olympic trials.¬†She is competing in both the 5,000 m & 1,500 m races. So far, so good. Last night, she won the 5,000 m in record-breaking time.¬†Good luck Elle.¬†We‚Äôre all proud of you.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Gaza is starving. Over 495,000 people face ‚Äúcatastrophic levels of acute food insecurity‚Äù because of the fighting & restrictions on humanitarian aid, according to the UN & other groups. The U.S. must USE its leverage to end this manmade catastrophe. No more bombs for Netanyahu.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: For too long, there's been a coordinated effort to sabotage our public schools and privatize our education system. Unacceptable. On this 70th anniversary year of Brown v. Board of Education, let us recommit to creating an education system that works for all, not just the wealthy few.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Two years after the Supreme Court‚Äôs horrific decision to overturn Roe v. Wade, right-wing politicians across the country have undermined access to abortion for millions of women.

Abortion is health care. And health care is a human right. We must codify Roe v. Wade into law.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The HELP Committee looks forward to Mr. J√∏rgensen, the CEO of Novo Nordisk, answering a very simple question:

Why does he think it‚Äôs acceptable to charge Americans up to 10 or 15 times more for Ozempic and Wegovy than people in Europe and other major countries?

name: Bernie Sanders
text: The trade union movement in America today is revitalized, rejuvenated, and it is winning.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
One of the great crises facing our democracy is the power of the billionaire class over our political process.

When Super PACs try to buy elections, the needs of ordinary people are ignored.

We must overturn Citizens United and move to public funding of elections.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
More defense spending? No debate.

Massive tax breaks to billionaires? Not a problem!

But when it comes to paying our teachers a fair wage, oh my ‚Äì an impossible task.

Give me a break.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The American people are sick and tired of being ripped-off by corporations that continue to make record-breaking profits by price gouging Americans in virtually every sector of our economy.

If CEOs won't end their greed, we must end it for them and pass a windfall profits tax.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: It‚Äôs time for the working class of this country to get a break.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The American people should not be made to pay the highest prices on the planet for prescription drugs.

I look forward to discussing with the CEO of Novo Nordisk why his company charges up to 15x more for Ozempic & Wegovy in the US than in other countries.
nbcnews.com/health/health-ne‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Overworked. Underpaid. Understaffed.

Stressed out and burned out.

The public school teachers and students of America deserve better. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1gqxvQQyN‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The working-class of America is angry. Very angry.
They want real change. 
What will that change look like?
I'll tell you: fighting back against outrageous corporate greed.
Together, we will create an economy that works for all of us, not just the 1%. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1OdJrjjWz‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text: The American people do not want to see starvation used as a tool of war, which is what the Netanyahu government is doing right now.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today, we celebrate Juneteenth, and remember the lasting legacy of slavery in the U.S.

We must recommit to building a nation based on justice and compassion ‚Äî a nation that confronts the injustices we still face.

There's still work to do.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today, Netanyahu put out a video attacking the U.S. for not sending him bombs fast enough.

Let‚Äôs be clear: His right wing, extremist government has killed 37,000 Palestinians.

The U.S. should withhold all offensive military aid to Israel and demand an end to this war.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: No more bombs for Netanyahu.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Even Fox News agrees: There is no reason for Americans to be forced to pay, by far, the highest prices in the world for prescription drugs.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
81% of Americans believe it‚Äôs important for the federal government to provide financial relief to people with medical debt.

No. Canceling medical debt is NOT radical. What‚Äôs radical is that 100 million Americans are burdened with medical debt for the ‚Äúcrime‚Äù of getting sick.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The American people are sick and tired of corporate greed. They are sick and tired of record levels of income and wealth inequality.

Congress must have the courage to stand with workers, not wealthy CEOs.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: If we can provide over a trillion dollars in tax breaks to the top one percent and large corporations, please don‚Äôt tell me that we cannot afford to make sure that every teacher in America receives the wages, benefits, and support that they deserve.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Insurance companies all over this country are illegally charging patients for birth control.

Just in Vermont, three companies charged patients $1.5 MILLION for contraception that should have been free.

They must be stopped.
washingtonpost.com/health/20‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Being a father is not easy.

Happy Father‚Äôs Day to all the great dads out there doing their best for their kids.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today, there are millions of people who want to go out and work, but don‚Äôt have the necessary skills and training.

That has got to change. We need real education and training for all of our people.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: While we focus on Gaza, we should not lose sight of the West Bank, where more than 500 Palestinians ‚Äì including 100 children ‚Äì have been killed by Israeli security forces and settlers, in violation of international and American law.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
I am pleased that Novo Nordisk CEO Lars J√∏rgensen has reconsidered his position and agreed to testify voluntarily on a solo panel before the HELP Committee.

I look forward to his explaining why Americans pay up to 15x more for Ozempic and Wegovy than people in other countries.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
It seems like common sense to invest in programs that can simultaneously improve the trajectory of people‚Äôs lives and ensure the health and safety of local communities by helping fill critical jobs.

We must reauthorize and expand the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
We hear a lot of talk about freedom from the Republican Party. Freedom for who?

I am not aware of any state in this country that is telling men what to do or not to with their own bodies.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The UN is right: both Hamas and Israel have committed war crimes. 

The United States and every other country must stand firm against barbarism, work to implement international law, and ensure accountability.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Novo Nordisk charges Americans over $1,000 a month for a prescription drug that can be profitably manufactured for less than $5 and can be purchased for as little as $92 in Europe.

If Novo Nordisk does not end its greed, we have a responsibility to end it for them.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
For every child now in an after-school program, two more are waiting to get in.

I was honored to join @afterschool4all and summer learning programs from across the country to learn more about their important work and mission.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Using starvation as a weapon is a war crime.

We know that children in Gaza are dying of malnutrition.

As long as Israel continues to prevent aid groups and journalists from entering the most desperate areas of Gaza, we will not know the full extent of the famine there.

name: Bernie Sanders
Bernie Sanders
text:
Wegovy is a ‚Äúgame changer‚Äù weight loss drug.

That doesn‚Äôt mean much to the millions of people who can‚Äôt afford it.

I look forward to the President of Novo Nordisk explaining to Congress why his company charges Americans 15x more for Wegovy than it charges in other countries.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: The wealthy must pay their fair share.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Join LIVE as the HELP Committee discusses the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act.

Let me be clear: No one should struggle to find a job that helps them pay rent, put food on the table, or afford child care. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1OyKAWVdZ‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
This is not a Democratic, Republican, or Independent issue. This is an American people issue.

The American people are sick and tired of being ripped off by the pharmaceutical industry. And THEY ARE RIGHT. 

Enough is enough.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Why is Novo Nordisk charging Americans over $1,000 for a prescription drug that can be can be purchased for $59 in Germany?

That is not making a reasonable return on investment. That is price gouging. That is corporate greed. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1yoKMwZeN‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
It is immoral that families are being evicted, having their heat disconnected, or having their wages garnished because of crippling medical debt while the health care industry made more than $100b in profits last year.

This is an important step in the right direction.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The HELP Committee would like a simple answer to a simple question: WHY are Americans charged $969 for Ozempic, when Germans can purchase it for $59?

Unfortunately, Novo Nordisk has been unable to respond.

They have given us no choice but to vote to subpoena their president.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Until 1920, it was illegal for women to vote.

Until 1964, it was legal to reject a job applicant because she was a woman.

Until 1974, banks could legally refuse to issue credit cards to women.

Women should not have to fight against patriarchy for their basic human rights.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
The ICC is right:

Putin is a war criminal. Sinwar is a war criminal. Netanyahu is a war criminal.

They should all be held to account.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
People are desperate to spend more time with families and friends.

They are overwhelmed and stressed out.

They're worried about the futures of their kids and the planet.

It's time for a 32-hour work week.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
‚Äú12 straight months of record-breaking heat.‚Äù

Those people, like Trump, who deny the reality of climate change are not just wrong ‚Äì they are dangerously irresponsible.

They are dooming future generations to an increasingly uninhabitable world.
cnn.com/2024/06/05/climate/1‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Today, more than one-third of American women of reproductive age live in states that are denying women access to basic reproductive health care.

We cannot accept Republicans dragging us backward. We must protect a woman's right to control her own body.
thehill.com/opinion/congress‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Earlier this week, the HELP Committee heard from providers and abortion care recipients about the nightmare that abortion bans have created across this country. I want to thank them for their testimony.
¬†
Let me be clear: Abortion is health care. And health care is a human right.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: After the HELP Committee I chair launched an investigation into inhalers that cost $645 in the US but just $49 in the UK, Boehringer Ingelheim & AstraZeneca agreed to cap the costs of the inhalers they make at $35 this month. Millions with asthma & COPD will benefit as a result.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: The decision about an abortion must be a decision for a woman and her doctor to make, not politicians or judges. Period.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Children are starving in Gaza because of Netanyahu‚Äôs policies.

Netanyahu ‚Äî the man Speaker Johnson has invited to address Congress.

Johnson should remember these children when he's enjoying fine steaks and lobsters at fundraising dinners with his billionaire friends.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Today, women‚Äôs freedoms are under attack. Join LIVE as the HELP Committee hears from providers and abortion care recipients about this health care crisis. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1ZkKzjbge‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Why I will not attend Netanyahu‚Äôs speech to Congress. nitter.net/i/broadcasts/1gqGvQlwe‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Shock of all shocks: Our for-profit health care system doesn't work for the American people.

Insurance is impossible to navigate; costs are outrageous; just getting a doctor's appointment is a nightmare.

Health care should be a right, not a privilege.
apnews.com/article/patient-c‚Ä¶

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
Tens of millions of Americans are needlessly suffering because they cannot afford the dental care they need.

In the richest country in the history of the world, no one should be going to the emergency room for tooth pain.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: Today, as a direct result of our investigation into the outrageously high cost of inhalers, the major pharmaceutical company Boehringer Ingelheim will now allow people with asthma and COPD to purchase brand name inhalers at their local drugstore for only $35.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
While millions of Americans suffer ‚Äì and some die ‚Äì because they can‚Äôt afford the prescription drugs they need, 10 of the top pharmaceutical companies in the country made over $110 billion in profits in 2022 and paid their CEOs outrageously high compensation packages.

name: Bernie Sanders

We must move away from a for-profit health care system to one that offers quality care to all.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:

name: Bernie Sanders
text:

Since 1975, over $50 trillion in wealth has been redistributed from the bottom 90% to the top 1% as corporations spend their profits on stock buybacks and dividends.

name: Bernie Sanders
text:
On this Memorial Day, and every day, we must come together to honor the brave men and women who gave their lives to defend our nation and stand with the loved ones who live with that unimaginable loss.

name: Bernie Sanders
text: We must work in coalition with all those who understand that we must do everything possible to defeat Donald Trump and his extreme rightwing Republican party, not just because he is ‚Äúworse‚Äù, but because nothing less than the future of our democracy is at stake in this election.

text:
